kiŋit ikes tema, “Ai inukakis iyes iŋes?” Tolimokis ikes iŋes temasi, “Ekapolon, bua toanyu.”
Kigwor Yesu.
Temasi Ŋiyudayan, “Kiŋolikisi, kemina iŋes Lasaro!”
Nai temasi ŋice, “Okoe, abu iŋes kitekienyu emudukanot! Pa mono kepedorit iŋes akiretakin atwanare a Lasaro a?”
Tolot nai Yesu nalyal emarani ekeetau nooi. Arae alyal aturukan, togolokinitetei amoru lopuke.
Tolimok Yesu ikes tema, “Tolemasi amoru alopuke.” Tolimok Marita, nakaato keŋ ke ekatwan Yesu tema, “Ekapolon, abosu tokona iŋes, anerae adau akiriya analyal ŋirwa ŋiomwon.”
Tolimok Yesu iŋes tema, “Pa akalimokinit ayoŋ iyoŋ atemar ani kinup, iŋolikini apolou ŋina ka Akuj a?”
Tolemasi nai ikes amoru analyal. Kireo Yesu kidiama nakuj tema, “Alakara ayoŋ neni kon Papa, anerae ikiira iyoŋ ayoŋ.
Ayeni ayoŋ atemar ikiiranari iyoŋ ayoŋ jwi jwi; nai alimunit ayoŋ ŋakiro nu, ikotere tonupyata ŋituŋa lu ŋulu ewuasi a nege daadaŋ atemar, iyoŋ kire ikiyakit ayoŋ.”
Kedau alimun ŋun, tocelu nooi tema, “Lasaro! Tolomu kiŋa!”
Tolomu ekatwan ŋol analyal, ilogilogakinitae ŋanaŋgae ŋuna nuket nakejen ka nakan keŋ; ereet daŋ aenen. Tolimok nai Yesu ikes tema, “Tolacasi ŋanaŋgae, toesikis tolot.”
Aŋun, apotu Ŋiyudayan ŋulu alalak ŋulu arukunete ka Maria, ido kiŋolikis ŋuna etiyae Yesu, tonupa iŋes.
Nai apotu ŋice alokidiŋ kec toloto neni a Ŋiparisayon, tolimokis ŋuna abu Yesu kitiya.
Tocunakinos nai ŋisacaradotin ŋulu apolok ka Ŋiparisayon Natukot kec temasi, “Okoe, ikikokini ai? Kire itiyae ekile lo ŋakujuwuanisya ŋuna alalak.
Ani kikilakak iwon iŋes itiyae jik ikona, epote ŋituŋa daadaŋ akiwuapakin iŋes, potu nai Ŋiromanin akinyasun Akai ka Akuj kaapei ka akwap yok.”
Nai abu epei alokidiŋ kec ŋolo anyaritae Kaipa, ŋolo arae Esacaradoti ŋolo Apolon nooi alokaru a ŋol tema, “Emam ibore iyenete iyes ipei daŋ!
Nyiyenete iyes atemar ejok epeikile totwan aŋuna a ŋituŋa akilo abukor akwap daadaŋ a?”
Nyelimuno iŋes ŋakiro nu erae ŋuna keŋ, nai aŋuna araakar iŋes Esacaradoti ŋolo Apolon nooi alokaru a ŋol, adwari iŋes atemar etwani Yesu aŋuna ka akwap a ŋina a Ŋiyudayan.
Meere aŋuna ka akwap a ŋin bon, nai ikotere ecunakini iwapei ŋidwe ŋulu ka Akuj, ŋulu ielara.
Ameun akoloŋit ŋin, totukut ikes epite ŋoloaret Yesu.
Aŋun, nyitor nabo Yesu nakwap a Ŋiyudayan ileere, nai tolot nakwap ŋina aapi analoŋisat, lotaun ŋolo anyaritae Epuraim, kiboiyoto ka ŋikeekasyomak aina.
Aapuunito ŋasuban ŋuna a Paska. Aponito Yerusalem ŋituŋa ŋulu alalak alorerya akiteseguno, ikwapei icikakinitotor Ŋikisila, eriŋa nyedolo Paska.
Ewarito ikes Yesu, kirworos ewuasi alo Kai ka Akuj ebasi, “Anu itamete iyes? Ebuni iŋes nasuban kori mam?”
Aris nai ŋisacaradotin ŋulu apolok ka Ŋiparisayon kicika ŋituŋa atemar, ani ŋini eyeni neni eyai Yesu, itemokino kitaanyu ikes, ikotere kikamunae iŋes.
Ani idoŋit ŋirwa ŋikanikapei todol Paska, bu Yesu Betania neni ayai Lasaro, ŋolo kebu Yesu kiteyaru alokatwak.
Kipokinoe iŋes akimuj ŋina ke eboŋ; arae Marita akori akimuj ka arae Lasaro epei a ŋulu aya lomesa kaapei ka Yesu.
Tolemu Maria akimyet ŋina akukunyon ŋina anyaritae Narido ŋina apol egyelit, kiwos ŋakejen a Yesu, ido kisuta a ŋitim keŋ; torebuwa akukunyu keŋ akai daadaŋ.
Nai abu Yuda Isikariot, epei alokasyomak a Yesu (ŋolo abu toruwor ekalukinon keŋ) tema,
“Nyo pa agyelarere akimyet ŋina akukunyon na a ŋidinari a ŋamiae a ŋauni ka inakinae lokulyak?”
Pa alimunit iŋes ŋun aŋuna esyonitotor iŋes ŋikulyak, nai aŋuna araakar ekokolan. Eŋadae iŋes ecwee ŋolo a ŋisiliŋa ka alemanari ŋisiliŋa ŋulu ewuakinitae tooma keŋ.
Tolimu Yesu tema, “Kimyekisi aberu na bon; etiyae iŋes nu ka aŋuna ka akoloŋit a ŋina akanukere ayoŋ.
Irukito iyes ka ŋikulyak jwi jwi, nai nyikiruki ayoŋ ka iyes jwi jwi.”
Ani eyenuni asepic ŋina a Ŋiyudayan atemar eyai Yesu Betania, potu ikes daadaŋ nen. Pa alosete ikes inaa aanyun Yesu bon, nai eitanito aanyun tari Lasaro ŋolo kebu Yesu kiteyaru alokatwak.
Aŋun, totukut ŋisacaradotin ŋulu apolok akiar Lasaro daŋ,
anerae ŋakiro ŋuna ka ayarun a Lasaro ikes aŋeritotor Ŋiyudayan ŋulu alalak ŋisacaradotin, ido apotu tonupa neni a Yesu.
Ani taparacu keŋ, kiira asepic ŋina a ŋituŋa a ŋulu aponito nasuban ŋuna a Paska atemar ebunit Yesu Yerusalem.
Apotu kigyenyut ŋaten ŋuna ke ekiŋol, toloto akisiryam iŋes ecelasi ebasi, “Osanna! Erereŋ ŋolo ebunit alokiro ke Ekapolon! Erereŋ Erwosit ŋolo a Isirael!”
Toryamu Yesu isigirya, todokak, ikwapei igiritere Nakigireta ebe,
“Nyikuryaketa ŋituŋa a Sion! Kiŋolikisi, ebunit Erwosit neni kus edokit itaok ŋini ka asigirya!”
Apaki ŋin, nyeyenut ŋikasyomak keŋ apolou ŋina a ŋakiro a nu, nai ani itopolooryo Yesu anayarun keŋ, totamut ikes atemar kigiritae ŋun Nakigireta aŋuna keŋ ka keponi kitiyakinae neni keŋ.
Aris ŋituŋa ŋulu arukito ka Yesu apaki ŋina anyaraa iŋes Lasaro analyal kiteyaru alokatwak, kiteyenut ŋakiro ŋuna apotu kitiyakin.
Arae ŋakiro ŋun ikes aponiata ŋituŋa toloto akisiryam Yesu, anerae aris kiirasi atemar etiya iŋes akujuwuanut.
Kirworikinos nai Ŋiparisayon make temasi, “Toanyuwasi tokona, emam idiobore ŋini ikipedori iwon akitiyakin. Kiŋolikisi! Ewuapakis ŋituŋa daadaŋ iŋes!”
Alotooma ŋituŋa ŋulu alosito akilip Yerusalem nasuban ŋuna apolok, ayakasi Ŋigirik daŋ ŋidi.
Toloto ikes neni a Pilipo (a ŋolo abunit alo Betesaida, anakwap a Galileya), tolimokis iŋes temasi, “Ekapolon, ikicamit isua aanyun Yesu!”
Tolot Pilipo tolimok Anderia ŋakiro ŋun, torukosi nai ikes kaapei tolimokis Yesu.
Tolimok Yesu ikes tema, “Adolu tokona apaki ŋina itopoloorere Lokoku a Ituŋanan.
Akalimokini ayoŋ iyes kire atemar, erubakini ekinyomit ŋolo ke emomwae erae epei, mati kedupakin nalup totwan; ani ketwana, torup nai tolalata.
Ituŋanan ŋini emina akiyar keŋ, itotwaniyari, nai ŋini ejali akiyar keŋ anakwap a na, eiuni ikotere akiyar ŋina nyedaun.
Ŋini itiyae etic kaŋ, itemokino ekewuapak ayoŋ; neni ayai ayoŋ, itemokino toyai iŋes daŋ; ŋini eruwor eketiyan kaŋ, ebuni Papa akitopoloor iŋes.
“Eryeba ekaatau iyaloloŋi nooi. Okoe, atemari ayoŋ ai? Atemari, Papa toiunae ayoŋ anapaki a na a? Nai arae aŋuna ka apaki a na abunio ayoŋ, ikotere onaikinia ŋican ŋulu ka apaki a na.
Papa, kitopoloo ekiro kon!” Kirworik nai etoil anakuj ebala, “Etopoloo ayoŋ iŋes ka etopoloori iŋes nabo.”
Apotu ŋituŋa ŋulu awuasi alodiye keŋ kiirasi etoil, temasi ŋice kori agirokinet, temasi ŋice, “Erwor emalaika neni keŋ!”
Tolimok Yesu ikes tema, “Nyirworo etoil ŋol aŋuna kaŋ, nai erwor aŋuna kus.
Adol tokona apaki ŋina etubere ŋakiro ŋuna ka akwap a na; imasaryo tokona ekepukan ŋolo ka akwap a na.
Ani kedaun akikyaar ayoŋ kidiama anakwap, eriuni ŋituŋa daadaŋ neni kaŋ.”
(Alimuni iŋes ŋun akitoodiunia epite ŋolo etwania iŋes.)
Toboŋokis ŋituŋa temasi, “Igiritae Lokisila atemar, eropari Kristo jik. Ikokini nai iyoŋ ibala, itemokino Lokoku a Ituŋanan kikyaarae ai? Ŋae mono Lokoku a Ituŋanan ŋol?”
Toboŋok Yesu tema, “Eyakaun akica ka iyes adiouriyen. Torubakisi ilosete eriŋa akica eyai, ikotere nyedolu akiryonut neni kus. Ituŋanan ŋini elosi anakiryonut, nyeyeni neni elosi.
Ani eriŋa iyakatar akica, tonupa akica, ikotere toruworos iyes ŋituŋa ŋulu ka akica.”
Ani tari kitiya iŋes ŋakujuwuanisya ŋuna alalak iteete ikes, nyenupa ikes iŋes.
Apotu nu kitiyakin, kiyookinotor ŋakiro ŋuna egirit Isaya ekadwaran ebala, “Ekapolon, ŋae idio ŋini abu tonup ŋakosikiro? Neni a ŋae abu Ekapolon kitoodik apedor keŋ?”
Aŋun, nyepedosi ikes akinup, anerae egirit nabo Isaya ebala,
“Etumudukan Akuj ŋakecekonyen ka etabaŋaan ikes, ikotere nyiŋolikis a ŋakonyen kec ka nyeyenut ŋatameta kec, nyeboŋut neni kaŋ, tosodi etaŋaleu ayoŋ ikes.”
Alimuni Isaya ŋakiro ŋun, anerae abu kiŋolik apolou a Yesu, kisyak nai akirwor aŋuna keŋ.
Tari kikote neni, apotu tari ŋikapolok ŋulu a Ŋiyudayan ŋulu alalak tonupa Yesu. Nai aŋuna akeritotor ikes Ŋiparisayon, nyelimut ikes ŋakiro ŋun epupete ŋituŋa, ikotere nyiritar ikes alosinagoga.
Aminasi ikes akitopolooro alotuŋa akilo akitopolooro aneni ka Akuj.
Tocelu Yesu nooi tema, “Ŋini akanupi ayoŋ, anup iŋes tari ŋolo ekeyakuunit ayoŋ, meere ayoŋ bon.
Ŋini ekeŋolik ayoŋ, eŋolik iŋes tari ŋolo ekeyakuunit ayoŋ.
Abu ayoŋ nakwap na arae akica, ikotere ŋini akanupi ayoŋ, nyidoŋ nakiryonut.
Ani kiira ituŋanan ŋakiro kaŋ nyiwuapak, nyatubokini ayoŋ iŋes. Pa abuni ayoŋ atubonokin ŋituŋa ŋulu ka akwap, nai aiun ikes.
Ŋinituŋanan akaŋeri ayoŋ, nyecamu ŋakiro kaŋ, eyakar iŋes ekatubon. Ŋakiro ŋuna erworo ayoŋ, ikes eruworosi ekatubon keŋ Akoloŋit ŋina esidyon.
Anerae nyerworo ayoŋ aŋuna ka apedor kaŋ bon, erae Papa ŋolo ekeyakuunit ayoŋ, iŋes ekecikakinit ŋakiro ŋuna itemokino olimu ka erwor.
Ayeni ayoŋ atemar akiciket keŋ iŋes eyauni lotuŋa akiyar ŋina nyedaun. Ŋuna alimuni ayoŋ, alimuni alopite a ŋolo akalimokinitor Papa.”
Ani eapuuni apaki ŋina a ŋasuban a Paska, toanyu Yesu atemar kedol apaki ŋina esikinet akwap na, toboŋo neni a Papa. Amina jwi jwi Yesu ŋulu keŋ ŋulu ayakasi nakwap, akitodol tari natwanare.
Ani imujete ikes eboŋ, keris Satan, aŋuna ka alukinio Yesu, keloma lotau a Yuda Isikariot, a ŋolo arae lokoku a Simoni.
Ayeni Yesu atemar abu Papa kiwuak ŋiboro daadaŋ nakan keŋ; ayeni daŋ iŋes atemar abuni aneni ka Akuj, ido eboŋori nabo nenipei keŋ.
Tonyou nai Yesu alomesa, tolaca ekaaso, toenik ataulo nacir.
Tobukok ŋakipi nakalaat, kisyak akilot ŋakejen a ŋikasyomak, toninaiya ka ataulo a ŋina anapit iŋes anacir.
Ani edoluni iŋes neni a Simoni Petero, kiŋit Petero Yesu tema, “Ekapolon, iyoŋ ilotari ŋakejen kaŋ a?”
Toboŋok Yesu iŋes tema, “Nyiyeni iyoŋ tokona ŋuna etiyae ayoŋ, nai ibuni iyoŋ ayenun ekaku.”
Tolimok Petero Yesu tema, “Mam jik nyilotari iyoŋ ŋakaakejen!” Toboŋok Yesu iŋes tema, “Ani pa kelota ayoŋ ŋakejen kon, nyikiruki iyoŋ ka ayoŋ nabo.”
Tolimok Simoni Petero Yesu tema, “Ekapolon, ani kikote neni, meere ŋakaakejen bon, ŋakan ka akou daŋ!”
Tolimu Yesu tema, “Ŋini adau akiloŋari, eseg iŋes; nyiitanit akiloŋa nabo, mati ŋakejen bon. Isegak iyes, nai meere daadaŋ.”
(Anerae ayeni Yesu ŋini alukinon iŋes; iŋes alimunio atemar, “Isegak iyes, nai meere daadaŋ.” )
Kedau Yesu akilotar ŋakejen kec, tonap ekaaso keŋ, toboŋo lomesa. Kiŋit ikes tema, “Iyenete iyes apolou a ŋuna adau ayoŋ akitiya neni kus a?
Ikinyarito iyes ayoŋ Eketataman ka Ekapolon. Ee, iyookinito iyes, anerae arae kire ayoŋ.
Ikwapei elotarya ayoŋ ŋolo arae Ekapolon ka Eketataman ŋakejen kus, itemokino iyes daŋ kilosete ŋakejen a ŋuluce.
Adau ayoŋ ainakin iyes akitaanyikinet, ikotere kitiyata iyes daŋ ikwaŋina adaunia ayoŋ akitiya neni kus.
Akalimokini ayoŋ iyes kire atemar, emam epito ŋolo epol akilo ekeekapolon, nabo daŋ emam ekiyakitono ŋolo epol akilo ŋolo iyakit iŋes.
Ani kiyenete iyes nu, irereŋ iyes erae kitiyata nu.
Nyerworo ayoŋ aŋuna kus a daadaŋ, ayeni ŋulu adau ayoŋ aseun; nai ikotere kiyookinotor ŋuna igiritae Nakigireta ebe, ‘Abu ituŋanan ŋini ikimori ka ayoŋ okoluki ayoŋ.’
Akalimokini ayoŋ iyes nugu eriŋa nyetakanuna, ikotere ani etakanunete, tonupyata atemar, ‘Arae Ayoŋ ŋolo Arae Ayoŋ!’
Akalimokini ayoŋ iyes kire atemar, ŋini ijauni ituŋanan ŋini eyakit ayoŋ, ekejauni ayoŋ, nabo ituŋanan ŋini ekejauni ayoŋ, ijauni ŋolo ekeyakuunit ayoŋ.”
Kedau Yesu alimun ŋun, kiyaloloŋ nooi alotau keŋ, kiteyenu ŋakiro nu pa imunonit tema, “Akalimokini ayoŋ iyes kire atemar, ebuni ipei alokidiŋ kus alukin ayoŋ.”
Kiŋolyanakinos ŋikeekasyomak make eumokinito, pa ayenete ŋolo erworor Yesu.
Eboi epeikasyoman, ŋolo amina iŋes, alodiyete keŋ.
Aŋun, toketu Simoni Petero ekasyoman ŋol tema, “Kiŋit iŋes ŋini irworor iŋes?”
Tosodi ekasyoman ŋol kiyoto diyete Yesu, kiŋit iŋes tema, “Ekapolon, ŋae ŋini irworor iyoŋ?”
Tolimok Yesu iŋes tema, “Ekile ŋol, iŋes ŋolo ainakini ayoŋ amugati kelumok loboka.” Kedau Yesu akilumokin, inak Yuda, lokoku a Simoni Isikariot.
Ani kedau Yuda akinyam amugati, toloma Satan lotau keŋ. Tolimok Yesu Yuda tema, “Kiburuburak akitiya ibore ŋini ilosi akitiya!”
Amam alokidiŋ ŋituŋa ŋulu eboiyete alomesa ŋini ayeni apolou a ŋakiro a ŋuna erworo iŋes.

Atamete ŋice atemar kori aŋina eŋadaa Yuda ecwee ŋolo a ŋisiliŋa, alimokinit Yesu iŋes alosit agyelun ŋiboro ŋulu eitanitae aŋuna a ŋasuban. Abasi ŋice kori kelimokini Yesu iŋes ainar ŋikulyak idiobore.
Kedau Yuda akijaar amugati, toloma kiŋa atipei. Arae akuwar akwap.
Keloma Yuda kiŋa, tema Yesu, “Tokona, etopoloor Lokoku a Ituŋanan, ka etopoloor Akuj aŋuna keŋ.
Ani nai kitopoloor Akuj aŋuna keŋ, itopoloori Akuj daŋ Lokoku a Ituŋanan ka apolou keŋ ka alope, kitopoloo iŋes atipei.
Ŋikaadwe, eriŋa ayoŋ ikirukit ka iyes adiouriyen. Ipote iyes akiwar ayoŋ, nai ikwapei abunio ayoŋ olimokinia Ŋiyudayan, akalimokini iyes daŋ tokona atemar, ‘Nyipedorete iyes aponare neni alosi ayoŋ.’
Akainakini tokona akiciket ŋina kitete: tominin make; ikwaŋina akaminar ayoŋ iyes, iyes daŋ tominin make.
Ani kitiyata iyes ikoŋina, eyenunete ŋituŋa atemar irae iyes ŋikasyomak kaŋ, erae kiminin iyes make.”
Kiŋit Simoni Petero Yesu tema, “Ekapolon, ai ilosi iyoŋ?” Toboŋok Yesu iŋes tema, “Nyikitupakini iyoŋ ayoŋ neni alosi tokona, nai ikitupuni iyoŋ ayoŋ ekaku.”
Kiŋit nabo Petero Yesu tema, “Ekapolon, kaanukiro nyakatupakinia ayoŋ iyoŋ tokona? Ajali ayoŋ akiyar kaŋ aŋuna kon.”
Toboŋok Yesu iŋes tema, “Ijali kire iyoŋ akiyar kon aŋuna kaŋ a? Akalimokini ayoŋ iyoŋ kire atemar, eriŋa ekokoroit nyeruuno, ipegi iyoŋ ŋapeget ŋauni atemar ikiyeni ayoŋ.”
“Nyiyaloloŋo, tonupa Akuj, tonupae ayoŋ daŋ.
Elalak ŋagulei alotooma akai a Papa kaŋ. Kerae nyikote neni, pa kakalimokinit ayoŋ iyes atemar alosi ayoŋ akitemokin akibois aŋuna kus.
Ani kalot ayoŋ akitemokin akibois aŋuna kus, aboŋuni nai ayoŋ okocuna iyes neni kaŋ, ikotere kiboiyoto iyes daŋ aneni ayai ayoŋ.
Iyenete iyes erot ŋolo elosi neni alosi ayoŋ.”
Kiŋit Tomas Yesu tema, “Ekapolon, nyikiyeni isua neni ilosi iyoŋ, ikianyuni nai isua erot ŋol ikwaani?”
Tolimok Yesu Tomas tema, “Arae Ayoŋ erot, Arae ŋuna a kire ka Arae akiyar; nyepedori ituŋanan abunore neni a Papa, mati kitoru neni kaŋ.
Ikwaŋina tokona ikiyeniata iyes ayoŋ, iyenunete Papa kaŋ daŋ; ameun tokona, iyenete iyes iŋes ka ianyut daŋ.”
Tolimok Pilipo Yesu tema, “Ekapolon, kitoodikinae isua Papa, ido kimwonikinetei nai isua.”
Tolimok Yesu iŋes tema, “Pilipo, ikirukit iyoŋ ka ayoŋ ŋinapei, nai eriŋa iyoŋ nyeyenuna ayoŋ a? Ŋini adau aanyun ayoŋ, aanyu Papa kaŋ daŋ, kaanukiro nai ibaakar iyoŋ, ‘Kitoodikinae isua Papa?’
Nyinupit iyoŋ atemar ayai ayoŋ tooma Papa ka eyai iŋes tooma kaŋ a? Ŋuna daadaŋ erworo ayoŋ nyerworo ka apedor kaŋ bon, nai Papa ŋolo iboi alotooma kaŋ, iŋes itiyae ŋiticisyo keŋ.
Tonupae ayoŋ atemar ayai ayoŋ tooma Papa ka eyai Papa tooma kaŋ. Ani kemam, tonupae ayoŋ aŋuna a ŋiticisyo a ŋulu etiyae ayoŋ.
Akalimokini ayoŋ iyes kire atemar, ŋini akanupi ayoŋ, itiyae daŋ ŋiticisyo ŋulu etiyae ayoŋ; itiyae iŋes ŋiticisyo ŋulu iloito tari ŋulu kaŋ, anerae aboŋori ayoŋ neni a Papa.
Ŋinibore daadaŋ iŋisete iyes alokiro kaŋ, etiyakini ayoŋ, ikotere kitopolooroe Papa aneni a Lokoku.
Ŋinibore ikiŋisete iyes ayoŋ alokiro kaŋ, etiyakini ayoŋ.
“Ani kikiminasi iyes ayoŋ, iricakinete ŋakiciketa kaŋ.
Elipi ayoŋ Papa, ikiinakini iŋes iyes ekeŋarakiniton ece ŋolo irukyoto iyes jik.

Erae iŋes Etau ŋolo irworo ŋuna a kire ŋuna ka Akuj. Nyepedori akwap akijaun iŋes, anerae nyite akwap iŋes, kori nyeyeni iŋes. Iyenete iyes iŋes, anerae iboiyuni iŋes neni kus ka eyakaun iŋes tooma kus.
“Nyakaesikini ayoŋ iyes make ikokiyanito, aboŋuni ayoŋ neni kus.
Apaki adio cicinyekeŋolikinete nabo ayoŋ ŋituŋa ŋulu ka akwap a na, nai ikiŋolikinete iyes ayoŋ ka aŋuna ayarya ayoŋ, iyarete iyes daŋ.
Akoloŋit ŋin, ipote iyes aanyun atemar ayai ayoŋ tooma Papa kaŋ, iyakasi iyes tooma kaŋ ka ayai ayoŋ tooma kus.
“Ŋini ecamunit ŋakiciketa kaŋ, kiricakinite, iŋes akamina ayoŋ. Ŋini akamina ayoŋ, iŋes eminakini Papa kaŋ; aminakini ayoŋ daŋ iŋes ka esileereun neni keŋ.”
Abu Yuda (meere Yuda Isikariot) kiŋit Yesu tema, “Ekapolon, ikokini iyoŋ isileereun neni kosi, nai meere lotuŋa ŋulu ka akwap ai?”
Toboŋok Yesu iŋes tema, “Ŋinituŋanan akamina ayoŋ, iricakini ŋakiro kaŋ. Eminakini Papa kaŋ iŋes ka ikiponi isua neni keŋ, eboiyoto ka iŋes.
Ituŋanan daadaŋ ŋini nyakamina ayoŋ, nyiricakini ŋakiro kaŋ. Ŋakiro daadaŋ ŋuna ipupete iyes, meere ŋuna kaŋ, nai erae ŋuna a Papa a ŋolo ekeyakuunit ayoŋ.
“Akalimok ayoŋ iyes ŋakiro ŋun, eriŋa ayoŋ ikirukit ka iyes.
Ebuni nai ekeŋarakiniton, Etau ŋolo Asegan, ŋolo iyakuuni Papa alokiro kaŋ, ikitatam iyes ŋakiro daadaŋ ka ikitatamunite iyes ŋuna daadaŋ adau ayoŋ alimokin iyes.
“Ekemyekinia ayoŋ iyes ekisil; ekisil kaŋ iŋes akainakini iyes, nyikoni iŋes ekisil ŋolo ka akwap. Nyiyaloloŋo kori nyikibul!
Iirasi iyes ŋuna akalimokini ayoŋ iyes atemar, ‘Alosi ayoŋ, nai aboŋuni neni kus.’ Kerae itominasi iyes ayoŋ kire, kilelyana, anerae alosi ayoŋ neni a Papa a ŋolo epol akilo ayoŋ.
Akalimok tokona ayoŋ iyes ŋakiro nu, eriŋa ikes nyetakanuna, ikotere ani ŋina etakanuniata, tonupa.
Nyikirworo ayoŋ ka iyes ekaoyan, anerae ebunit ekepukan ŋolo ka akwap a na. Nyeyakar iŋes apedor ŋina ekepukaa ayoŋ,
nai etiyae ayoŋ ikwaŋina ekecikakinitor Papa, ikotere eyenuniata ŋituŋa ŋulu ka akwap atemar amina ayoŋ Papa. Tonyoutu, oloto a ne.
“Arae Ayoŋ ekitoe ŋolo ke epiini ŋolo a kire, Papa kaŋ iŋes erae eketan.
Ani ŋinateni kaŋ nyeraii, etubori iŋes ka ani ŋina eraii, eipanari iŋes, ikotere tosegyar, tora ŋaraito ŋuna alalak.
Adaun iyes akitesegun a ŋakiro a ŋuna adau ayoŋ akitatam iyes.
Kiboiyoto alotooma kaŋ ka ayoŋ tooma kus. Nyeraii ateni bon, mati eyai lokitoe. Ikwaŋinapei ikoŋin, nyirayete iyes ŋaraito, mati kiboiyoto alotooma kaŋ.
“Arae Ayoŋ ekitoe ŋolo ke epiini, irae iyes ŋaten. Ŋini iboi alotooma kaŋ ka ayoŋ alotooma keŋ, iŋes erauni ŋaraito ŋuna alalak; anerae emam idiobore ŋini itiyakinete iyes amam ayoŋ.
Ŋini nyiboi alotooma kaŋ, etuboryo ikwa ateni, tooniyo. Ŋaten ŋuna aoko ecunakinio, tocakakinae nakim, tonomiya.
Ani kiboiyoto iyes alotooma kaŋ, nabo kiboiyoto ŋakiro kaŋ alotooma kus, kiŋita ibore daadaŋ ŋini icamito, ikiinakinio.
Itopolooritae Papa kaŋ ŋina irayata iyes ŋaraito ŋuna alalak; epite ŋol itopolooritere Papa kaŋ, ido itoodiunete iyes atemar, irae ŋikasyomak kaŋ.
Akamina ayoŋ iyes ikwaŋina akaminar ayoŋ Papa kaŋ, kidoŋo namina kaŋ.
Ani kiricakis iyes ŋakiciketa kaŋ, idoŋete namina kaŋ, ikwaŋina ericakinia ayoŋ ŋakiciketa a Papa kaŋ, edoŋitor namina keŋ.
“Adau ayoŋ alimun ŋakiro ŋun, ikotere alelyan kaŋ eyakaun neni kus jik ka ikotere alelyan kus ilelebikin.
Akaakiciket iŋes na: tominin make, ikwaŋina akaminar ayoŋ iyes.
Emam amina ŋina epol akilo ŋina ejalya ituŋanan akeekiyar aŋuna a ŋikonei keŋ.
Irae iyes ŋikonei kaŋ, erae kitiyata ŋuna ekecikakini ayoŋ iyes.
Nyeriŋa ayoŋ akanyarit iyes ŋiketiyak, anerae nyeyeni eketiyan ŋuna itiyae ekapolon keŋ, nai tokona akanyarit ayoŋ iyes ŋikonei, anerae akalimok ayoŋ iyes ŋuna daadaŋ eira aneni a Papa kaŋ.
Nyeseuna iyes ayoŋ; nai akaseu ka akatyaku ayoŋ iyes, toloto toraa ŋaraito ŋuna alalak ŋuna nyedaun, ikotere ani ŋinibore daadaŋ iŋitasi aneni a Papa alokiro kaŋ, ikiinakini.
Ekecikakini ayoŋ iyes nu: tominin make.
“Ani kikitidiŋa iyes ŋituŋa ŋulu ka akwap, toyenete atemar aris keketidiŋa ayoŋ eriŋa iyes.
Kerae toraakas iyes ŋituŋa ŋulu ka akwap a na, kikiminak iyes akwap na, anarakau ŋulu keŋ. Nai akaseu ayoŋ iyes anakwap a na, ka nyirae iyes ŋulu keŋ. Iŋes nai ikitidiŋitor iyes akwap na.

Totamunito ŋuna adau ayoŋ alimokin iyes atemar, ‘Emam eketiyan ŋolo epol akilo ekeekapolon.’ Ani kekesicanito ikes ayoŋ, epote ikes akisican iyes daŋ; ani kiricakinito ikes ŋakiro kaŋ, iricakinete ŋuna kus daŋ.
Nai itiyakinete ikes ŋun daadaŋ neni kus aŋuna kaŋ, anerae nyeyenete ikes ŋolo ekeyakuunit ayoŋ.
Kerae nyabunit ayoŋ, esirwor ikes, kemam ikes asecit; nai tokona emam epite ŋolo etemaryata ikes, ‘Nyikisecit.’
Ŋini eketidiŋit ayoŋ, itidiŋit Papa kaŋ daŋ.
Kerae nyetiyat ayoŋ alokidiŋ kec ŋiticisyo ŋulu nyitiya idiotuŋanan, kemam ikes asecit; nai tokona adaut ikes akiŋolikin ŋun ka akitidiŋ ayoŋ ka Papa kaŋ daŋ.
Apotu ŋun kitiyakin, ikotere kiyookinotor ŋuna igiritae Lokisila kec ebe, ‘Apotu ikes eketidiŋa ayoŋ koŋin.’
“Ebuni ekeŋarakiniton, ŋolo eyakuuni ayoŋ aneni a Papa. Erae iŋes Etau ŋolo irworo ŋuna a kire; ebuni iŋes akiteyenun ayoŋ.
Irae iyes daŋ ŋisuudae kaŋ, anerae ikirukit iyes ka ayoŋ ŋinapei anakisyakinet.
“Adau ayoŋ alimun ŋakiro ŋun daadaŋ, ikotere nyioliyosi iyes ananupit kus.
Ikiritarete ikes iyes alosinagogae; kire ebuni apaki ŋina ikiaryata ŋituŋa iyes ebasi kori ikitiyae ŋuna ecamit Akuj.
Itiyaete ikes ŋun, anerae nyeyenuna ikes Papa kori ayoŋ.
Nai akalimok ayoŋ iyes ŋakiro ŋun, ikotere ani apaki ŋina itiyakinotor neni kus, totamut atemar aris ayoŋ kakalimok iyes.
Nai tokona aboŋori ayoŋ neni a ŋolo ekeyakuunit ayoŋ, nai emam iyes ipei daŋ ŋini ekeŋisi ayoŋ tema, ‘Ai ilosi iyoŋ?’
Aŋuna tokona adaunia ayoŋ alimokin iyes ŋun daadaŋ, eyaloloŋ ŋikusitai nooi.
Nai akalimokini ayoŋ iyes ŋuna a kire atemar, ikijoikini iyes kalot ayoŋ, anerae pa kalot ayoŋ aneni kus, nyebuni ekeŋarakiniton neni kus. Nai kalot ayoŋ, eyakuuni iŋes neni kus.
Ani edoluni iŋes, itunupi ŋituŋa ŋulu ka akwap ŋuna ka asecit ka ŋuna ka akiyookino, ta ŋuna ka atubokino.
Itunupi ŋuna ka asecit, anerae nyakanupito ikes ayoŋ.
Itunupi ŋuna ka akiyookino, anerae alosi ayoŋ neni a Papa, nyikianyuwasi nabo.
Itunupi ŋuna ka atubokino, anerae adaun ekepukan ŋolo ka akwap a na atubokin.
“Eyakasi ŋakiro ŋuna alalak ŋuna acamit ayoŋ alimokin iyes, nai nyipedorete atitinyikin.

Nai ani ebuni Etau ŋolo irworo ŋuna a kire, ikiyoori iyes nakiro daadaŋ ŋuna a kire; anerae nyirwori iŋes aŋuna ka apedor keŋ bon, nai ebuni iŋes akirwor ŋuna iirarit, nabo ikilimokini iyes ŋuna epote.
Eketopoloori iŋes ayoŋ, anerae ebuni iŋes akijaar ŋuna kaŋ, itolimok iyes.
Ŋinibore daadaŋ eyakar Papa kaŋ, erae ŋini kaŋ, iŋes nai alimunitor ayoŋ atemar, ebuni iŋes akijaar ŋuna kaŋ, itolimok iyes.
“Apaki adio cicinyikianyuwarete ayoŋ nabo; apaki adiocici ekaku, ikianyuwarete ayoŋ nabo.”

Kiŋitanaros ŋikasyomak keŋ ŋice ebasi, “Okoe! Nyo mono apolou ŋina a ŋakiro a ŋun? Ikilimok iŋes iwon atemar, ‘Apaki adiocici nyikianyuwarete ayoŋ nabo; apaki adiocici ekaku, ikianyuwarete ayoŋ nabo;’ ka daŋ abala, ‘Anerae alosi ayoŋ neni a Papa.’
Nyo mono tokona apolou ŋina ka akirot a ŋina ebala iŋes ‘Iwadiocici’. Ikikuruwo apolou ŋina a ŋakiro a ŋuna irworo iŋes!”

Ayeni Yesu atemar acamito ikes akiŋit iŋes ŋakiro ŋun. Aŋun, tolimok ikes tema, “Ikwa ŋuna iŋitanarosi iyes alokidiŋ kus ŋuna alimunit ayoŋ atemar, ‘Apaki adio cicinyikianyuwarete ayoŋ nabo; apaki adio ciciekaku, ikianyuwarete ayoŋ nabo’ a?
Akalimokini ayoŋ iyes kire atemar, ipote iyes akigworo ka akiwolol, nai elelyani akwap nooi; ipote iyes akiyaloloŋ, nai ibelekin akiyaloloŋ kus toruwor alelyan.
Iyaloloŋi aberu apaki ŋina eryebakinor, anerae adol akeepaki ŋina idounio; nai ani kedau iŋes akidoun, imuryakini iŋes aryeba, anerae elelyani iŋes akidoun ikoku nakwap.
Ikote nenipei ŋakiro aneni kus: iyaloloŋete iyes tokona, nai akaanyuni ayoŋ iyes nabo, ido tolelyana ŋitai kus. Emam idiotuŋanan elemari alelyan ŋin aneni kus.
“Ani ŋina edolunio Akoloŋit ŋin, emam idiobore ipote iyes akiŋit ayoŋ. Nai akalimokini ayoŋ iyes kire atemar, ibore daadaŋ ŋini iŋitasi iyes alokiro kaŋ, ebuni Papa kaŋ ainakin iyes.
Akitodol tokona nyiŋita iyes idiobore alokiro kaŋ; kiŋita iryamunete, ikotere alelyan kus ilelebikin.
“Erwor ayoŋ ŋakiro ŋun daadaŋ a ŋakitadapeta. Ebuni apaki ŋina nyerworya ayoŋ a ŋakitadapeta, nai abuni akisileerekin iyes Papa.
Akoloŋit ŋin, ipote iyes akiŋita alokiro kaŋ, nai nyakalimokinit ayoŋ iyes atemar ekelipakini iyes Papa kaŋ;
anerae ikimina iyes Papa elope. Ikimina iŋes iyes, anerae ikiminasi iyes ayoŋ ka inupito atemar abunit ayoŋ aneni a Papa.
Abu ayoŋ aneni a Papa, abu nakwap, nabo aesikini ayoŋ akwap, oboŋo neni a Papa.”
Ido tolimokis ŋikasyomak iŋes temasi, “Abe bo tokona nyeriŋa iyoŋ irworo a ŋakitadapeta, nai ileereete ŋakiro kon.
Ikiyeni tokona isua atemar iyeni iyoŋ ŋakiro daadaŋ, iŋes nai nyiitanitor idiotuŋanan akiŋit iyoŋ akirot. Ikitunupa nu isua atemar, ibunit iyoŋ aneni ka Akuj.”
Toboŋok Yesu ikes tema, “Inupa kire iyes tokona a?
Ebunit apaki, kire adolu apaki ŋina ikielarere iyes, ŋina elosyo ŋinituŋanan lore keŋ, okoesikin ayoŋ bon; nai nyedoŋi ayoŋ bon, anerae ikirukit Papa ka ayoŋ.
Akalimok ayoŋ iyes ŋun, ikotere toryamut iyes ekisil alotooma kaŋ. Ikiteryamuni akwap iyes ŋican, nai toena ŋitai! Elou ayoŋ akwap.”
Kedau Yesu akirwor ŋakiro ŋun, kireo nakuj, kilip tema, “Papa, adolu apaki, kitopoloo Lokoku kon, ikotere ikitopoloo Lokoku kon iyoŋ.
Anerae iinak iyoŋ Lokoku apedor ŋinakipukaet ŋituŋa daadaŋ, ikotere iinakini akiyar ŋina nyedaun neni a ŋulu daadaŋ ibu iyoŋ inak iŋes.
Erae na akiyar ŋina nyedaun, itoyenete ikes iyoŋ, Akuj ŋina erae apei bon ŋina a kire ka Yesu Kristo ŋolo ibu kiyaku iyoŋ.
Etoodik ayoŋ apolou kon nakwap anakirikakin etic ŋolo ikiinakinit iyoŋ ayoŋ akitiya.
Papa, inakinae ayoŋ apolou tokona alokiŋaren kon, apolou ŋinapei ikiyakar ayoŋ ka iyoŋ eriŋa tari akwap nyesubuna.
“Adau ayoŋ akisileerekin ekiro kon lotuŋa ŋulu ibu iyoŋ ikiinak ayoŋ anakwap a na. Arae ikes ŋulu kon, ibu iyoŋ ikiinak ayoŋ ka ericakis ikes akirot kon.
Tokona eyenete ikes atemar, ibore daadaŋ ŋini ikiinak iyoŋ ayoŋ, ebunit aneni kon.
Anerae alimok ayoŋ ikes ŋakiro ŋuna ikilimokini iyoŋ ayoŋ, ka acamut ikes. Ayenut ikes atemar, abunit ayoŋ kire aneni kon, ka anupa atemar, iyoŋ ikiyakuuni ayoŋ.
“Elipi ayoŋ aŋuna kec; nyelipi ayoŋ aŋuna ka akwap a daadaŋ, nai elipi aŋuna a ŋulu ikiinak iyoŋ ayoŋ, anerae erae ikes ŋulu kon.
Ŋini erae ŋini kaŋ erae ŋini kon ka ŋini erae ŋini kon erae ŋini kaŋ, itoodiunitae apolou kaŋ aneni kec.

Abunit ayoŋ neni kon; nyeriŋa ayoŋ ayai nakwap, nai eriŋa ikes eyakasi nakwap. Papa ŋolo Asegan, kiyok iyoŋ ikes ka apedor a ŋina ke ekiro kon, ekiro ŋolo ikiinakinit iyoŋ ayoŋ, ikotere eruworosi ikes ŋipei, ikwaŋina ikiraakar iwon ŋipei.

Ani eriŋa ayoŋ ikirukit ka ikes, abu eyok ikes ka apedor a ŋina ke ekiro kon, ekiro ŋolo ikiinakinit iyoŋ ayoŋ. Eyok ayoŋ ikes, emam ŋini aoliyo, mati ipei ŋini etemokino tooliyo – ikotere kiyookinotor Ŋakigireta.
Nai tokona abunit ayoŋ neni kon, adau ayoŋ akirwor ŋakiro ŋun anakwap, ikotere eryamunete ikes alelyan kaŋ ilelebikina alotai kec.
Ainak ayoŋ ikes akirot kon; etidiŋa ŋituŋa ŋulu ka akwap ikes, anerae nyerae ikes ŋulu ka akwap, ikwaŋinapei nyaraakar ayoŋ daŋ ŋolo ka akwap.
Nyekelipit ayoŋ iyoŋ atemar tolema ikes anakwap, nai ekelipit ayoŋ iyoŋ atemar, kiyok iyoŋ ikes aneni a ŋolo Aronon.
Nyerae ikes ŋulu ka akwap, ikwaŋinapei nyaraakar ayoŋ daŋ ŋolo ka akwap.
Kituruwo ikes ŋulu etyakunitae nakirot ŋina a kire; akirot kon iŋes erae ŋina a kire.
Ikwaŋinapei ibunio iyoŋ ikiyakiya ayoŋ nakwap, eyakiyarit ayoŋ daŋ ikes nakwap.
Aruwor ayoŋ ŋolo akatyakunitae aŋuna kec, ikotere toruworos ikes daŋ ŋulu seuna anakirot a ŋina a kire.
“Nyelipakinit ayoŋ ikes make, nai elipakinit tari ŋulu akanupete ayoŋ aŋuna ka akitatam kec.
Elipit ayoŋ atemar toruworos ikes daadaŋ ŋipei. “Papa! [Ikwaŋinapei iyakar iyoŋ tooma kaŋ, ka ayoŋ daŋ tooma kon,] pena ikes tooma yok, ikotere enupi akwap atemar, ikiyakuunit iyoŋ ayoŋ.
Ainak ayoŋ ikes apolou ŋinapei ikiinit iyoŋ ayoŋ, ikotere eruworosi ikes ŋipei, ikwaŋinapei ikiraakar iwon ŋipei.
Ayai ayoŋ tooma kec, iyai iyoŋ tooma kaŋ, ikotere toruworos ikes ŋipei jik, ikotere nai toyenu akwap atemar ikiyakuunit iyoŋ ayoŋ ka atemar imina iyoŋ ikes, ikwaŋinapei ikiminar iyoŋ ayoŋ.
“Papa! Acamit ayoŋ ŋulu ikiinakinit iyoŋ ayoŋ, oruko ka ayoŋ aneni ayai ayoŋ, ikotere eanyunete ikes apolou kaŋ, ŋina ikiinakinit iyoŋ ayoŋ; anerae ikimina iyoŋ ayoŋ eriŋa tari akwap nyesubuna.
Okoe Papa ŋolo ka akiyookino! Nyikiyeni iyoŋ akwap kire, nai akayeni ayoŋ iyoŋ; eyenete lu atemar ikiyakuunit iyoŋ ayoŋ.
Eketeyenu ayoŋ iyoŋ ikes ka arubakini ekoni nenipei, ikotere min amina ŋina ikiminar iyoŋ ayoŋ tooma kec ka ayoŋ daŋ tooma kec.”
Kedau Yesu akilip ŋin, toloto iŋes ka ŋikeekasyomak ekekwaye aŋolol Kidron. Ayai nen emanikor ŋolo apotu Yesu ka ŋikeekasyomak tolomasi.
Ayeni Yuda ŋolo alukinon akibois ŋin, anerae eryamunun Yesu ka ŋikasyomak keŋ nen ŋarwa ŋuna alalak.
Toriko Yuda ŋasigarya ŋuna a Ŋiromanin ka ŋiketeok Akai ka Akuj lomanikor. Eakito ŋisacaradotin ŋulu apolok ka Ŋiparisayon ikes. Atiŋito ikes ŋiboro ŋulu ke ejiye ka ŋitaae ta ŋagilae.
Ayeni Yesu ŋakiro daadaŋ ŋuna itiyakinio neni keŋ, kikomau kiŋaren kec, kiŋit tema, “Ŋae iwarito iyes?”
Toboŋokis ikes temasi, “Yesu ŋolo a Nasaret.” Tolimok Yesu ikes tema, “Ayoŋ lo!” Awuasi Yuda ŋolo alukinon ka ikes.
Ani kedau Yesu alimun ebe, “Ayoŋ lo,” kikutukutoosi ikes, kibusokinos kwap.
Kiŋit Yesu ikes nabo tema, “Ŋae iwarito iyes?” Temasi ikes, “Yesu ŋolo a Nasaret.”
Tolimok Yesu ikes tema, “Adau ayoŋ alimokin iyes atemar ayoŋ lo. Ani nai kerae ayoŋ ikiwarito iyes, kimyekisi ŋikilyok lu toloto.”
(Arae ŋun akisiyookinio ŋakiro ŋuna sek alimunit iŋes ebala, “Papa, mam alokidiŋ ŋulu ibu iyoŋ ikiinak ayoŋ ŋini etooliyo ayoŋ.”)
Abu Simoni Petero ŋolo ayakar atum, kitel epito ŋolo ke Esacaradoti a ŋolo Apolon nooi nakit ŋina aloteten, totubo. (Arae ekiro ke epito a ŋol Maliko.)
Tolimok Yesu Petero tema, “Kinyakak atum kon nakuraro! Itami iyoŋ atemar nyamasi ayoŋ ekopo ŋolo a ŋican ŋolo akainaki ayoŋ Papa kaŋ lo a?”
Apotu ŋasigarya ŋuna a Ŋiromanin ka ekapolon kec ta ŋiketeok Akai ka Akuj ŋulu a Ŋiyudayan kikamut Yesu toena.
Torikosi mono iŋes neni ka Anas, anerae arae Anas ekamuran a Kaipa a ŋolo arae Esacaradoti ŋolo Apolon nooi alokaru a ŋol.
Arae Kaipa sek aris kicoco ŋikarikok ŋulu a Ŋiyudayan atemar, ejok epeikile totwan aŋuna a ŋituŋa.
Kiwuapakis Simoni Petero ka ecekasyoman Yesu. Ayeni Esacaradoti ŋolo Apolon nooi ekasyoman ŋol; aŋun, abu iŋes torukosi ka Yesu tari nenilapat ka akai a ŋina ke Esacaradoti a ŋol,
towuoi Petero alokiŋa alodiye epuke. Toboŋo nai ekasyoman ŋolo ayenen ka Esacaradoti ŋolo Apolon nooi, kisirwor apese ŋina eten epuke, ido yau Petero tooma.
Kiŋit apese ŋin Petero tema, “Meere iyoŋ daŋ epei alokasyomak ke ekile a ŋol a?” Toboŋok Petero tema, “Meere.”
Aŋuna alilimyo akwap, kinokakis ŋiketiyak ka ŋiketeok akim, towua kirikaut. Kiyoto nai Petero akiwuaŋar ka ikes.
Kiŋitiŋit esacaradoti ŋolo apolon Yesu ŋuna a ŋikasyomak keŋ ka ŋuna ka akitatam keŋ.

Toboŋok Yesu iŋes tema, “Erwor ayoŋ lotuŋa daadaŋ, emam ŋakiro ŋuna abu ewua; abu ayoŋ jwi jwi etatam alosinagogae ka alo Kai ka Akuj, aneni ecunanakin Ŋiyudayan daadaŋ. Emam akirot alimu ayoŋ ewuait.
Nyo nai tokona ikiŋisiŋisitor iyoŋ ayoŋ? Kiŋit ŋituŋa ŋulu apotu kiirasi ŋuna abu ayoŋ erwor; eyenete ikes ŋakiro ŋuna abu ayoŋ erwor.”
Ani kedau Yesu alimun ŋakiro ŋun, abu epei alokidiŋ ŋiketeok kibap iŋes tema, “Ikokini iyoŋ irworo neni ke esacaradoti a ŋolo apolon ikoŋina ai?”
Toboŋok Yesu tema, “Ani kalimunit ayoŋ ŋuna aronok, kiteyenik ŋituŋa lu daadaŋ neni abala ayoŋ. Ani kerworit ayoŋ ejok, kaanukiro bo ikibapya iyoŋ ayoŋ?”
Kiyakiya nai Anas Yesu eroko erocitae neni a Kaipa, a ŋolo arae Esacaradoti ŋolo Apolon nooi.
Ariŋa Petero ewuoi iwuaŋa. Kiŋita ŋuluce iŋes temasi, “Meere iyoŋ daŋ epei alokidiŋ ŋikasyomak keŋ a?” Nai topeg Petero ŋun tema, “Meere.”
Abu epito epei ŋolo ke Esacaradoti a ŋolo Apolon nooi, ŋolo arae eyenet ke ekile a ŋolo atubori Petero akit, kiŋit Petero tema, “Pa ekeŋolikinit ayoŋ iyoŋ ka iŋes alomanikor a?”
Topeg nabo Petero ŋun. Ŋinapeipaki toruuni ekokoroit.

Ani taparacu iwali akwap, torikosi ikes Yesu alokai a Kaipa tari kai ŋina apolon ŋina ke ekapolon a Ŋiromanin, a ŋolo anyaritae Pilato. Nyelomasi ŋikarikok ŋulu a Ŋiyudayan tooma akai ŋin, anerae pa acamito ikes amunaar asegis kec aŋuna ka akimuja ŋasuban ŋuna a Paska.
Aŋun, abu Pilato toloma neni ayakasi ikes, kiŋit tema, “Anukiro isitakinitotor iyes ekile lo?”
Toboŋokis ikes temasi, “Kerae nyitiyat ekile lo ŋuna aronok, pa kikipotokinit isua iŋes neni kon.”
Tolimok Pilato ikes tema, “Yaasi iyes ŋilopeyek iŋes, totubokis a Lokisila kus.” Toboŋokis Ŋiyudayan iŋes temasi, “Nyikicamakinit apukan a Ŋiromanin isua akiar ituŋanan.”
(Etiyakinosi ŋun, ikotere kiyookinotor ŋakiro ŋuna alimunit Yesu, itoodiunit epite ŋolo etwania iŋes.)
Toboŋo Pilato kai keŋ ŋina apolon, tonyarau iŋes Yesu, kiŋit tema, “Irae iyoŋ erwosit a Ŋiyudayan a?”
Toboŋok Yesu iŋes tema, “Ilimunit iyoŋ elope ŋakiro ŋun, kori ŋicetuŋa ikilimokinito iyoŋ ŋakiro kaŋ?”
Toboŋok Pilato iŋes tema, “Arae mono ayoŋ Eyudayat ŋolo ayeni ŋun a? Erae ŋikonituŋa ka ŋikonisacaradotin ŋulu apolok ikipotunito iyoŋ neni kaŋ. Nyo isecit iyoŋ?”

Toboŋok Yesu iŋes tema, “Nyerae apukan kaŋ ŋina ka akwap a na. Kerae torae apukan kaŋ ŋina ka akwap a na, kejito ŋikewuapak kaŋ, ikotere nyekepotokinere ayoŋ neni a ŋikarikok a Ŋiyudayan. Nai nyerae apukan kaŋ ŋina a ne.”

Kiŋit Pilato iŋes tema, “Iŋes atemar irae iyoŋ erwosit a?” Toboŋok Yesu iŋes tema, “Iyoŋ ilimu atemar arae ayoŋ erwosit. Aponi ekedoun ayoŋ ka abunit ayoŋ nakwap na aŋuna a ipeibore: akiteyenun ŋuna a kire. Ituŋanan daadaŋ ŋini eyai tooma ŋuna a kire, epupi ŋakiro kaŋ.”
Kiŋit Pilato Yesu tema, “Nyo erae ŋuna a kire?”
Nai erae etal kus alacakin iyes epeimabus ŋolo iitanete iyes apaki ŋina a ŋasuban a ŋuna a Paska. Icamito nai tokona olacak ayoŋ erwosit a Ŋiyudayan a?”
Tocelut ikes temasi, “Mam, meere lo! Ikicamit isua Baraba!” (Arae Baraba ekademanaran.)
Toriko nai Pilato Yesu kibuŋae.
Toyeut ŋisigarya aikit ŋina a ŋikukwa, kiwuakis nakou keŋ, ido kitanapa iŋes elou ŋolo kipura-areŋan.
Potu nai neni keŋ temasi, “Maata erwosit a Ŋiyudayan!” Toloto kibapabapata iŋes.
Toloma nabo Pilato kiŋa, tolimok ŋituŋa tema, “Topupokisi, alosi ayoŋ arikun iŋes neni kus, ikotere toanyuniata iyes atemar nyeryamuna ayoŋ asecit ŋina tubokinet iŋes.”
Tolomu nai Yesu kiŋa enapit aikit ŋina a ŋikukwa anakou keŋ, tonapite elou ŋolo kipurat-areŋan. Tolimok Pilato ikes tema, “Elo ekile ŋolo!”

Ani iŋolikinete ŋisacaradotin ŋulu apolok ka ŋiketeok ŋulu a Ŋiyudayan iŋes, tocelut temasi, “Kibubuk! Kibubuk iŋes lomusalaba!” Tolimok Pilato ikes tema, “Yaasi iyes ŋilopeyek iŋes kibubukis, anerae nyeryamuna ayoŋ adiosecit ŋina tubokinet iŋes.”
Toboŋokis Ŋiyudayan temasi, “Eyakare isua Ekisil ŋolo ebala, itemokino iŋes totwan, anerae ebala, arae iŋes Lokoku ka Akuj.”
Ani iirari Pilato ŋakiro ŋun, tobul nooi.
Toboŋo nabo kai keŋ ŋina apolon, kiŋit Yesu tema, “Ai ibunitor iyoŋ?” Nai nyeboŋok Yesu.
Aŋun, tolimok Pilato iŋes tema, “Nyikisirwori iyoŋ ayoŋ a? Nyiyeni iyoŋ atemar ayakar ayoŋ apedor ŋina lacakinet ka ŋina kibubukinet iyoŋ a?”
Toboŋok Yesu tema, “Kemam iyoŋ apedor aneni kaŋ, kerae nyikiinakinit Akuj. Aŋun, ituŋanan ŋini ekepotokini ayoŋ neni kon, iŋes eyakar asecit ŋina epol akilo ŋina kon.”

Ani iirari Pilato ŋakiro ŋun, kiwar epite ŋolo lacakinet Yesu; nai apotu Ŋiyudayan tocelut nabo temasi, “Ani kilacak iyoŋ iŋes, nyirae iyoŋ ekone ke ekepukan a Roma. Ŋinituŋanan ebala arae iŋes erwosit, erae emoit ŋolo ke epepukan a Roma.”
Ani iirari Pilato ŋakiro ŋun, toriku Yesu kiŋa, kiboikin lokicoloŋ ŋolo ke ekatubon, nakibois ŋina enyaritae “Akititis”, nai a Ŋaburaniyae enyaritae “Gabata”.
Arae ŋisaae ŋikanikapei ŋulu ka apaaran, eriŋa nyedolo ŋasuban ŋuna a Paska. Tolimok Pilato Ŋiyudayan tema, “Kiŋolikisi, erwosit kus!”

Tocelut nabo temasi, “Toar! Toar! Kibubuk iŋes lomusalaba!” Kiŋit Pilato ikes tema, “Icamito iyes ebubuki ayoŋ erwosit kus lomusalaba a?” Toboŋokis ŋisacaradotin ŋulu apolok temasi, “Emam isua erwosit ece, mati ekepukan a Roma bon.”
Kipotok nai Pilato ikes Yesu, kibubukis lomusalaba.
Toloma iŋes kiŋa eryoŋit emusalaba keŋ tari neni enyaritae “Akuulu”, enyaritae a Ŋaburaniyae “Gologota.”
Kibubukis ikes iŋes kaapei ka ŋice ŋiarei, epei lowae ŋolo aloteten ka ŋoloce lowae ŋolo alokedyeny, toyai Yesu kidiŋ.
Kigir Pilato ŋakiro nu kiwuakinae kidiama emusalaba, egiritae ikona: “YESU ŊOLO A NASARET, ERWOSIT A ŊIYUDAYAN.”
Apotu ŋituŋa ŋulu alalak tosyoma ŋakiro ŋun, anerae aapi neni ebubukinitoe Yesu alo Yerusalem, ka anerae egiritae a Ŋaburaniyae, a Ŋalatin ka a Ŋagirik.
Tolimokis ŋisacaradotin ŋulu apolok Pilato temasi, “Nyigir atemar, ‘Erwosit a Ŋiyudayan,’ nai kigir atemar, ‘Ebala ekile lo arae iŋes erwosit a Ŋiyudayan!’ ”
Toboŋok Pilato tema, “Ŋuna adau ayoŋ akigir, adau akigir.”
Ani kedaut ŋasigarya akibubukin Yesu lomusalaba, tolemut ŋilowi keŋ, tokora ŋarwa ŋaomwon, ŋolosigarit tolema atyaket apei. Tolacut tari ekaaso keŋ daŋ, ŋolo etiyaunitae emam ŋakiryamiryamet.

Apotu ŋasigarya kirworikinos make temasi, “Nyikicila elou lo; elamilama oanyuniata ŋini eai.” Etiyakinosi ŋun, ikotere kiyookinotor ŋuna igiritae Nakigireta ebe, “Apotu ikes tokora ŋikaalowi ka apotu kilamilama aŋuna ke ekaaso kaŋ.” Ŋuna apotu ŋasigarya kitiyata ŋun.
Awuasi toto a Yesu ka nakaato keŋ ta Maria aberu a Kileopa kaapei ka Maria Magadalena alokwap emusalaba a Yesu.
Ani iŋolikini Yesu toto keŋ ka ekasyoman ŋolo amina iŋes ewuasi alodiyete emusalaba, tolimok toto keŋ tema, “Toto, toanyuwa lokoku kon lo.”
Tolimok ekasyoman daŋ tema, “Toto kon na.” Ageun apaki ŋin, ya ekasyoman Maria lore keŋ.
Ayeni Yesu atemar erikakin ŋakiro daadaŋ. (Aŋuna ka akisiyookin ŋuna igiritae Nakigireta, abu iŋes tolimu) tema, “Akanyam akure.”
Ayai diyete nen abakule ŋina eleleba epiini ŋolo adadaŋan, kiwuakis ibore ŋini ayabuk, ido toenikis nakitoe ŋina anyaritae Isop, kikyaasi kidiama, kiwuakis nakituk keŋ.
Ani kedau Yesu akimat epiini ŋolo adadaŋan ŋol, tolimu tema, “Erikakin.” Kijuuru, kiridak.

Aŋina araakar apaaran ŋina etemonokinere aŋuna a ŋasuban a Paska, apotu ŋikarikok a Ŋiyudayan kiŋita Pilato tobilae ŋakejen a ŋulu ebubukinitoe ka tolemunae ŋawat alomusalabae, anerae pa acamitae ŋawat eyakasi lomusalabae akoloŋit ŋina a Sabato. (Arae Sabato ŋin ŋina apolon nooi.)
Apotu ŋasigarya toloto, tobila ŋakejen a ŋikilyok a ŋulu ebubukinitoe kaapei ka Yesu. Tobila mono ŋuna a ŋolo esyaunan, tobila nabo ŋuna a ŋoloce daŋ.
Nai ani edolunete ikes neni a Yesu, kiŋolikis kiridak. Aŋun, nyebila ikes ŋakejen keŋ.
Nai kicum esigarit epei ka akwara Yesu losyep; toleleut atipei ŋaokot ka ŋakipi anakicuma.
(Ituŋanan ŋini ete ŋakiro ŋun itiyakin, iŋes abu kisuuda, ikotere iyes daŋ tonupyata. Ŋuna erwor iŋes erae ŋuna a kire ka eyeni atemar erworo ŋuna a kire.)
Apotu ŋakiro ŋun kitiyakin, ikotere kiyookinotor ŋuna igiritae Nakigireta ebe, “Emam akoit keŋ apei daŋ ŋina ebilyo.”
Elimunitoe nabo a Nakigireta a ŋace ebe, “Epote ŋituŋa akiŋolikin ŋolo ecumete ikes.”

Kedaun ŋakiro ŋun, abu Yosepu ŋolo abunit alotaun a ŋolo ka Arimatea, kiŋitak Pilato erae kecamakini iŋes alemun akuwan a Yesu alomusalaba. (Arae Yosepu ekewuapan ŋolo a Yesu, nai pa etoodiuna, anerae akerit iŋes ŋikarikok a Ŋiyudayan.) Tocamak Pilato iŋes, aŋun, tolot iŋes tolema akuwan a Yesu.
Nikodemo daŋ ŋolo aris ekiŋaren kelot nakwaare aanyun Yesu, torukosi ka Yosepu, etiŋit eminae ka ŋamyeta ŋuna akukunyok ŋuna aapiyarito ŋakiloi kec ŋatomoniuni.
Tolemut ŋikilyok ŋul akuwan a Yesu alomusalaba, kilogilogakis anaŋga, kiwosakis akimyet ŋina akukunyon, ikwapei araakar etal ŋolo anuketa Ŋiyudayan ŋikatwak ŋol.
Ayai emanikor diyete neni ebubukinitoe Yesu ka tooma emanikor ŋol, ayai naturukan alyal ŋina kitete, ŋina pa anukakinitae idiotuŋanan.
Ikwaŋina araakar akoloŋit ŋina etemonokinere aŋuna a ŋasuban a ŋuna a Paska ka aŋuna nabo aapiya aturukan ŋin a nen, apotu ikes kiwuakis akuwan a Yesu nen.
Ani taparacu eriŋa akwap iryono, akoloŋit ŋina ke Esabit, tolot Maria Magadalena nalyal. Ani edoli inaa, kiŋolik amoru ŋina agolitere aturukan kelemar nawae alopuke.
Toem nai iŋes neni a Simoni Petero ka ekasyoman ŋoloce, ŋolo amina Yesu, tolimok ikes tema, “Kelemar akuwan ke Ekapolon analyal ka nyikiyeni tari neni kiwuakis ikes iŋes.”
Tonyout nai Petero ka ekasyoman ŋoloce, toloto nalyal.
Toema ikes, nai abu ekasyoman ŋoloce kilany Petero kisyau nalyal.
Tokukokin iŋes, kiŋolik anaŋga eperi a nen, nai nyeloma tooma.
Todolu nai Simoni Petero ŋolo amotuno alokaku, toloma tooma naturukan, kiŋolik anaŋga eperi,
pa erukito ŋina aenikinitae nakou a Yesu ka ŋinace, nai ebilakina aneni keŋ bon.
Abu ekasyoman ŋoloce daŋ ŋolo esyauni nen, toloma tooma aturukan, kiŋolik, ido tonup.
(Akigiret a ŋina abala ebe, itemokino iŋes toyaru alokatwak.)
Toboŋosi nai ŋikasyomak ŋul lorerya kec.
Nai awuoi Maria alokiŋa aturukan kigworo. Ani ekukokin iŋes aripikin aturukan,
kiŋolik ŋimalaikan ŋiarei ŋulu anapito ŋilowi ŋulu akwaŋak iboiyete aneni eperikinitoe akuwan a Yesu. Eboi epei alowae a ŋolo ka akou, epei alowae a ŋolo a ŋakejen.
Kiŋita ŋimalaikan Maria temasi, “Aberu, kaanukiro igworor iyoŋ?” Toboŋok Maria ikes tema, “Egworo ayoŋ, anerae kelemar akuwan ŋina ke Ekapolon kaŋ, ka nyayeni ayoŋ neni kiwuakis ikes iŋes.”
Kedau alimun ŋun, toboboŋ kiŋolik Yesu ewuoi, nai pa ayeni iŋes atemar arae Yesu.

Kiŋit Yesu Maria tema, “Aberu, kaanukiro igworor iyoŋ? Ŋae iwarit iyoŋ?” Abala Maria kori erae ekile ŋol eketen emanikor; aŋun, tolimok iŋes tema, “Ekapolon, ani kerae iyoŋ ilemarit iŋes, tolimokinae neni iwuakinit iyoŋ iŋes, ikotere olot olema.”
Tolimok Yesu iŋes tema, “Maria!” Toboboŋ Maria tolimu a Ŋaburaniyae tema, “Rabbuni!” (Iŋes atemar eketataman.)

Tolimok Yesu iŋes tema, “Nyikitap ayoŋ, anerae eriŋa ayoŋ nyeboŋoro neni a Papa kaŋ; nai tolot, tolimok ŋikaitotoi kaŋ atemar alosi ayoŋ neni a Papa kaŋ, a ŋolo erae Papa kus daŋ; neni ka Akuj kaŋ, a ŋina erae Akuj kus daŋ.”
Tolot Maria Magadalena, tolimok ŋikasyomak a Yesu tema, “Aanyu ayoŋ Ekapolon.” Tolimok nabo ikes ŋakiro ŋuna alimokini Yesu iŋes.

Ataboŋ ŋinapei ŋin, ŋina ke Esabit, atukokina ŋikasyomak a Yesu tooma akai ŋina agolitoe ŋipukei, anerae akuryakito ikes aŋuna a ŋikarikok a Ŋiyudayan. Abu Yesu towo alokidiŋ kec tolimok ikes tema, “Toyai ekisil neni kus.”
Ani kedau alimokin ikes ŋun, kitoodik ikes ŋakan ka esyep keŋ. Tolakaros ŋikasyomak iŋolikinete Ekapolon.
Tolimok nabo Yesu ikes tema, “Toyai ekisil neni kus. Ikwaŋinapei ekeyakitor ayoŋ Papa, ekeyaki ayoŋ iyes daŋ.”
Kedau alimun ŋun, kieŋak neni kec tema, “Kijaasi Etau ŋolo Asegan.
Ituŋanan daadaŋ ŋini isyoniyete iyes ŋasecisya keŋ, isyoniyo, ituŋanan daadaŋ ŋini nyisyoniyete iyes ŋasecisya keŋ, nyisyoniyo.”
Amam Tomas (ŋolo anyaritae Emuut), ŋolo arae epei alokasyomak a ŋulutomon ka ŋiarei, apaki ŋina abunio Yesu neni kec.

Aŋun, tolimokis ŋikasyomak ŋuluce Tomas temasi, “Ikianyu isua Ekapolon.” Nai abu Tomas tolimok ikes tema, “Mati keŋolik ayoŋ ŋapores ŋuna a ŋisumar anakan keŋ, ka ewuak ekimoin kaŋ napores ŋuna a ŋisumar ka ewuak akan kaŋ losyepi keŋ, nyanupi ayoŋ.”
Kelunyar esabit epei, eboiyete ŋikasyomak nabo kaapei, torukito ka Tomas daŋ alokai a ŋina agolol ŋipukei. Totakanu Yesu neni kec tema, “Toyai ekisil neni kus.”
Tolimok nai Yesu Tomas tema, “Kiwuak ekonikimoin ne, kiŋolik ŋakaakan. Torwau akonikan, kiwuak losyepi kaŋ, tojoŋo aŋayaŋayat, nai tonup!”
Tolimok Tomas Yesu tema, “Ekapolon kaŋ, Akuj kaŋ!”
Tolimok Yesu iŋes tema, “Inup iyoŋ, anerae ikiŋolik ayoŋ a? Erereŋ ŋulu enupito pa iŋolikinito!”
Abu Yesu kitiya ŋakujuwuanisya ŋuna alalak iteete ŋikasyomak keŋ, nyigirir ŋakujuwuanisya ŋun daadaŋ lokitaabo lo.
Nai igiritae nu, ikotere tonupyata iyes atemar erae Yesu iŋes erae Kristo, Lokoku ka Akuj, ka alotooma anupit kus iŋes, toryamut akiyar alokiro keŋ.
Kedaun ŋun, abu Yesu totakanu nabo neni a ŋikasyomak keŋ alodiyete anam Tiberia. Abu iŋes totakanu ikonata.
Ayakasi ŋituŋa lu iwapei: Simoni Petero ka Tomas (ŋolo anyaritae Emuut), Nasaniel (ŋolo a Kana anakwap a ŋina a Galileya), kaapei ka ŋidwe a Sebedeo ŋulusapa, ta ŋikasyomak a Yesu ŋice ŋiarei.
Tolimok Simoni Petero ŋuluce tema, “Alosi ayoŋ akisurum ŋikolya.” Temasi ikes, “Apena kaapei.” Apotu nai ikes todoka ataker toloto nanam, nai nyisuruma ikes idiobore akuwar ŋin.
Ani taparacu ereŋuni Kide, towo Yesu alokipetot a ŋolo ka anam, nai nyeyena ŋikasyomak atemar erae Yesu.
Kiŋit Yesu ikes tema, “Ŋidwe, eyai iyes ediokolya a?” Toboŋokis ikes temasi, “Emam.”
Tolimok iŋes ikes tema, “Tocakakisi atibait lowae ŋolo aloteten ataker, iryamunete iyes ŋikolya.” Tocakakis nai ikes atibait, kigaaliut ŋikolya ŋulu alalak, kipiyo akirikin tooma nataker.
Tolimok ekasyoman ŋolo amina Yesu Simoni Petero tema, “Erae Ekapolon!” Ani iirari Petero atemar arae Ekapolon, tonap ŋilowi, anerae alacarit sek iŋes ŋilowi itiyae; toporo anataker nakipi.
Apotu nai ŋikasyomak ŋuluce todolut lokipetot eya nataker, kiriut atibait ileleba ŋikolya, anerae pa alwaka ikes alokipetot a ŋolo ka anam; arae ŋamitae ŋuna aapiyarito amiat.
Ani edolunete ikes lokipetot neni aonon, kiŋolikis akim ŋina etotoleunit, idokokino ŋikolya kidiama ka toya ŋamugati daŋ diyete nen.
Tolimok Yesu ikes tema, “Yautu ŋikolya ŋidi ŋulu igaaliut iyes.”
Tolot Simoni Petero kiriu atibait lokipetot, ileleba ŋikolya, arae ŋikolya daadaŋ amiat ka ŋatomonikan ka ŋiuni; tari aŋuna alalakyata daŋ, nyeŋeda apotis kec atibait.
Tolimok Yesu ikes tema, “Potu kimuja.” Emam tari edio alokasyomak ŋolo abu totitinyik akiŋit iŋes tema, “Ŋae iyoŋ?” Ayenete ikes atemar arae Ekapolon.
Abu nai Yesu tolemu amugati inak ikes, tolemu ŋikolya daŋ tokorak ikes.
Arae atakanikinet a Yesu ŋin ŋina a ŋauni neni a ŋikasyomak keŋ, kedau ayarun alokatwak.

Kedaut ikes akimuj, tolimok Yesu Simoni Petero tema, “Simoni lokoku a Yoana, ikimina iyoŋ ayoŋ akilo neni akaminatar ŋuluce lu a?” Toboŋok Petero tema, “Ee Ekapolon, iyeni iyoŋ atemar akamina ayoŋ iyoŋ.” Tolimok nai Yesu iŋes tema, “Kitan ŋikaalei kaŋ ŋulu meesekin.”

Kiŋit Yesu Simoni Petero akiŋiset ŋina a ŋaarei tema, “Simoni lokoku a Yoana, ikimina iyoŋ ayoŋ a?” Toboŋok Petero tema, “Ee Ekapolon, iyeni iyoŋ atemar akamina ayoŋ iyoŋ.” Tolimok Yesu iŋes tema, “Kiyok ŋikaalei kaŋ ŋulu meesekin.”

Kiŋit Yesu Petero akiŋiset ŋina a ŋauni tema, “Simoni lokoku a Yoana, ikimina iyoŋ ayoŋ a?” Kiyaloloŋ Petero aŋuna abunio Yesu kiŋit iŋes ŋakiŋiset ŋauni ebala, “Ikimina iyoŋ ayoŋ a?” Tolimok nai Petero Yesu tema, “Ekapolon, iyeni iyoŋ ŋakiro daadaŋ, iyeni daŋ atemar akamina ayoŋ iyoŋ!” Tolimok nai Yesu Petero tema, “Kiyok ŋamesekin kaŋ.

Akalimokini ayoŋ iyoŋ kire atemar, ŋina iriŋaakar iyoŋ isorokana, ibu iyoŋ kitemonokin, tonyou tolot neni icamit. Nai ŋina imojoŋi, ikeari iyoŋ ŋakan kon, ikitemok icetuŋanan iyoŋ itoriko neni nyicamit iyoŋ alosit.”
(Alimuni Yesu ŋakiro ŋun kitoodiunia epite ŋolo ebunio Petero atwanare, ido kitopoloo Akuj.) Ani kedau alimun ŋun, tolimok Petero tema, “Kiwuapakinae ayoŋ.”

Ani eboboŋi Petero, kiŋolik ekasyoman ŋolo amina Yesu iwuapunit ikes; arae ekasyoman ŋol ŋolo edunyit Yesu akoloŋit ŋina emujata ikes akimuj ŋina esidyon ŋina ka ataboŋ, iŋes ŋolo abala, “Ekapolon, ŋae ikilukini iyoŋ?”
Ani iŋolikini Petero iŋes, kiŋit Yesu tema, “Ani bo ekile lo?”
Tolimok Yesu Petero tema, “Ani nai kerae acamit kaŋ aesikin iŋes kidoŋ nege tari ŋina aboŋunio ayoŋ, anu ikikamunito iyoŋ? Kiwuapakinae iyoŋ ayoŋ!”

Apotu ŋakiro ŋun kielakin lokasyomak daadaŋ ilereete ebe, nyetwani ekasyoman ŋol jik. Nai pa alimokinit Yesu iŋes atemar nyetwani, nai abala Yesu, “Ani nai kerae acamit kaŋ aesikin iŋes kidoŋ nege tari ŋina aboŋunio ayoŋ, anu ikikamunito iyoŋ?”
Ekasyoman ŋol iŋes erae esuuda a ŋakiro a nu a daadaŋ igirit ŋakiro nu daadaŋ, ka ikiyeni atemar erae ŋuna isuudat iŋes, ŋuna a kire.
Eyakasi ŋakiro ŋace ŋuna alalak ŋuna abu Yesu kitiya, ŋuna ani kerae kigiritetei daadaŋ a ŋapeipei, atami ayoŋ atemar kemam neni kiwuakina ŋikitaaboi anakwap a daadaŋ.
Ekapolon Teopilo: Alokitaabo a ŋolo ke ekiŋaren, egirit ayoŋ ŋiticisyo daadaŋ ŋulu abu Yesu kitiya ka ŋakiro ŋuna etatami iŋes apaki ŋina esyakinia etic keŋ,
akitodol akoloŋit ŋina ayaarere iŋes kidiama nakuj. Ani eriŋa iŋes nyeyaara nakuj, abu kicik Ŋikiyakia keŋ, ŋulu sek aris iŋes keseu alotooma apedor ŋina ke Etau a ŋolo Asegan.
Alotooma ŋirwa ŋatomoniomwon kelunyar atwanare keŋ, totakanu iŋes neni kec alopitesyo a ŋulu alalak a ŋulu etoodiunito kire atemar eyari iŋes; ido tolimok ikes ŋakiro ŋuna ka Apukan ka Akuj.
Apeikoloŋit erukito iŋes ka ikes, kicik iŋes ikes tema, “Nyirotokis alo Yerusalem, nai kidarutu ainakinet ŋina abu ayoŋ okolimok iyes – Etau ŋolo Asegan ŋolo ikiikinit iyes Papa kaŋ.
Anerae ebatisae Yoana a ŋakipi, nai alorwa a ŋidi a ŋulu alokiŋaren, ikibatisao iyes a Etau a ŋolo Asegan.”
Aŋun, kiŋita ikes iŋes temasi, “A Ekapolon, inyakakini iyoŋ ŋirwa lupei lu apukan lotuŋa a Isirael a?”
Tolimok Yesu ikes tema, “Etubunit Akuj Papa ŋirwa ka ŋapakio keŋ. Nyerae ŋuna kus ayenut ŋuna itemokinit iŋes anapedor keŋ.
Nai iryamunete iyes apedor apaki ŋina ebunio Etau ŋolo Asegan neni kus; iruworosi iyes ŋisuudae kaŋ alo Yerusalem, alo Yudaya daadaŋ ka Samaria tari neni isalya akwap.”
Ani kedau iŋes alimun ŋakiro nu, yaarae iŋes kidiama nakuj iteete ikes; torapuwa edou iŋes nyiŋolikis ikes.
Ani eriŋa ikes ireorito kidiama eyaaryo iŋes, apotu ŋikilyok ŋiarei towua alodiye kec, enapito ŋilowi ŋulu akwaŋak kya
temasi, “Ŋikilyok ŋulu alo Galileya, nyo iwuatar iyes kireorito kidiama? Yesu lo ŋolo ayaar nakuj aneni kus, eboŋuni alopite a ŋolopei iŋolikiniata iyes iŋes elosi nakuj.”
Toboŋosi nai ikes alomoru a ŋikito a ŋulu enyaritae Olipa, toloto Yerusalem. Erae emoru ŋol apeikilomita alotaun.

Ani kelomut ikes lotaun, toloto todokasi nagule ŋina ayai kidiama, neni eboiyoto ikes; araakasi ikes Petero, Yoana, Yakobo, Anderia, Pilipo ka Tomas, Batolomayo ka Matayo, Yakobo lokoku ka Alipayo, Simoni ŋolo arae Eseletoit ka Yuda lokoku a Yakobo.
Acunakina ikes daadaŋ kilipeneneete kaapei ka ŋaberu ka Maria daŋ toto a Yesu ta ŋikaitotoi a Yesu.
Kelunyar ŋirwa ŋidikudyo, tocunakin ŋikanupak ŋulu aapikinito amiat ka ŋatomoniarei. Tosodi Petero tonyou kirworik
tema, “Ŋikaitotoi kaŋ, itemokino Ŋakigireta kiyookin lopite ŋolo koloŋ adwaritor Etau ŋolo Asegan anakituk a Daudi. Adwarit iŋes aŋuna a Yuda, a ŋolo etenuni ŋituŋa ŋulu ekamunete Yesu.
Arae iŋes epei alokimar yok, anerae etiyat iŋes daŋ etic lo.”
(Togyel iŋes emanikor a eropit a ŋolo ka aronis a ŋina abu iŋes kitiya. Alomanikor a ŋol, toramakin iŋes, tobwaŋa akook, kiyesunos ŋiboro ŋulu ka akook daadaŋ kiŋa.
Kiirasi ŋituŋa daadaŋ ŋulu aya Yerusalem ŋakiro ŋun, ido tolimokis a aŋajep kec ekiro a emanikor a ŋol “Akel Dama,” iŋes atemar, “Emanikor ŋolo a ŋaokot.” )
“Anerae igiritae lokitaabo ŋolo a Ŋieosyo ebe: ‘Kipasakin akai keŋ koŋin; nyeloma ituŋanan idio akiboi tooma keŋ.’ Igiritae nabo ebe, ‘Kilunyokin ituŋanan ice lotic keŋ.’
“Aŋun, itemokino toseunae epei a ŋikilyok a ŋulu ikirukit ka iwon ŋapakio daadaŋ ŋuna ikirukitor iwon ka Ekapolon Yesu,
ameun apaki ŋina ebatisaa Yoana, akitodol ŋina ayaarere Yesu kidiama aneni yok. Itemokino iŋes oruko ka iwon oruworos ŋisuudae ŋulu ikibala ayaru Yesu alokatwak.”
Aponi nai tolimunoe ŋikilyok ŋiarei: Yosepu ŋolo anyaritae Barisaba (ŋolo arae ekiro keŋ ece Yusito) ka Matia.
Tosodo kilipa temasi, “Ekapolon, iyeni iyoŋ etau a ŋinituŋanan, kitoodikinae tokona isua alokilyok a ŋuluarei a lu ŋolo iseu iyoŋ.
Itemokino iŋes kitiya etic ŋolo ke Ekiyakia, kilunyokin lotic ŋolo aesikini Yuda ŋolo abu tolot neni etemokino iŋes toyai.”
Kilamilama ikes ŋamoru ŋuna egiritae ŋirorwa, kilo ekiro a Matia; toseunae nai iŋes kimorikinae Lokiyakia ŋulutomon ka epei.
Ani edoli akoloŋit ŋina a Pentekoste, acunakina ŋikanupak daadaŋ iwapei.
Tonaŋakin ikes atipei eruye ŋolo esibit ŋolo ke ekuwuam a ŋolo apolon ebuni alokidiama, kiryam tooma akai ŋina aya ikes.
Kiŋolikis nai ikes ŋiboorei ŋulu ekote ŋakimia ielakin pena neni kec a daadaŋ.
Kilelebikin Etau ŋolo Asegan neni kec daadaŋ, togeut akirwor ŋaŋajepa ŋuna agelegelya, ikwaŋina ainakinitor Etau ŋolo Asegan ikes akirwor.
Ayakasi nai nen Ŋiyudayan ŋulu eboiyete alo Yerusalem, ŋulu ainakina neni ka Akuj; aponito ikes alobukui a daadaŋ a ŋulu anakwap.
Ani iirarete ikes eruye ŋol, tocunun asepic a ŋituŋa ŋina alalan, toumokis ikes daadaŋ, anerae ŋinituŋanan alokidiŋ kec apupi Ŋikiyakia irworosi aŋajep keŋ.
Toumokis ikes nooi temasi, “Erae ŋituŋa lu ŋulu irworosi Ŋigalileyan.
Kaanukiro nai ikipupio iwon ikes irworosi ŋaŋajepa yok?
Ikiponit iwon anakwapin a nu: alo Parisia, alo Media ka Elam; alo Mesopotamia, Yudaya ka alo Kapadokia, Ponito ka Asia;
alo Pirigia, Pampilia ka Ijipit ta ŋiwaetin a Libia ŋulu eya diye Kurene. Ikirae iwon ŋice ŋulu alo Roma,

Ŋiyudayan ka ŋulu nyerae Ŋiyudayan ŋulu ikicamu anupit kec. Ikiponit bo iwon ŋice alo Kirete ka Arabia – nai opupete bo iwon daadaŋ ikes irworosi a ŋaŋajepa yok ŋakiro ŋuna ka aumokin ŋuna etiyak Akuj!”
Aŋuna ka aumokinit ka ataaŋaŋ kec, kisyakis akiŋitanar make ebasi, “Anukiro nu?”
Nai tokyenatar ŋice ikes temasi, “Emerasi ŋituŋa lu!”
Abu Petero towua ka Ŋikiyakia ŋuluce ŋulutomon ka epei, tosodi tocelu tema, “Ŋituŋa ŋulu a Yudeya ka iyes daadaŋ ŋulu iboiyete alo Yerusalem, toyenutu nu ka topupokisi ŋakiro kaŋ kojokan!
Nyemerasi ŋituŋa lu ikwaŋina itamakinitotor iyes; eriŋa erae ŋisaae ŋiuni ŋulu ka ataparacu.
Nai erae ŋuna iteete iyes tokona ŋuna erworit ekadwaran Yoel ebala:
‘Ebala Akuj, etiyakini ayoŋ nu alorwa a ŋulu esidyok; eyakikini ayoŋ Etau kaŋ lotuŋa daadaŋ. Edwarete ŋikusidwe ŋulusapa ka ŋulupesur, eanyunete ŋikusisorok ŋatakanikineta ka irujaete ŋikasikou kus.
Kire tari ŋiketiyak kaŋ, ŋikilyok ka ŋaberu, eyakikini Etau kaŋ ŋirwa ŋul, ido todwara.
Etiyakini ayoŋ ŋakujuwuanisya alokidiama ka ŋaumonokineta alokwap: eyakaun ŋaokot ka akim ta apuru ŋina alalan nooi;
isiryonio akoloŋ cuc, ka itereŋio elap puu kikok ŋaokot, eriŋa nyedolo Akoloŋit ŋina apolon nooi ŋina ke Ekapolon.
Ido nai ituŋanan daadaŋ ŋini enyarit ekiro ŋolo ke Ekapolon, eiunio.’

Topupokisi ŋakiro nu, iyes ŋituŋa a Isirael! Arae Yesu ŋolo a Nasaret ituŋanan ŋini eyakuunit Akuj. Abu iŋes kiteyenik ŋakiro neni kus alotooma ŋakujuwuanisya ka ŋaumonokineta ta ŋakitoodikineta ŋuna abu Akuj kitiya alotooma keŋ. Iyenete iyes ŋilopeyek ŋun.
Aris Akuj anacamit ka anaosou keŋ ka alope ketyaku atemar itemokino ikirikokin iyes Yesu ka toara iŋes, anajalakin ŋituŋa ŋulu asecak ibubukinete iŋes lomusalaba.
Nai abu Akuj kiteyaru iŋes alokatwak; tolacu iŋes anapipilu a ŋina ka atwanare, anerae pa apedori atwanare akien iŋes.
Anerae erworit koloŋ Daudi ŋakiro keŋ ebala, ‘Ŋirwa daadaŋ, ete ayoŋ Ekapolon alokiŋaren kaŋ; eyai iŋes nakan kaŋ ŋina aloteten, ikotere nyeryaŋiryaŋakin ayoŋ.
Aŋun, elelyani ekaatau ka ikipuro iyoŋ etoil kaŋ. Ayeni ayoŋ atemar atwani, nai ayakar ayoŋ akigeno;
anerae nyikimyekini iyoŋ ayoŋ anakibois a ŋikatwak, kori nyicamakini iyoŋ eketiyan kon ŋoloseuna ebosi.
Ikitoodik iyoŋ ayoŋ ŋirotin ŋulu elosete nakiyar ka eketelelyani ayoŋ nooi neni ikirukitor ka iyoŋ.’
“Ŋikaitotoi: itemokino ayoŋ ekesileerek iyes ŋakiro ŋuna a papaa yok a Daudi. Abu iŋes totwan ka aponi tonukae, ido eyai alyal keŋ tari tokona ne neni ikiya iwon.
Ayeni Daudi atemar, aris Akuj kikoŋ atemar eturuwori lopapait keŋ epei erwosit, kilunyokin lokicoloŋ keŋ.

Aŋuna araakar Daudi ekadwaran, toyenu ŋuna alosi Akuj akitiyakin alorwa a ŋulu alokiŋaren, kirwor ŋuna ka ayarun a Kristo tema, ‘Nyimyekina Akuj iŋes anakibois a ŋikatwak, nyebosa akuwan keŋ analyal.’
Eteyaru Akuj Yesu ŋolopei ŋol alokatwak ka ikirae isua daadaŋ ŋisuudae ŋulu a ŋakiro a ŋun.

Adau Akuj Papa akitopoloor iŋes, ewuak lowae keŋ ŋolo aloteten ka ainakin iŋes Etau ŋolo Asegan ikwaŋina aris kiikinere; ido ŋuna iteete iyes ka topupete tokona, erae ainakinet ŋina ke Etau a ŋolo Asegan a ŋolo ikibukok Yesu isua.
Anerae nyeloto Daudi nakuj, nai abu tema, ‘Atema Ekapolon neni ke Ekapolon kaŋ, kiboikin teten kaŋ,
akitodol neni ewuakinia ayoŋ ŋimoi kon kwap ŋakejen kon.’
Aŋun, itemokino tokona ŋituŋa a Isirael daadaŋ toyenut atemar, Yesu ŋolo ibubukinete iyes lomusalaba, iŋes abu Akuj kituruwo Ekapolon ka Kristo!”
Ani iirarete ŋituŋa ŋakiro ŋun, tonomosi ŋakiro ŋitai kec, tosodo kiŋita Petero ka Ŋikiyakia ŋuluce temasi, “A ŋikaitotoi, ikikokini tokona isua ai?”
Tolimok Petero ikes tema, “Tokiwa ŋasecisya kus, kibatisae ŋinituŋanan alokidiŋ kus alokiro a Yesu Kristo, ikotere isyoniyo ŋasecisya; ido toryamut ainakinet ŋina ka Akuj – Etau ŋolo Asegan.
Anerae arae akiikinet ka Akuj ŋina kus ka ŋikusidwe ta neni a ŋituŋa a daadaŋ a ŋulu elwaka a ŋulu enyaraunit Ekapolon yok Akuj neni keŋ.”
Kiteyenik Petero ikes ŋakiro ŋuna alalak, kisimukek tema, “Toiunos anakisicanio a ŋina eryamunete ŋituŋa ŋulu aronok ŋulu ka anyamet a na!”
Tonupa ŋituŋa ŋulu alalak ŋakiro keŋ kibatisae, ido kiyatakin lokanupak ŋituŋa ŋulu adolito ŋalipyo ŋauni akoloŋit ŋin.
Torubakis ikes daadaŋ epupete ŋakiro ŋuna etatamete Ŋikiyakia, togeut ikes alosenen natukot ŋina a ŋikanupak akimuj kaapei ka akinumunum Akimuj ŋina ke Ekapolon ta akilipenen.
Etiyasi ŋakujuwuanisya ka ŋaumonokineta ŋuna alalak aneni a Ŋikiyakia, toumokis nai ŋituŋa daadaŋ a ŋun.
Torubakis ŋikanupak daadaŋ erukito ka emorete ŋiboro kec.
Agyelanarete ikes ebari ka ŋiboro kec, tokorakis ŋisiliŋa neni a ŋinituŋanan lopite ŋolo eitanitor iŋes.
A ŋinakoloŋit, apotu ikes torubakis iryamunun kaapei Kai ka Akuj, akimuj kaapei ka akinumunum Akimuj ŋina ke Ekapolon alorerya kec. Amorete ikes akimuj ka alelyan ka arimao;
epurosi ikes Akuj ka tominakinito ŋituŋa daadaŋ ikes. A ŋinakoloŋit, eyatanakini Ekapolon natukot kec ŋulu aiununuyo.
Apeikoloŋit, toloto Petero ka Yoana Kai ka Akuj ŋisaae ŋikanikaomwon ŋulu ka apaaran ŋulu elipeneneere.

Ayai lopuke ŋolo anyaritae “Epuke ŋolo Ebusan” ŋolo ka Akai ka Akuj, ekile ŋolo aŋwalit ŋinapei anakidounet. A ŋinakoloŋit, adakanaryo iŋes lopuke ŋol akilipanar ŋainakineta alotuŋa a ŋulu alomanarete Kai ka Akuj.
Ani iŋolikini iŋes Petero ka Yoana eapikinit alomar Kai ka Akuj, kiŋit iŋes ikes daŋ ainakinet.
Kitekis Petero ka Yoana iŋes, tolimu Petero tema, “Kiŋolikinae isua!”
Kitek nai iŋes ikes ebala kori eyai idiobore aryamuni aneni kec.
Nai tolimok Petero iŋes tema, “Emam ŋisiliŋa ayakar ayoŋ, nai akainakini ayoŋ iyoŋ ibore ŋini ayakar; alokiro a Yesu Kristo a ŋolo a Nasaret, abala ayoŋ iyoŋ, torotok!”
Kikamu Petero iŋes akan ŋina aloteten, kitonyou, towo. Togogoŋioto atipei ŋakejen ka ŋitobolae keŋ;
toporu iŋes kidiama towo, ido torotok tolomasi ka ikes Kai ka Akuj, epori ka ipuro Akuj.
Kiŋolikis ŋituŋa daadaŋ ŋulu aya nen iŋes elosi ka ipuro Akuj.
Ani eyenunete ikes atemar erae iŋes ekile ŋolo sek elipanar “Alopuke a ŋolo Ebusan” a ŋolo ka Akai ka Akuj, tobul ikes daadaŋ, toumokis a ŋakiro a ŋuna kepotu kitiyakinos neni keŋ.
Ani eriŋa ekile ŋol imiidikina neni a Petero ka Yoana aneni anyaritae Ebarasan a Solomon, toumokis ŋituŋa daadaŋ, tomotunos neni aya ikes.

Ani iŋolikini Petero ŋun, tolimok ikes tema, “A ŋituŋa a Isirael, nyo ikituumokinitotor iyes ŋun? Nyo ikiteoto iyes isua esibit erae apedor na ŋina kosi, kori esibit erae aŋuna ekeritere isua Akuj iŋes ikitorotokinio isua ekile lo?

Akuj ŋina atapapaa yok ŋina ka Aburaam, Isaka ka Yakobo, iŋes ainaki eketiyan keŋ Yesu apolou ŋina ka Akuj. Ipotu iyes kipotokis Yesu ŋolopei ŋol neni a ŋikepukak ka toŋero iŋes alokiŋaren Pilato, tari daŋ ketubu Pilato atemar itemokino iŋes tolacakinae.
Arae iŋes ŋolo ka Akuj ka eyookino, nai ipotu iyes toŋero ka kiŋita Pilato alacakin ekaaran.
Ido toara ekainakinan akiyar ŋolo abu Akuj kiteyaru alokatwak. Ikirae isua ŋisuudae ŋulu a ŋakiro a ŋun.
Aŋuna ka anupit ekiro a Yesu, aponi kitaŋaleunoe ekile lo ŋolo iteete ka ŋolo iyenete iyes. Anupit Yesu iŋes ainaki ekile lo aŋaleun kire ikwaŋina iteoto iyes daadaŋ.
“Ŋikaitotoi kaŋ, ayeni ayoŋ tokona atemar pa iyenete iyes ka ŋikepukak kus ŋuna ipotu iyes kitiyata.
Tari kikote neni daŋ, alimunit Akuj koloŋ alorwor a ŋikadwarak a daadaŋ atemar etemokino kisicanae Kristo keŋ ka esiyook Akuj ŋun alorot a lo.
Tokiwa nai, kibelekinos neni ka Akuj, ikotere ikisari iŋes ŋasecisya kus. Kitiyata ŋun, ikotere epote aneni ke Ekapolon ŋarwa ŋuna itogogoŋere ŋitai kus.
Iyakuuni nai iŋes Yesu, ŋolo erae Kristo, ŋolo aseu iŋes aŋuna kus.
Itemokino Kristo kiboi anakuj akitodol apaki ŋina ituruworya Akuj ŋiboro daadaŋ ŋikitet, lopite ŋolo koloŋ alimunitor iŋes alorwor a ŋikadwarak keŋ a ŋulu asegak.
Alimunit Moses ebe, ‘Akuj Ekapolon kus iŋes iyakuuni ekadwaran aŋuna kus, lopite ŋolo ekeyakuunia ayoŋ, elomuni iŋes alotuŋa kus pei. Itemokino iyes kiwuapa ŋakiro daadaŋ ŋuna ikilimokini iŋes iyes.
Ituŋanan daadaŋ ŋini nyiwuapi ŋakiro ŋuna irworo ekadwaran ŋol, etyakaryo alotuŋa a ŋulu ka Akuj, kinyasunae.’
Kire, ŋikadwarak daadaŋ ŋulu erwor ameun aneni a Samuel adwara ŋuna a ŋirwa a lu.

Erae ŋuna kus ŋakiikineta ŋuna ka Akuj ŋuna ekobunete ŋikadwarak keŋ ka imarakina iyes Nacamunet keŋ ikwaŋina alimokinia iŋes Aburaam ebe, ‘Eterereŋi ayoŋ ŋituŋa ŋulu ka akwap daadaŋ aŋuna a ŋiletok kon.’
Aŋun, abu Akuj toseu eketiyan keŋ, kiyaku mono neni kus akiterereŋ iyes; kibelekinos iyes daadaŋ alopitesyo kus a ŋulu aronok.”
Ani eriŋa Petero ka Yoana isirworete ŋituŋa, todolut ŋisacaradotin ka ekapolokiniton ŋiketeok ŋulu ka Akai ka Akuj ta Ŋisadukayon.
Aŋoito ikes, anerae etatamete ka eseraete Ŋikiyakia ŋuluarei ŋul ŋakiro ŋuna ka ayarun alokatwak aŋuna abaakatar ayaru Yesu.
Kikamunae nai ikes, togolokinoe mabus akitodol taparacu, anerae abu towar.
Nai apotu ŋituŋa ŋulu alalak, ŋulu apotu kiirasi ŋakiro a Ŋikiyakia tonupa; toapik ekimar a ŋikilyok ŋalipyo ŋakan.
Ani iwalari, potu ŋikepukak ŋulu a Ŋiyudayan ka ŋikatukok ta ŋiketatamak a Ŋikisila tocunakinos Yerusalem.
Kiryamiryama ikes ka Esacaradoti ŋolo Apolon nooi ŋolo anyaritae Anas ka Kaipa, Yoana, Alekisanda ta ŋice ŋulu arae ŋiyeneta ŋulu ke Esacaradoti a ŋolo Apolon nooi.
Kitowua ikes Ŋikiyakia alokiŋaren Atukot kec, kiŋita temasi, “Ikokinete iyes itiyaete ŋakiro ŋun ai? Apedor ani iyakatar iyes, kori ekiro a ŋae itiyaata iyes ŋakiro ŋun ?”
Toboŋok Petero ŋolo eleleba Etau ŋolo Asegan ikes tema, “Ŋikepukak ŋulu a ŋituŋa ka ŋikatukok!
Ani kikiŋisitae isua nakoloŋit na ŋakiro ŋuna ajokak ŋuna etiyakin neni ke ekaŋwalan ka epite ŋolo etaŋaleunere iŋes,

itemokino nai iyes daadaŋ ka ŋituŋa ŋulu a Isirael daadaŋ toyenut atemar, ewuoi ekile lo alokiŋaren kus eŋale nooi aŋuna ka apedor a ŋina ke ekiro a Yesu a ŋolo a Nasaret. Yesu ŋol, iŋes ŋolo ipotu iyes kibubukis lomusalaba, nai abu Akuj kiteyaru.
Erae Yesu igiritae ŋakiro keŋ Nakigireta atemar, ‘Amoru ŋina koloŋ ipotu iyes ŋikadukok toŋero, iŋes tokona itogogoŋit akai alokoona.’
Emam aiuno aneni a ice a daadaŋ, anerae emam ekiro ece anakwap a daadaŋ ŋolo einit Akuj ŋituŋa, ŋolo epedoryata ŋituŋa aiunor.”
Toumok Atukot iŋolikini atitinyu a Petero ka Yoana, a ŋulu tari pa asyomito ka torae ŋikoŋinae ka toyenut daŋ atemar arae ikes ŋirukitos a Yesu.
Nai ani iŋolikinete ikes ekile ŋolo etaŋaleunio erukito ka Ŋikiyakia, todaun ŋuna elimunete.
Aŋun, kitolomarae ikes a Natukot, kidoŋo ikes atuko make.
Kiŋitas ikes make temasi, “Ikikokini iwon ŋikilyok lu ai? Eyenete ŋituŋa daadaŋ alo Yerusalem atemar etiyata ikes akujuwuanut ileere ka nyikipedori iwon akipeg ŋun.
Nai ani pa kikicamit ibore en kielakin lotuŋa, ecika ŋikilyok lu nyisirwor ikes nabo jik idiotuŋanan alokiro a Yesu.”
Aŋun, tonyaraut nai ikes Petero ka Yoana Natukot, kicika ikes atemar nyirworo kori nyitatama nabo jik alokiro a Yesu.
Nai toboŋokis Petero ka Yoana temasi, “Totubutu iyes ŋilopeyek ŋuna iyookino alokiŋaren Akuj – akiwuap ŋakiro kus kori ŋuna ka Akuj.
Anerae nyeesikinio isua erwor ŋuna ikiŋolik ka ikiira.”
Tosodi Atukot kicik ikes nabo nooi, kimyek nai ikes toloto. Todaun Atukot epite ŋolokisicanet ikes, aŋuna epurotor ŋituŋa daadaŋ Akuj, ikotere ŋakiro ŋuna apotu kitiyakinos;
anerae aŋwalit ameun anakidouno ekile ŋolo etiyakinio akujuwuanut ŋina ka aŋaleun neni keŋ ka adeparito ŋikaru keŋ ŋatomoniomwon.
Ŋinapei alakakinere Petero ka Yoana, toboŋosi ikes neni aya ŋikanupak a Kristo ŋuluce, tolimokis ikes ŋakiro ŋuna alimokinete ŋisacaradotin ŋulu apolok ka ŋikatukok ikes.
Ani iirarete ikes ŋakiro ŋun, kikeut daadaŋ ŋitoilon kec kaapei, kilipa neni ka Akuj temasi, “Ekapolon ka ekasuban nakuj, akwap ka anam ta ŋinibore eyai tooma kec daadaŋ!
Ibu iyoŋ koloŋ alotooma Etau kon kirwor anakituk ke eketiyan kon a papaa kosi Daudi itema, ‘Kaanukiro elemaritotor ŋibukui ŋulu ka akwap? Kaanukiro etukyoto ŋituŋa akitiya ŋakiro ŋuna koŋinae?
Acunakinosi ŋirwosi ŋulu ka akwap ka ŋikepukak iwapei akitepeg Ekapolon Akuj ka ŋoloseuna keŋ.’
Anerae kire alotaun a lo, apotu Erode ka Ponitio Pilato ka ŋibukui ŋulu pa arae Ŋiyudayan ta ŋituŋa ŋulu a Isirael kitepega Yesu, eketiyan kon ŋolo asegan ŋolo ibu iyoŋ kituruwo Messia.
Apotu ikes tocunakinos akitiya ŋakiro daadaŋ ŋuna koloŋ itubuni iyoŋ ka apedor ka acamit kon atemar itiyakin.
Tokona Ekapolon, kiŋolik epite ŋolo ikitukuryaniata ikes isua. Kitepedoroe isua ŋiketiyak kon akirwor ŋakiro kon ka atitinyu a daadaŋ.
Torwaa akonikan, kitaŋaleu ŋituŋa ka kitiya ŋakujuwuanisya ka ŋaumonokineta alokiro ke eketiyan kon Yesu a ŋolo asegan.”
Ani irikakinete ikes akilip, tomaranik akibois ŋina elipyata ikes, kilelebikin ikes daadaŋ Etau ŋolo Asegan, kiserata ŋakiro ŋuna ka Akuj ka atitinyu.
Arae atukot ŋina a ŋikanupak ŋina atami ka anupit ŋakiro ŋapei. Amam tari idio ŋini abala arae ŋiboro keŋ ŋulu keŋ ke elope, nai amorete ikes ŋiboro daadaŋ ŋulu ayakatar.
Kiteyenut Ŋikiyakia ka apedor a ŋina apolon ŋakiro ŋuna ka ayarun ke Ekapolon Yesu, ido kiterereŋ Akuj ikes daadaŋ nooi.
Amam alokidiŋ kec ituŋanan ŋini acanaana, anerae ŋulu ayakatar ŋamanat kori ŋakais, apotu togyelanasi yaut ŋisiliŋa ŋulu agyelanarere,
inakis Ŋikiyakia; tosodi tokorakinae ŋinituŋanan lopite ŋolo ayakar akiitanit keŋ.
Ayai daŋ ekile ŋolo anyaritae Yosepu ŋolo anateker a Lepi ŋolo edounitoe alo Kupuro. Anyarito Ŋikiyakia iŋes Baranaba (iŋes atemar “Ŋolo esimukekinan”)
Togyela iŋes emanikor keŋ, yau ŋisiliŋa inak Ŋikiyakia.
Ayai ekile ŋolo anyaritae Anania ka aberu keŋ Sapira. Togyelasi ikes daŋ emanikor kec ece,
nai abu Anania kiŋadaiya ŋisiliŋa ŋice, toyeni aberu keŋ daŋ; tosodi inak ŋuluce neni a Ŋikiyakia.
Nai tolimok Petero Anania tema, “Anania, kaanukiro imyekinia iyoŋ Satan ilelebikin lotau kon, ido tomodik iyoŋ Etau ŋolo Asegan, aŋuna iwuaya ŋisiliŋa ŋice ŋulu igyelarya iyoŋ emanikor?

Ani eriŋa iyoŋ nyegyelara emanikor ŋol, arae ŋolo kon; nabo ani kigyela, arae ŋisiliŋa ŋulu kon. Kaanukiro nai itubunio iyoŋ akitiya ŋakiro ŋuna ikote ŋun? Nyerae ŋituŋa imodikinit iyoŋ, nai erae Akuj!”
Ani iirari Anania ŋakiro ŋun, topokor, totwan. Tobul ŋituŋa daadaŋ ŋulu eirarete ŋakiro ŋun.
Potu ŋisorok kimuko akuwan keŋ, yaasi kiŋa, tonuka.
Ani elunyar ŋisaae ŋulu aapiyarito ŋiuni, tolomu aberu ka Anania nen pa eyeni ŋakiro ŋuna kepotu kitiyakin.
Tolimok Petero iŋes tema, “Tolimokinae ayoŋ, kerae lu ŋisiliŋa daadaŋ ŋulu iryamunete iyoŋ ka lokile kon igyelarete emanikor.” Toboŋok iŋes tema, “Ee, daadaŋ lu.”

Tolimok Petero iŋes tema, “Kaanukiro iponiata iyoŋ ka lokile kon tocamut akikatakin Etau ŋolo ke Ekapolon? Topupok! Ipupi iyoŋ ŋakejen alopuke a? Erae ŋuna a ŋisorok a ŋulu sek alosito akinuk lokile kon, ikidakarete ikes iyoŋ daŋ kiŋa.”
Atipei, topokor Sapira alokiŋaren Petero, totwan alodiyete ŋakejen keŋ. Ani elomunete ŋisorok toryamut iŋes ketwana, yaasi kiŋa, tonuka diyete ekile keŋ.
Tobul nooi atukot a Ŋikristo ka ŋuluce daadaŋ ŋulu apotu kiirasi ŋakiro ŋun.
Apotu Ŋikiyakia kitiyata ŋakujuwuanisya ka ŋaumonokineta ŋuna alalak alotuŋa. Acunanakin ŋikanupak daadaŋ Kai ka Akuj, tooma Ebarasan a Solomon.
Emam ituŋanan ŋini pa arae ekanupan ŋini abu toŋirik arukit ka ikes, nai etopoloorito ŋituŋa ikes.
Apotu ŋaberu ka ŋikilyok ŋulu alalak tonupa Ekapolon, kiyatakinos lokanupak.
Aŋuna a ŋakiro a ŋuna etiyaete Ŋikiyakia, apotu ŋituŋa yaut ŋikadyakak lorotin, kiperikis lokitaadae ka lojamu, ikotere ani itori Petero nen, min etorube keŋ neni a ŋice kec.
Tosutut ŋituŋa alotaunio a ŋulu edunyasi ka Yerusalem daŋ, yaut ikes ŋikadyakak ka ŋulu ekamunito ŋipyan, kitaŋaleunoe daadaŋ.
Min arakao nooi aŋuna a Ŋikiyakia neni ke Esacaradoti a ŋolo Apolon nooi ka ŋirukitos keŋ ŋulu arae ŋulu ka atukot a ŋina a Ŋisadukayon.
Ido apotu ikes kikamut Ŋikiyakia, kiwuakis ikes mabus iteete ŋituŋa daadaŋ.
Nai ani nakwaare, toŋaa emalaika ŋolo ke Ekapolon ŋikekya ŋulu a mabus, ido yau ikes kiŋa, tolimok ikes tema,
“Toloto Kai ka Akuj, tolimokis ŋituŋa ŋakiro daadaŋ ŋuna ka akiyar a ŋina kitete a na, a ŋina ayau Yesu.”

Kitiyata Ŋikiyakia ikwaŋina alimokinitere: ani taparacu eriŋa elilim, tolomasi Kai ka Akuj, kisyakis akitatam ŋituŋa. Ani edolunete Esacaradoti ŋolo Apolon nooi ka ŋirukitos keŋ, tonyaraut Atukot ka ŋikatukok daadaŋ ŋulu a Isirael iwapei. Kiyakiyasi nai ikes ŋisigarya mabus ayaun Ŋikiyakia.
Nai ani edolete ŋisigarya, torukaut Ŋikiyakia emameete alomabus. Toboŋosi ikes, tolimokis Atukot
temasi, “Aponi isua toryamunae ejera egolol ejok ka ŋisigarya ŋulu eteok ewuasi alokekya. Nai ani eŋaaryo isua, toryamunae emam ituŋanan ayai tooma!”
Ani iirarete ekapolokiniton ŋiketeok ŋulu ka Akai ka Akuj ka ŋisacaradotin ŋulu apolok ŋakiro nu, totaaŋaŋa ikes nooi temasi, “Anu ta etakanunete aŋuna a ŋakiro a nu?”
Bu nabo ituŋanan ice, tolimok ikes tema, “Topupokisi! Ŋikilyok ŋulu iwuakinito iyes mabus, eya tokona Kai ka Akuj itatamete ŋituŋa!”
Toloto ekapolokiniton ŋol ka ŋiketeok ŋulu ka Akai ka Akuj arikun Ŋikiyakia alo Kai ka Akuj. Nai nyikamut ikes Ŋikiyakia ka agogoŋu, anerae akerito atemar kori ikimasete ŋituŋa ikes a ŋamoru.
Ani keyaut ikes Ŋikiyakia, kitowua alokiŋaren Atukot. Tolimok Esacaradoti ŋolo Apolon nooi ikes tema,
“Ikicikit paaran isua iyes nooi atemar, toesikisi akitatam alokiro a lo, nai isiryam iyes ŋakiro ŋuna itatamete Yerusalem daadaŋ ka icamito daŋ areeun atemar pena ŋaokot keŋ nakyes kosi!”
Nai toboŋokis Petero ka Ŋikiyakia temasi, “Itemokino isua opupete Akuj akilo ŋituŋa.
Abu Akuj atapapaa yok kiteyaru Yesu, ŋolo ipotu iyes kibubukis lomusalaba, toara.
Kitopoloo Akuj iŋes, kisiboik lowae ŋolo aloteten keŋ toruwor Ekarikon ka Ekaiunan, ikotere Ŋisirael epedorete akiki, kisyoni Akuj ŋasecisya kec.
Ikirae isua ŋisuudae ŋulu a ŋakiro a ŋun – isua ka Etau ŋolo Asegan, ŋolo einakinit Akuj neni a ŋulu iwuapito ŋakiro keŋ.”
Ani iirari Atukot ŋakiro ŋun, toŋo nooi, kiitan akiar ikes.
Nai tonyou Eparisayot epei a Natukot ŋolo anyaritae Gamaliel. Arae iŋes eketataman a Ŋikisila, ŋolo etopoloorito ŋituŋa daadaŋ. Abu tolimok ŋituŋa ayaar Ŋikiyakia kiŋa adiouriyen;
ido kisirwor ŋituŋa tema, “Ŋituŋa a Isirael, tocoito mono iyes ŋuna icamito akitiyakin lokilyok lu.

Anerae ŋikaru ŋidi ŋulu alunyar, abu Teudas bu itusubuna idiotuŋanan, kiwuapakis iŋes ŋituŋa ŋulu aapikinit ekimar ŋamiae ŋaomwon. Nai aponi toarae iŋes kielaros ŋikewuapak keŋ, tosalut ŋuna etya neni.
Ekaku keŋ, bu Yuda ŋolo arae Egalilayat ŋirwa ŋulu emarere ŋituŋa, kiwuapakis ŋituŋa ŋice iŋes. Nai aponi toarae iŋes daŋ ka kielarae ŋikewuapak keŋ daadaŋ.
Aŋun, anakiro a ŋuna a tokona a nu, akalimokini ayoŋ iyes atemar, kimyekisi ŋikilyok lu make! Toesikisi ikes toloto! Ani kerae lotuŋa eponitotor ŋuna elosikinito kori itiyaete ikes, esalunete.
Nai ani kerae neni ka Akuj eponitotor, nyipedorete iyes akiretakin ikes, acepaki iryamunete atemar itepegete iyes Akuj.” Tocamu Atukot ŋakiro a Gamaliel.
Tonyaraut nai ikes Ŋikiyakia tooma, kibuŋata, ido kicikakis nyirwor nabo alokiro a Yesu, tolakakis ikes toloto.
Tolomasi Ŋikiyakia a Natukot elakara nooi, anerae atamete ikes atemar amaikina ikes aryamun ŋican aŋuna ke ekiro a Yesu.
Torubakis Ŋikiyakia a ŋinakoloŋit itatamete ka elimonorete alo Kai ka Akuj ka alorerya atemar Yesu erae Kristo.

Alorwa a ŋulu eyatakinor ekimar ŋolo a ŋikasyomak a Yesu, kiŋuruŋurakinos Ŋiyudayan ŋulu erworosi Ŋagirik neni a Ŋiyudayan a ŋulu erworosi Ŋaburaniyae. Abasi ŋulu erworosi Ŋagirik ebe nyemitakinitae ŋapuseru kec a ŋinakoloŋit apaki ŋina ekorere akimuj.
Tonyaraut Ŋikiyakia ŋulutomon ka ŋiarei ŋikasyomak daadaŋ temasi, “Nyitemokino isua oesikisi akitatam ŋakiro ŋuna ka Akuj, ido olomakisi akikor akimuj.
Aŋun ŋikaitotoi, toseutu alokidiŋ kus ŋikilyok ŋikanikaarei ŋulu ajokak, ŋulu ileleba Etau ŋolo Asegan ka aosou, ŋulu itemokino oinakisi etic lo.
Nai ericakisi isua akilip ka etic ŋolo ka akitatam ŋakiro ŋuna ka Akuj.”

Tocamu asepic daadaŋ akirot na. Toseut ikes Stepano, ekile ŋolo ayai anupit nooi, ŋolo eleleba Etau ŋolo Asegan. Toseut nabo Pilipo, Prokoro, Nikanor, Timon, Parmena ka Nikolao ŋolo anakwap a ŋina ka Antiokio, ŋolo aris kibelekin toruwor ŋolo alodin a Ŋiyudayan.
Yaasi ŋituŋa ikes neni a Ŋikiyakia, kilipakis Ŋikiyakia ikes ka kidokokis ŋakan nakyes akiterereŋ ikes.
Kielakin nai akirot ka Akuj nen, kiyatakin nooi ekimar a ŋikasyomak alo Yerusalem. Apotu daŋ ŋisacaradotin ŋulu alalak kiwuapa Ŋakiro ŋuna Ajokak, tonupa Yesu.
Kitiya Stepano, ŋolo ainakinit Akuj ajokis ka apedor, ŋaumonokineta ka ŋakujuwuanisya alotuŋa.
Nai kitepega ŋituŋa ŋice iŋes. Arae ikes ŋituŋa ŋulu ke esinagoga a ŋolo enyaritae, “Ŋituŋa ŋulu Elacakina”. Arukito ikes ka ŋulu alo Kurene, Alekisandaria, Cilicia ka Asia.
Nai inak Etau ŋolo Asegan Stepano aosou ŋina pa apedoryata ikes akitepeg, kilouniata iŋes.
Kicocoa nai ikes anakimunono ŋikilyok ŋice alimun atemar, “Ikiira isua Stepano irworo ŋakiro ŋuna a ŋiyany neni a Moses ka neni ka Akuj!”
Kisiguryakis ikes ŋituŋa, ŋikatukok ka ŋiketatamak a Ŋikisila, toporokis iŋes yaasi neni ka Atukot.
Yaut ŋisuudae ŋulu esudete ŋakiro ŋulu abasi, “Nyieŋununui ekile lo erwor ŋuna aronok Kai ka Akuj na ŋina asegan ka Lokisila ŋulu ka Akuj;
anerae ikiira isua iŋes ebala ebe inyasuni Yesu lo ŋolo a Nasaret Akai ka Akuj ka kijulak ŋitalyo ŋulu abu Moses ikiinak iwon!”
Kitekis ŋituŋa daadaŋ ŋulu ka Atukot Stepano, kiŋolikis ereet keŋ ecai ikwa ŋolo ke emalaika.
Kiŋit nai Esacaradoti ŋolo Apolon nooi Stepano tema, “Iyookino ŋakiro ŋuna ikisitakinitere iyoŋ nu a ?”
Toboŋok Stepano tema, “Ŋikaitotoi ka atapapa, topupokisi ŋakiro kaŋ! Abu koloŋ Akuj ŋina ka apolou totakanu neni a papaa yok Aburaam alo Mesopotamia, eriŋa iŋes nyewuoto Aran.
Tolimok Akuj iŋes tema, ‘Towot anakwap kon ka alotuŋa kon, tolot nakwap ŋina eketoodikini ayoŋ iyoŋ.’
Abu nai iŋes towot anakwap a Ŋibabiloniyae, tolot Aran. Ani ketwana papa keŋ, abu Akuj yau Aburaam nakwap ŋina tokona iboiyoto iyes na.
Tari kikote neni, abu Akuj apaki ŋin nyeinak iŋes tari atutubet adio ŋina ka akwap a na; nai kiik iŋes ka ŋiletok keŋ akwap na, tari eriŋa iŋes nyeuruuna idiokoku.
Kirwor Akuj neni keŋ alopite a lo tema, ‘Erikoryo ŋiletok kon nakwap ŋina gela, neni eruworotor ŋipi, kisicanae nooi ŋikaru ŋamiae ŋaomwon.
Nai esicani ayoŋ ŋituŋa ŋulu ka akwap a ŋina eruworotor ikes ŋipi. Ani ekaku, elomunete ikes anakwap a ŋin, potu kilipa neni kaŋ a ne.’

Abu Akuj inak Aburaam Acamunet ŋina arae emacar keŋ akileŋer. Toruwor nai Aburaam papa a Isaka, kileŋer iŋes Isaka kelunyar esabit epei. Ekaku, toruwor Isaka papa a Yakobo, ido touru Yakobo atapapaa yok ŋulutomon ka ŋiarei.
“Torakaakyata atapapaa yok, togyelasi Yosepu Ijipit aruwor epito. Nai arukito Akuj ka Yosepu,
toiu Akuj iŋes alocan a daadaŋ. Inak Akuj iŋes aosou, ido tominak Parao ekepukan a Ijipit iŋes, kituruwo ekapolon ŋolo ka akwap ka ŋirerya keŋ daadaŋ.
Bu nai eron Ijipit daadaŋ ka Kanaan, toryamut ŋituŋa ŋican nooi, toŋopik atapapaa yok akimuj.
Nai ani iirari Yakobo atemar ayai akimuj Ijipit, kiyakiya iŋes ŋidwe keŋ – atapapaa yok akiyakiyaret ŋina ke ekiŋaren.
Ani iyakiyaryo ikes akiyakiyaret ŋina a ŋaarei, kiteyenun Yosepu neni a ŋikaitotoi keŋ ka kiteyenun ateker a Yosepu neni a Parao.
Ekaku, kitowotu Yosepu papa keŋ ka ekal keŋ daadaŋ. Arae ekimar kec ŋatomonikanikaarei ka ŋikan.
Tolot nai Yakobo Ijipit, neni eboiyoto iŋes ka atapapaa yok akitodol ŋina ekarya ikes.
Yaarae ŋawat kec kinyakarae Sekem, kiperikinoe naturukan ŋina koloŋ kegyeli Aburaam alodwe ka Amor a ŋisiliŋa.
“Ani eapuuni apaki ŋinakisiyookinet akiikinet ŋina eikinit Akuj Aburaam, kiyatakin ekimar ŋolo a ŋituŋa yok alo Ijipit, tolalata nooi.
Ekaku, min lokicoloŋ ekepukan ece ŋolo abu kipuka Ijipit. Pa ayeni ekepukan ŋol Yosepu.
Abu iŋes tomodik ateker yok, kitiŋak atapapaa yok acakanar ŋidwe kec ŋulu cicik nariet ikotere etwakyata.
Alorwa a ŋul, aponi kidounoe Moses, ebus iŋes nooi alokiŋaren Akuj; aponi kitanakae iŋes ŋilapyo ŋiuni alore a papa keŋ.
Ani eayo iŋes nariet akiwua, toryamu nakoku a Parao iŋes, ido kitopolou erae lokoku keŋ.
Kitatamae Moses ŋakiro daadaŋ ŋuna ka aosou a ŋina ka akwap a Ijipit, togogoŋior iŋes alorwor ka aloticisyo keŋ.
“Ani edolete ŋikaru a Moses ŋatomoniomwon, kiitan iŋes aanyun ŋituŋa keŋ Ŋisirael.
“Ani elosi iŋes, kiŋolik Ejipitanoit epei ebolyar Esiraelit. Toik Moses Esiraelit, toar Ejipitanoit.
Atami Moses atemar kori eyenete ŋituŋa keŋ atemar esitiyae Akuj iŋes aiun ikes, nai apotu ikes nyeyenut.
Akoloŋit ŋina atupakini, toryamu Moses Ŋisirael ŋiarei ejiete. Kikatak iŋes akisisil ikes ebala, ‘Ŋikilyok, iraakasi iyes ŋikaitotoi, kaanukiro icamitotor iyes awana make?’
Nai abu ekile ŋolo etiji ŋoloce kijuka Moses nawae tema, ‘Ŋae ikituruwori iyoŋ ekosikepukan ka ekatubon ŋakiro kosi?
Icamit iyoŋ akiar ayoŋ daŋ lopite ŋolo bien iarya iyoŋ Ejipitanoit a?’
Ani iirari Moses ŋakiro ŋun, tosi todoki nakwap a Median, neni abunio iŋes kiboiyo, touruunia ŋisapa ŋiarei.
“Tolunyaros nabo ŋikaru ŋatomoniomwon. Totakanu emalaika neni keŋ anamoni a ŋina anoki analoŋisat a ŋina ke emoru Sinai.
Ani iŋolikini Moses arira, toumok, ido tolot akiŋolikin. Toapiya iŋes, kiira etoil ŋolo ke Ekapolon ebala,
‘Ayoŋ Akuj atapapaa kon, Akuj ka Aburaam ka Isaka ta Yakobo.’ Tobul Moses tomaranik, kijuuru pa ecamit akiŋolikin.
Tolimok nai Ekapolon iŋes tema, ‘Tolaca ŋamuk kon, anerae eseg akibois ŋina iwuaar iyoŋ.
Eŋolik ayoŋ kire epite ŋolo iteryamunitere ŋituŋa kaŋ ŋican alo Ijipit. Eira ayoŋ akigworo kec ka abu ayoŋ aiun ikes. Kiira tokona, ekeyakiyari ayoŋ iyoŋ Ijipit.’

“Arae lo Moses ŋolopei apotu Ŋisirael toŋero apaki ŋina aponiata tolimokis iŋes temasi, ‘Ŋae ikituruwori iyoŋ ekepukan ka ekatubon ŋakiro kosi?’ Iŋes pei abu Akuj alope kiyakiya neni kec aruwor ekepukan ka ekalakunan kec, alorwor a emalaika a ŋolo atakanikinit iŋes anamoni.
Abu Moses kiten Ŋisirael, kitiya ŋakujuwuanisya ka ŋaumonokineta alo Ijipit ka ananam a ŋina enyaritae Anam ŋina Areŋan ta analoŋisat ŋikaru ŋatomoniomwon.
Arae lo Moses ŋolo alimokini Ŋisirael tema, ‘Iyakuuni Akuj neni kus ekadwaran ŋolo ikoni ayoŋ, ebuni iŋes alokidiŋ kus pei.’

Arukito iŋes ka asepic ŋina a Ŋisirael, ŋina acunakina naloŋisat. Abu iŋes kirworo ka atapapaa yok ka emalaika daŋ ŋolo erworotor iŋes alomoru Sinai, aneni ejaunia iŋes Ŋakiciketa ŋuna eteyarak, ikikobak iwon.
“Nai apotu atapapaa yok towout akiwuap ŋakiro keŋ. Toŋero ikes iŋes, kiitana aboŋor Ijipit.
Tolimokis ikes Aron temasi, ‘Kitiyakinae isua ŋakujo ŋuna ikirikete isua. Nyikiyeni isua ŋakiro ŋuna kitiyakin neni a Moses a ŋolo ikirikuni isua alo Ijipit.’
Apaki ŋin, iŋes etiyauniata ikes etorube ŋolo a itaok, ido inakis ŋamuronisya nakuj ŋin ka kimomwora aŋuna a ibore a ŋini etiyaunete ikes a ŋakan kec.

Ŋakiro ŋun abunio Akuj tomulenio ikes, kimyek ilipete ŋikacer ŋulu alokidiama, ikwapei igiritere lokitaabo ŋolo a ŋikadwarak ebe, ‘Ŋituŋa a Isirael, ipotu mono iyes iyaut ŋamuronisya ka ŋainakineta neni kaŋ ŋikaru ŋatomoniomwon analoŋisat a?

Kire ipotu iyes kiwuoko eema ŋolo ka akuj a Molok, ka etorube ŋolo ke etop a ŋolo ka akuj kus a ŋina anyaritae Repan, ŋakujo ŋuna ipotu iyes kitiyaut, ido kilipa neni kec. Aŋun, ekeritari ayoŋ iyes toruworos ŋirikon anakwap a ŋina alwanan adepar tari Babilon.’
Ayakatar atapapaa yok analoŋisat Eema ŋolo ka Akiteyenunet atemar arukito Akuj ka ikes. Etiyaunitae iŋes ikwaŋina kelimokinitor Akuj Moses akitiyaun, lopite ŋolo keris kitoodikinere iŋes.

Ani kijaut ŋipapae kec Eema, apotu ikes kaapei ka Yosua yaut iŋes tari nakwap ŋina ekamarete ikes, apaki ŋina eritarya Akuj ŋituŋa ŋulu ka akwap a ŋin aŋuna kec. Kiboi Eema anakwap a ŋin akitodol ŋirwa ŋulu a Daudi.
Abu Daudi tojokyar alokiŋaren Akuj, kilip adukokin akai aŋuna ka Akuj a Yakobo.
Nai arae lokoku keŋ Solomon abu todukok Akai ka Akuj.
“Nyiboyonokin bo Akuj ŋina alokidiama nooi nakais ŋuna edukito ŋituŋa; ikwaŋina elimunitor ekadwaran ebe, ebala Akuj Ekapolon:
‘Erae nakuj ekicoloŋ kaŋ ka erae akwap neni ecakit ayoŋ. Akai ŋina ikoni ai ikidukokinete iyes ayoŋ, ai eyai neni kieŋunet kaŋ?
Meere mono ŋakan kaŋ etiyaunete ŋiboro lu daadaŋ a?’
“Eninik ŋatameta kus nooi! Ikote ŋitai kus ŋulu a ŋituŋa a ŋulu nyenupito Akuj! Nyicamunete iyes akiirar ŋakiro ŋuna ka Akuj! Ikote iyes atapapaa kus, itepegete iyes jwi jwi Etau ŋolo Asegan!
Eyai mono ekadwaran epei daŋ ŋolo apotu atapapaa kus nyisicana a? Apotu ikes toara tari ŋulu adwarete abunore ŋina a ŋolo Iyookino, a ŋolo tokona idaut iyes alukin ka akiar.
Arae iyes ipotu toryamut Ŋikisila ŋulu ka Akuj, ŋulu ayaunete ŋimalaikan; nai nyiricakina iyes ikes!”
Ani iirarete ŋituŋa ŋulu ka Atukot ŋakiro a Stepano, toŋoa ikes nooi, tonyoridido ŋireetin kec aŋuna keŋ.
Nai abu Stepano ŋolo eleleba Etau ŋolo Asegan kireo nakuj, toanyuwa akica ŋina ka apolou a ŋina ka Akuj ka Yesu ewuoi alowae a ŋolo aloteten Akuj.
Tocelu Stepano tema, “Kiŋolikisi! Ete ayoŋ nakuj eŋaara ka Lokoku a Ituŋanan ewuoi alowae a ŋolo aloteten Akuj!”
Nai tocelut ikes nooi, togolo ŋaki a ŋakan kec, kipumakinos daadaŋ iŋes.
