Kitunyasi iŋes kiŋa etaun Yerusalem, tocaka a ŋamoru. Apotu ŋisuudae ŋulu a ŋakiro a ŋun kicikakis ŋilowi kec neni ke esorokit a ŋolo anyaritae Saulo.
Ani erubakinete ikes ecakete iŋes, kilip tema, “Ekapolon Yesu, kijaa etau kaŋ!”
Toryedik nai tocelu a etoil a ŋolo apolon tema, “Ekapolon! Nyimarak asecit na neni kec!” Ani kedau iŋes alimun ŋun, kiridak.
Ayai Saulo nen, kitojokite atwanare a Stepano.
Tonuka nai Stepano ŋikilyok ŋulu ainakina neni ka Akuj, kigworos nooi aŋuna keŋ.
Nai abu Saulo kisyak akinyasun ŋatukon a ŋikanupak; erimit iŋes nakais akiriunun ŋikilyok ka ŋaberu, toen ikes alomabus.
Apotu ŋikanupak ŋulu aponi kielarae tolimonokis Ŋakiro ŋuna Ajokak nakwapin daadaŋ ŋuna apotu ikes toloto.
Tolot epei kec ŋolo anyaritae Pilipo lotaun ŋolo apolon alo Samaria, tolimonok ŋituŋa ŋakiro ŋuna a Kristo.
Ani iirarete ŋasepico ŋakiro a Pilipo ka toanyuwasi ŋakujuwuanisya ŋuna etiyae iŋes, topupokis nooi daadaŋ ŋakiro ŋuna erworo iŋes.
Anerae apotu ŋipyan tolomut alotuŋa a ŋulu alalak iworoete nooi a etoil a ŋolo apolon; kitaŋaleunoe ŋulu alalak ŋulu alilim ŋakoyo ka ŋawat ka ŋulu aŋwalito.
Aŋun, toyakaun alelyan nooi lotaun ŋolo apolon ŋol.
Ayai lotaun ŋol ekile ŋolo anyaritae Simoni, ŋolo sek kitiyae ŋakikukujaeta, ŋolo kebu kituumok ŋituŋa ŋulu ka akwap a Samaria, etusubuna iŋes idiotuŋanan ŋini apolon.
Topupo ŋituŋa daadaŋ iŋes ameun alocaryo tari narwonita ebasi, “Erae ekile lo apedor ŋina ka Akuj ŋina enyaritae ‘Apedor ŋina Apolon.’ ”
Apupete ŋituŋa ŋakiro keŋ, anerae abu iŋes ya apaki ŋina aoyan ituumonokini ikes a ŋakikukujaeta keŋ.
Nai ani enupete ikes Pilipo ŋina alimonokinia Ŋakiro ŋuna Ajokak ŋuna ka Apukan ka Akuj ka ŋuna ka apedor ke ekiro a Yesu Kristo, aponi kibatisae ikes, ŋikilyok kaapei ka ŋaberu.
Abu Simoni daŋ elope tonup, kibatisae. Abu iŋes torubak erukito ka Pilipo; etuumokinito iŋes ŋaumonokineta ka ŋakujuwuanisya ŋuna apolok ŋuna etiyasi.
Kiirasi nai Ŋikiyakia ŋulu ayakasi Yerusalem atemar acamut ŋituŋa ŋulu a Samaria ŋakiro ŋuna ka Akuj, kiyakiyasi ikes Petero ka Yoana neni kec.
Ani edolete ikes, kilipakis ŋituŋa, ikotere eryamunete Etau ŋolo Asegan.
Kibatisatae ikes alokiro ke Ekapolon Yesu bon; ariŋa Etau ŋolo Asegan nyemino tari neni a ipei kec.
Kidokokis nai Petero ka Yoana ŋakan kec neni a ŋikanupak, ido toryamut ikes Etau ŋolo Asegan.
Ani eanyuni Simoni atemar aponi inakinae Etau ŋolo Asegan anakidokokin ŋakan ŋuna a Ŋikiyakia, inak iŋes ikes ŋisiliŋa,
tema, “Inakinae ayoŋ daŋ apedor na, ikotere ani ŋini daadaŋ edokokini ayoŋ ŋakan, toryamu Etau ŋolo Asegan.”
Nai kiŋenyak Petero iŋes tema, “Totwania iyoŋ kaapei ka ŋikonisiliŋa! Itami mono iyoŋ kire atemar ipedori aryamun ainakinet ŋina ka Akuj a ŋisiliŋa a?
Nyimarar iyoŋ ka emam ibore kon eyai lotic lo, anerae nyiyookino etau kon alokiŋaren Akuj.
Aŋun, toki nai aronis kon na, kilip neni ke Ekapolon atemar ani kepedor, kisyoni iŋes ŋuna eya lotau kon.
Anerae ete ayoŋ atemar ileleba arakao neni kon ka ikienit iyoŋ asecit.”
Toboŋok Simoni tema, “Kilipa neni ke Ekapolon aŋuna kaŋ, ikotere nyitiyakin idiobore ŋini ilimu iyoŋ neni kaŋ.”
Ani kedaut Petero ka Yoana akiteyenun ka erwor ŋakiro ke Ekapolon, toboŋosi Yerusalem elimonokinete Ŋakiro ŋuna Ajokak lorerya ŋulu alalak ŋulu a Samaria.
Apeikoloŋit, tolimok emalaika ŋolo ke Ekapolon Pilipo tema, “Tonyou tolot nakan ŋina alo Kwap, lorot ŋolo etiyaar alo Yerusalem, ŋolo itori naloŋisat tari Gasa.”

Tonyou nai Pilipo, tolot. Ayai lorot ŋol ekile ŋolo anakwap a ŋina a Esiopia ŋolo arae ekolup. Apolokinit iŋes ŋisiliŋa daadaŋ ŋulu a Kandace, a ŋina epukat Esiopia. Kelosit sek ekile lo Yerusalem akilip.
Aboŋi iŋes lore apaki ŋin, edokit agaari ŋina erito ŋaŋolei, tosyomi ekitaabo ŋolo ke ekadwaran a Isaya.
Tolimok Etau ŋolo Asegan Pilipo tema, “Tolot nagaari ŋin, kidunya neni keŋ.”
Toem nai Pilipo nagaari, kiira ekile ŋol esyomi ekitaabo ŋolo ke ekadwaran a Isaya, kiŋit tema, “Iyeni iyoŋ apolou a ŋakiro a ŋuna isyomi iyoŋ a?”
Toboŋok iŋes tema, “Ekokini ayoŋ ayenuni ai, erae pa kakalimoki ayoŋ ituŋanan idio?” Tonyaraiya nai iŋes Pilipo adokar nagaari, kiboikin ka iŋes.
Ŋakiro ŋuna asyomi ekile ŋol a Nakigireta ikes nu: “Ikwa amesek ŋina erikoryo akiŋol kori ikwa ililiŋia imesek alokiŋaren ekatubon ŋajul keŋ, nyelimuno iŋes adiokirot.
Alotooma akitiditeuna keŋ, aponi kitiyae ŋuna nyeriyan neni keŋ. Ŋae elimori ŋuna a ŋiletok keŋ, anerae alemar akiyar keŋ anakwap.”
Kiŋit ekile ŋol Pilipo tema, “Tolimokinae kare, ŋae irworor ekadwaran, iŋes pei elope kori ituŋanan ice?”
Kirworik nai Pilipo, togeu a Nakigireta a ŋunapei a ŋun, tolimonok iŋes Ŋakiro ŋuna Ajokak ŋuna a Yesu.
Ani elosete ikes alorot, todolo neni ayakasi ŋakipi, ido tolimok ekapolon ŋol Pilipo tema, “Kiŋolik, ŋakipi nu! Nyo ekeretakini ayoŋ akibatisao?” [
Tolimu Pilipo tema, “Ani kinupit iyoŋ a ekonitau a daadaŋ, ipedori akibatisao.” Toboŋok iŋes tema, “Anupit atemar erae Yesu Kristo Lokoku ka Akuj.”]
Kitowuo iŋes agaari, torukosi iŋes ka Pilipo kidiŋ ŋakipi, kibatisa Pilipo iŋes.
Ani elomunete ikes anakipi, ya Etau ŋolo ke Ekapolon Pilipo, nyiŋolik nabo ekapolon iŋes. Nai tolot lore keŋ elelyani.
Totakanu nai Pilipo aneni enyaritae Asotus, elimonokini Ŋakiro ŋuna Ajokak lotaunio daadaŋ tari neni adolyo Kaisaria.
Nai ariŋa Saulo emunikinit akitukuryan ka akiar ŋikasyomak ŋulu ke Ekapolon Yesu. Abu iŋes tolot neni ke Esacaradoti a ŋolo Apolon nooi

akiŋit ŋabaruwae ŋuna itoodiunito atemar ecamakinitae iŋes alosit losinagogae ŋulu alo Damasko, ikotere ani keryamu ituŋanan idio ŋini enupit Kristo, ekile kori aberu, kikama ikes, toen ya Yerusalem. (Anyaritae daŋ ŋikewuapak a Kristo, “Ŋulu ke Erot.”)
Ani eapiyari iŋes Damasko, toŋesun atipei akica anakuj, kinuaku neni ayai iŋes.
Kimasar iŋes kwap, kiira etoil ebala neni keŋ, “Saulo, Saulo! Kaanukiro ikisicanitor iyoŋ ayoŋ?”
Kiŋit Saulo tema, “Ŋae iyoŋ Ekapolon?” Toboŋok etoil tema, “Arae ayoŋ Yesu ŋolo isicanit iyoŋ.
Nai tokona, tonyou toloma lotaun itolimokin ŋuna itemokino iyoŋ kitiya.”
Towua ŋikilyok ŋulu arukito ka Saulo kililiŋa cek; apupete ikes etoil, nai nyeanyuwasi idiotuŋanan.
Tonyou Saulo alokwap, nai ani eŋaari ŋakonyen keŋ, nyiŋolik idiobore. Aŋun, torikosi ikes iŋes tooma Damasko.
Ya iŋes ŋirwa ŋiuni emudukana, pa imuji kori emasi.
Ayai Damasko ekasyoman a Yesu ŋolo anyaritae Anania. Tonyara Ekapolon iŋes anatakanikinet tema, “Anania!” Toboŋok iŋes tema, “Ekapolon, ayoŋ lo.”
Tolimok Ekapolon iŋes tema, “Tonyou tolot lorukude ŋolo enyaritae, ‘Erukude ŋolo Idiiri,’ kiŋitu alokai a Yuda ekile ŋolo alo Taso, ŋolo enyaritae Saulo. Ilipi iŋes.
Aanyu iŋes anatakanikinet ekile ŋolo enyaritae Anania, ebuni akidokokin ŋakan neni keŋ, ikotere ekienyunia nabo.”
Toboŋok Anania tema, “Ekapolon, akalimonokis ayoŋ ŋituŋa ŋulu alalak ŋakiro ŋuna ke ekile a ŋol ŋuna aronok nooi, ŋuna etiya iŋes lokanupak kon alo Yerusalem.
Abu iŋes Damasko ka apedor a ŋina eryamunit iŋes alosacaradotin a ŋulu apolok, akikam daadaŋ ŋulu enyarito ekiro kon.”
Nai tolimok Ekapolon Anania tema, “Tolot, anerae erae iŋes eketiyan kaŋ ŋoloseuna, ŋolo iteyenuni ekiro kaŋ lobukui ŋulu nyerae Ŋiyudayan ka lorwosi kec ta lotuŋa ŋulu a Isirael.
Etoodikini ayoŋ elope iŋes etyae ŋolo a ŋican a daadaŋ a ŋulu itemokino iŋes toryamu aŋuna ke ekiro kaŋ.”

Torotok nai Anania, toloma kai. Kidokok ŋakan neni keŋ tema, “Lokaato Saulo, ekeyakuu ayoŋ Ekapolon Yesu, ŋolo abu totakanu neni kon alorot apaki ŋina ibunio iyoŋ. ekeyakuu iŋes ayoŋ, ikotere tokienyu iyoŋ nabo, ikilelebikin Etau ŋolo Asegan.”
Atipei toraraun ibore ŋini ekoni ŋakabebekwa a ekolya anakonyen a Saulo, tokienyu iŋes nabo.
Tonyou nai iŋes, kibatisae. Kimuj iŋes, ido togogoŋu akuwan keŋ.
Kisyak iŋes atipei alimonokin alosinagogae ŋakiro a Yesu ebala, “Erae Yesu Lokoku ka Akuj.”

Toumokis daadaŋ ŋulu apupete iŋes, kiŋitiŋitas make temasi, “Meere mono ekile lopei lo esicani alo Yerusalem ŋulu anyarito ekiro lo a? Nyebunit ba ca iŋes akitiya ŋunapei a ne – akikamar ikes akiya neni a ŋisacaradotin a ŋulu apolok a?”
Nai togogoŋior nooi apiiryanut a Paulo analimonokin keŋ, alopite a ŋolo etoodiunia atemar Yesu iŋes erae Kristo; kitataaŋaŋ Ŋiyudayan ŋulu alo Damasko.
Ani kelunyarosi ŋirwa ŋulu alalak, totukut Ŋiyudayan akiar Saulo;
nai abu Saulo toyenu ŋuna atukosi ikes. Kirojo ikes ŋikekya ŋulu ke etaun apaaran ka akuwar, ecamito akiar iŋes.
Nai apotu ŋikasyomak keŋ nakwaare yaasi iŋes kisitoro loole ŋolo ka arwatata, kiyooliyosi iŋes kwap a ebukit.
Bu Saulo Yerusalem, kikatak akiruk ka ŋikasyomak a Yesu, nai tokera ikes daadaŋ iŋes, anerae pa anupito ikes atemar erae iŋes ekasyoman kire.
Nai ya Baranaba iŋes Lokiyakia. Tolimok ikes epite ŋolo keanyunia Saulo alorot Ekapolon, ŋolo abu kirwor neni keŋ ka epite ŋolo kelimonokinia Saulo alo Damasko alokiro a Yesu pa ekuryana.
Aŋun, toruko Saulo ka ikes alo Yerusalem, tolimonok a nen daŋ alokiro ke Ekapolon pa ekuryana.
Kirwor iŋes ka topeganakin daŋ ka Ŋiyudayan ŋulu erworosi Ŋagirik, nai ewarito ikes akiar iŋes.
Ani eyenunete ŋikaitotoi ŋun, yaasi ikes iŋes Kaisaria, kitoloto lotaun ŋolo anyaritae Taso.
Arae epite ŋol abunio akinapakin lokanupak ŋulu alo Yudeya, Galileya ka Samaria. Abu Etau ŋolo Asegan kitogogoŋ ka kisimukek ŋikanupak, kiyatakin ekimar kec, kiboiyoto ekerito Ekapolon.
Kimaniman Petero akwap ŋin daadaŋ, tolot daŋ aanyun ŋituŋa ŋulu ka Akuj ŋulu aya Lidda.
Toryamu iŋes a nen ekile ŋolo anyaritae Aenea, ŋolo kebu ya ŋikaru ŋikanikauni eperi alokitaada, aŋuna alilimiyoritotor ŋakoyo kaapei ka akuwan keŋ.
Tolimok Petero iŋes tema, “Aenea, ikitaŋaleu iyoŋ Yesu Kristo, tonyou, topetak ekitaada kon.” Atipei, tonyou Aenea.
Toanyuwasi ŋituŋa daadaŋ ŋulu aya Lidda ka Saron iŋes eŋale; kibelekinos, tonupa Ekapolon.
Ayai Yoppa akanupan ŋina anyaritae Tabisa. (Anyaritae ekiro keŋ a Ŋagirik Dorka, iŋes atemar “Agete.”) Etiyae iŋes ŋuna ajokak akiŋaranakin ŋikulyak.
Apaki ŋin, abu iŋes todyakakin, totwan. Kilotasi ikes akuwan keŋ, kiperikis nagule ŋina alokidiama.
Keris ŋikasyomak kiirasi atemar ayai Petero Yoppa, ido aŋuna aapiya Lidda alo Yoppa, kiyakiyasi ikes ŋikilyok ŋiarei akimaima iŋes temasi, “Okoe, kiwonyu neni kosi atipei.”

Torukosi nai Petero ka ikes. Ani edoli, yaarae nagule ŋina ayai kidiama. Awuasi ŋapuseru daadaŋ alodiyete Petero, kigworos ka kitoodikis iŋes ŋikiteiteyo ka ŋikotyo ŋulu kitiyauni Tabisa eriŋa erukito ka ikes.
Kitoloma Petero ikes daadaŋ kiŋa. Toryedik kilip, toboboŋ neni aperyo akuwan tema, “Tabisa, tonyou!” Toŋaa iŋes ŋakonyen keŋ, ani iŋolikini iŋes Petero, tonyou, kiboikin.
Ya Petero akan, kitonyou iŋes. Tonyarau nai iŋes ŋikanupak ka ŋapuseru kipotok Tabisa eyari neni kec.
Toyenunae ŋakiro nu alo Yoppa daadaŋ, tonupa ŋituŋa ŋulu alalak Ekapolon.
Kiriya Petero ŋirwa ŋulu alalak alo Yoppa, iboi aneni a Simoni, a ŋolo emanyimanyi ŋilowi a ŋityaŋ.
Ayai Kaisaria ekile ŋolo anyaritae Kornelio, ŋolo apolokinit atutubet a ŋasigarya a Roma ŋina anyaritae “Ajore a Italia.”
Arae iŋes ekile ŋolo ainakina neni ka Akuj, ŋolo akerit ekal keŋ daadaŋ Akuj. Epotonori iŋes lokulyak ŋainakineta ŋuna alalak, kilipenenee iŋes Akuj ŋirwa daadaŋ.
Akoloŋit apei eapikini ŋisaae ŋikanikaomwon ŋulu ka apaaran, toanyuwa iŋes atakanikinet, kiŋolik emalaika ŋolo ka Akuj ileere ebunit neni keŋ, tolimok iŋes tema, “Kornelio!”
Kitek Kornelio emalaika ekuryanit, kiŋit tema, “Ekapolon, nyo?” Toboŋok emalaika iŋes tema, “Acamu Akuj akilip kon ka ŋainakineta kon lokulyak ka ikitamu iŋes iyoŋ.
Tokona kiyakiya ŋikilyok ŋidi Yoppa, tonyaraut Simoni ŋolo erae Petero.
Iboi iŋes alore a Simoni, a ŋolo emanyimanyan ŋilowi a ŋityaŋ. Eyai ere keŋ diyete anam.”
Ani kelot emalaika ŋolo erworo neni keŋ, tonyarau Kornelio ŋiketiyak keŋ ŋiarei ka esigarit ŋolo ainakina neni ka Akuj, ŋolo arae epei alokidiŋ ŋulu eyokiyete iŋes.
Kedau alimokin ikes ŋakiro daadaŋ ŋuna apotu totakanut, kiyakiya ikes Yoppa.
Akoloŋit ŋina atupakini eriŋa ikes eya lorot toapiyarete Yoppa, tolot Petero akilip nagule ŋina alokidiama. Aapikinit ŋisaae ŋikanikapei ŋulu ka apaaran.
Tonyam akoro Petero kiitan ibore ŋini nyamat; ani eriŋa itemonokinio akimuj, toanyuwa iŋes atakanikinet.
Toanyuwa iŋes nakuj eŋaara ka iyooliunitoe kwap ibore ŋini ekoni anaŋga ŋina apolon, iyooliunitoe kwap alocileta a ŋuluomwon.
Aya nanaŋga ŋin ŋityaŋ daadaŋ egelegelya, ŋulu alyatok ka ŋikyeny daŋ.
Tolimok etoil iŋes tema, “Petero, tonyou, toar, tonyam!”
Nai tema Petero, “Ekapolon, mam! Anerae nyenyama ayoŋ ŋinapei idiobore ŋini ikitaleo kori ŋini nyeseg.”
Kirworik nabo etoil neni keŋ tema, “Ibore ŋini etesegu Akuj, nyitemokino iyoŋ ibala nyeseg.”
Kitiyakin ŋun ŋakitiyakinet ŋauni, ido kinyakarae ibore ŋin nakuj atipei.
Ani eriŋa Petero etaaŋaŋi etamatamae apolou ŋina ka atakanikinet a ŋin, keris ŋikilyok ŋulu eyakuunit Kornelio kiŋitut ere a Simoni ka awuasi apaki ŋin alopuke.
Tonyaras ikes iŋitasi erae keyai Simoni ŋolo erae Petero nen.
Ani eriŋa Petero etamatamae jik ŋuna ka atakanikinet, tolimok Etau ŋolo Asegan iŋes tema, “Simoni! Ikiitanito iyoŋ a ne ŋikilyok ŋiuni.
Aŋun, tonyou todoka kwap. Nyiŋayaŋaya arukor ka ikes, anerae ayoŋ elope eyakuunit ikes.”
Todoka nai Petero kwap, tolimok ŋikilyok ŋuluuni tema, “Ayoŋ iŋes ŋolo iitanito iyes. Anukiro iponitotor iyes?”

Toboŋokis ikes temasi, “Kornelio, ekapolokiniton ŋasigarya, iŋes ikiyakuunit isua. Erae iŋes ekile ŋolo ajokan, ŋolo iyookino ka ekerit iŋes Akuj. Ekerito Ŋiyudayan daadaŋ iŋes. Alimokini emalaika ŋolo ka Akuj iŋes anyarare iyoŋ bu kai keŋ, ikotere kiira iŋes ŋuna ilimuni iyoŋ.”
Tonyaraiya Petero ŋikilyok tooma, topero kai keŋ. Akoloŋit ŋina atupakini, torukosi iŋes ka ikes kaapei ka ŋikaitotoi ŋice daŋ ŋulu alo Yoppa.
Todolo ikes Kaisaria akoloŋit ŋina atupakini. Edarito Kornelio kaapei ka ŋiyeneta keŋ ta ŋikonei Petero.
Ani elomari Petero kai, kisiryam Kornelio iŋes toramakin nakejen keŋ, kilip neni keŋ.
Nai kikeu Petero iŋes tema, “Tonyou, anerae ayoŋ daŋ arae ituŋanan pei.”
Todolu Petero tooma kai eriŋa irworosi ka Kornelio, toryamu ŋituŋa ŋulu alalak ecunakina.

Tolimok ikes tema, “Iyenete iyes ŋilopeyek epite ŋolo italeere ituŋanan ŋini Yudayat akipeyokin kori arukit ka ituŋanan ŋini gela. Nai eketoodik Akuj ayoŋ atemar nyitemokino abala idiotuŋanan erono kori nyeseg.
Aŋun, ani akaomunio ayoŋ, abu nyawou. Eŋita nai ayoŋ ŋakiro ŋuna ikinyaritotor iyes ayoŋ.”

Toboŋok Kornelio tema, “Ŋirwa ŋiuni ŋulu alunyarosi, elipi ayoŋ alokai kaŋ ŋisaae ŋikanikaomwon ŋulu ka apaaran – arae esaa lopeilo. Apaki ŋinapei ŋin, onaŋakin ekile ŋolo anapit ŋilowi ŋulu amilimilete ewuoi alokiŋaren kaŋ.
Kirworik iŋes tema, ‘Kornelio, eira Akuj akilip kon ka atamu daŋ ŋainakineta kon lokulyak.
Aŋun, kiyakiya ŋikilyok Yoppa toryamut Simoni ŋolo erae Petero. Iboi iŋes alore a Simoni a ŋolo emanyimanyan ŋilowi a ŋityaŋ. Eyai ere keŋ diyete anam.’
Aŋun, abu ayoŋ atipei eyaki ŋikilyok aomun iyoŋ, ka ajokyar ibu iyoŋ. Ikiya tokona isua daadaŋ ne kiŋaren Akuj, akiirar ŋuna daadaŋ adau Ekapolon akicikakin iyoŋ.”
Togeu Petero erwor tema, “Tokona ayenu ayoŋ kire atemar nyetyakatyakat Akuj ŋituŋa;
nai ecamuna aneni keŋ ituŋanan ŋini ekerit iŋes alobukui a daadaŋ, kitiyae ŋakiro ŋuna iyookino.
Iyenete iyes ŋakiro ŋuna abu iŋes kiyakik Isirael – alimonokin Ŋakiro ŋuna Ajokak ŋuna ke ekisil alotooma Yesu Kristo, ŋolo erae Ekapolon a daadaŋ.
Iyenete iyes ŋakiro ŋuna aponi kiserae anakwap a ŋina a Yudeya a daadaŋ, ageun alo Galileya kedau Yoana alimonokin ŋuna ke ebatisimu keŋ.

Iyenete iyes epite ŋolo aseunia Akuj Yesu ŋolo a Nasaret, inak Etau keŋ ka apedor. Abu iŋes kirim itiyae ŋuna ajokak ka kitaŋaleununu ŋulu daadaŋ ayakasi napedor ŋina a Satan, anerae arukito Akuj ka iŋes.
Ikirae isua ŋisuudae ŋulu a ŋakiro a daadaŋ a ŋuna etiyat iŋes anakwap a Ŋiyudayan ka alo Yerusalem. Apotu nai Ŋiyudayan kibubukis iŋes lomusalaba, toara.
Nai abu Akuj kiteyaru iŋes kelunyarosi ŋirwa ŋiuni, kitatakanu iŋes eyari.
Nyitatakanuna iŋes lotuŋa daadaŋ, nai neni kosi make a ŋulu aris Akuj kikiseu aruwor ŋisuudae. Isua ikipotu emuja ka omata daŋ ka iŋes, kedau ayarun alokatwak.
Abu nai iŋes ikicikaki isua alimonokin Ŋakiro ŋuna Ajokak ka akiteyenun lotuŋa atemar erae iŋes ewuakin aruwor ekatubon a ŋulu eyarete ka ŋulu atwak.
Iteyenunito ŋikadwarak daadaŋ aŋuna keŋ atemar, ŋini daadaŋ enupi Yesu, isyoniyo ŋasecisya keŋ alokiro a Yesu.”
Ani eriŋa Petero irworo ŋakiro ŋun, min Etau ŋolo Asegan lotuŋa daadaŋ ŋulu apupete ŋakiro ŋun.
Toumokis ŋikanupak ŋulu arae Ŋiyudayan, ŋulu arukunete ka Petero, a ŋuna ainakinia Akuj Etau keŋ tari lotuŋa ŋulu pa arae Ŋiyudayan.
Anerae apupete ikes ŋituŋa ŋul irworosi ŋaŋajepa ŋuna agelegelya ka ipurosi Akuj. Tolimu Petero tema,
“Aryamut ŋituŋa lu Etau ŋolo Asegan ikwaŋina aryamunere iwon daŋ. Epedori nai idiotuŋanan akiretakin ikes anakibatisao a ŋakipi a?”
Aŋun, tolimu iŋes atemar kibatisae ikes alokiro a Yesu Kristo. Kiŋita nai ikes Petero akiboi ka ikes ŋirwa ŋidi.
Kiirasi Ŋikiyakia ka ŋikanupak ŋulu alo Yudaya daadaŋ atemar kecamut ŋituŋa ŋulu pa arae Ŋiyudayan daŋ ŋakiro ŋuna ka Akuj.
Aŋun, ani elosi Petero Yerusalem, kitepega iŋes Ŋiyudayan ŋulu eitanito kileŋerae ŋituŋa ŋulu nyerae Ŋiyudayan temasi,
“Kaanukiro ilosyo iyoŋ lotuŋa ŋulu nyileŋeritae, akimuj ka ikes?”
Nai kisyak Petero alimonokin ikes ŋakiro daadaŋ ereunit a ŋapeipei tema:

“Apeikoloŋit eriŋa ayoŋ elipi alotaun a ŋolo enyaritae Yoppa, abu oanyuwa atakanikinet. Eŋolik ibore ŋini ekoni anaŋga ŋina apolon, iyooliunitoe anakuj kwap alocileta a ŋuluomwon, bu towo alodiyete kaŋ.
Abu eŋolik kojokan, oanyuwa ŋityaŋ ŋulu ka ariet, ŋulu alyatok ka ŋikyeny.
Eira etoil ebala neni kaŋ, ‘Petero, tonyou, toar, tonyam!’
Nai otema ayoŋ, ‘Ekapolon, mam! Anerae nyenyama ayoŋ ŋinapei idiobore ŋini italeo kori ŋini nyeseg.’
Nai kirworik nabo etoil anakuj tema, ‘Ibore ŋini etesegu Akuj, nyitemokino iyoŋ ibala nyeseg.’
Kitiyakin ŋun ŋakitiyakinet ŋauni, ido kinyakarae nai ibore ŋin nakuj.
Apaki ŋinapei, todolunete ŋikilyok ŋiuni, ŋulu eyakuunitae neni kaŋ alo Kaisaria kai ŋina ayai ayoŋ.
Okolimok ayoŋ Etau ŋolo Asegan arukor ka ikes pa aŋayaŋayat. Orukosi daŋ ayoŋ ka ŋikaitotoi ŋulukanikapei lu, tolotoi kai a Kornelio.
Ikitatamik iŋes isua epite ŋolo keanyuwaritor iŋes emalaika ewuoi alokai keŋ ebala, ‘Kiyakiya ŋikilyok Yoppa, tonyaraut Simoni ŋolo erae Petero.
Ikilimokini iŋes iyoŋ ŋakiro ŋuna iunor iyoŋ kaapei ka ekal kon daadaŋ.’
Ani ageuni ayoŋ erwor, min Etau ŋolo Asegan neni kec, lopite ŋolo aminio neni yok anageunet.
Otamu nai ayoŋ ŋakiro ŋuna ke Ekapolon ŋina abaakar, ‘Abu Yoana kibatisa a ŋakipi, nai ikibatisao iyes a Etau a ŋolo Asegan.’
Ani nai keinakinit Akuj ikes ainakinet ŋina ikoni ŋina abu ikiinak iwon apaki ŋina anupere Ekapolon Yesu Kristo, karae nai ayoŋ ŋae ekatakini akiretakin Akuj?”
Ani iirarete ikes ŋun, tojoŋoto apega. Kipuro Akuj temasi, “Ainaki nai Akuj ŋulu nyerae Ŋiyudayan daŋ apaki ŋina ekiyata, toyara!”
Toloto ŋikanupak ŋulu aponi kielarae aŋuna ka akisicanio a ŋina atakanuni kelunyar atwanare a Stepano, todolo Poenikia, Kupuro ka Antiokio. Kitatama ikes Ŋakiro ŋuna Ajokak neni a Ŋiyudayan make.
Nai apotu ŋikanupak ŋice ŋulu arae ŋulu alo Kupuro ka Kurene toloto Antiokio, kirworo tari lotuŋa ŋulu pa arae Ŋiyudayan, tolimonokis ikes Ŋakiro ŋuna Ajokak ŋuna ke Ekapolon Yesu.
Ayai apedor ŋina ke Ekapolon neni kec, kibelekinos ka tonupa ŋituŋa ŋulu alalak Ekapolon.
Todolo ŋakiro nu natukot ŋina a ŋikanupak a Yesu alo Yerusalem, ido kiyakiya atukot Baranaba alosit Antiokio.
Ani edoluni iŋes ka iŋolikini epite ŋolo kebunio Akuj kiterereŋio ikes, tolakar iŋes. Kicikak ikes arubakin anupit Ekapolon a ŋitai kec a daadaŋ.
Arae Baranaba ekile ŋolo ajokan, ŋolo eleleba Etau ŋolo Asegan ka anupit. Kiyatakin nooi ŋituŋa, potu neni ke Ekapolon.
Tolot nai Baranaba Taso akiwarit Saulo.
Ani eryamuni, yau iŋes Antiokio. Yaasi ikes ekaru daadaŋ iryamiryameneneete ka ŋikanupak, kitatama daŋ ŋituŋa ŋulu alalak. Arae Antiokio esyakinere anyarare ŋikasyomak atemar Ŋikristo.
Alorwa a ŋul, aponeneete ŋikadwarak alo Yerusalem tari Antiokio.

Tonyou epei alokidiŋ kec ŋolo anyaritae Agabo, todwar ka apedor a ŋina ke Etau a ŋolo Asegan atemar ebuni eron ŋolo apolon nakwap daadaŋ. Abu nai eron ŋol bu apaki ŋina araakar Klauda ekepukan a Roma.
Totyakut ŋikasyomak a Yesu atemar itemokino ŋinituŋanan alokidiŋ kec tolemu alopite a ŋolo apedorya alemun idiobore ŋini kiŋarakinet ŋikanupak alo Yudaya.
Kitiyata ikes ŋun, kiyakiyasi Baranaba ka Saulo yaasi ŋisiliŋa, inakis ŋikatukok ŋulu ka atukot a Ŋikristo alo Yudeya.
Ŋirwa ŋulupei, togeu erwosit Erode akikam ŋice alokidiŋ ŋikanupak ecamit akisican ikes.
Abu iŋes toar Yakobo lokaato keŋ a Yoana ka atum.
Ani eanyuni iŋes atemar ajoikinito ŋakiro ŋun Ŋiyudayan, abu kikamu Petero daŋ. (Atakanunete ŋakiro nu apaki ŋina enumunumere ŋasuban ŋuna a ŋamugati a ŋuna emam ŋakinyalet kec.)

Ani kedau iŋes akikamun Petero, kijukak mabus, kipotok losigarya ŋulu atyakitae ŋatyaket ŋaomwon, ŋinatyaket ŋisigarya ŋiomwon. Acamit Erode aŋaun iŋes kelunyar Paska, ido kisitakinae alokiŋaren ŋituŋa.
Aŋun, aponi togoloe Petero alomabus, nai elipete Ŋikristo nooi Akuj aŋuna keŋ.

Nakwaare nyiwalara akoloŋit ŋina acamitor Erode akisitakin Petero alokiŋaren ŋituŋa, ajotoe Petero alokidiŋ ŋisigarya ŋiarei, toenitetei iŋes a ŋiriko a ŋiarei. Toyakas daŋ ŋisigarya ŋulu eteok lokekia a mabus.
Atipei, totakanu emalaika ŋolo ke Ekapolon, kinuaku akica ejera. Totap emalaika eseket a Petero, kiiŋiiŋak kitekienyu, tolimok tema, “Tonyou atipei!” Tolacakinos ŋiriko anakan keŋ atipei.
Tolimok nai emalaika iŋes tema, “Tonap ŋilowi ka ŋamuk.” Kitiya Petero ŋun. Tolimok emalaika iŋes tema, “Tonap ekoti kon, ikiwuapak ayoŋ.”
Kiwuapak nai Petero iŋes kiŋa mabus. Pa ayeni iŋes atemar ŋuna etiyae emalaika erae ŋuna a kire; atami iŋes atemar kori ete atakanikinet.

Ani kedepasi ikes ŋisigarya ŋulu eteok ŋulu tanyan ka ŋulu atupakinete, todolo lopuke ŋolo a ŋasuwa ŋolo ecorosiyarit Yerusalem. Toŋaar epuke bon, tolomasi ikes kiŋa. Tomekis ikes erukude ŋolo ke etaun epei, atipei toŋopiya nai emalaika.

Toyenu nai Petero ŋuna kepotu kitiyakinos neni keŋ tema, “Ayenu ayoŋ kire tokona atemar Ekapolon iyakuunit emalaika keŋ aiun ayoŋ anapedor a ŋina ke Erode ka anakiro a daadaŋ a ŋuna acamito Ŋiyudayan akitiya.”
Ani kileereto ŋakiro nu aneni keŋ, tolot kai a Maria a toto a Yoana a ŋolo arae Mariko, neni acunakina ŋituŋa ŋulu alalak ilipete.
Ani ikoŋikoŋokini Petero epuke ŋolo alokiŋa, bu aketiyan ŋina anyaritae Roda akisirwor ŋini ekoŋikoŋi.
Ani eyeni iŋes etoil a Petero, tolakari nooi nyeŋaa mono epuke, nai toem tolimok ŋituŋa atemar ewuoi Petero alokiŋa.
Tolimokis ŋituŋa iŋes temasi, “Ikibilerit iyoŋ!” Nai torubak iŋes ebala ebe erae kire. Toboŋokis ikes temasi, “Erae emalaika keŋ.”
Nai torubak Petero ikoŋikoŋi epuke. Ani eŋaarete ikes, kiŋolikis iŋes toumokis.

Kikia iŋes akan keŋ akisililiŋ ikes, ido kitatamik ikes epite ŋolo ayaunia Ekapolon iŋes alomabus. Tolimok iŋes ikes tema, “Tolimokisi nugu neni a Yakobo ka lokaitotoi.” Torotok nai iŋes, tolot iwace.
Ani iwalari, kiguryakinos nooi ŋisigarya aŋuna kepotu kitiyakinos neni a Petero.

Abu Erode tolimu atemar toripiripai nooi ŋakiro a Petero, nai nyeryamut ikes iŋes. Aŋun, abu kiŋitiŋit ŋisigarya ŋulu eteok mabus, ido tolimu atemar toarae ikes. Tolot nai Erode alo Yudaya tari Kaisaria, kiboi aina ŋirwa ŋidi.

Aŋoikinit Erode ŋituŋa ŋulu a Tiro ka Sidon. Potu nai ŋituŋa ŋul kaapei neni keŋ. Ani kedaut ikes akitacamun Blasto ŋolo arae eketiyan ke Erode, ŋolo ekinyomitae ŋakiro kec, kiŋita ikes Erode akisil ka ikes; anerae arae nakwap ŋina epukat Erode aryamununuya akwap kec akimuj.
Ani edoli akoloŋit ŋina aseunit Erode akiryamakinor ka ikes, tonap ŋikeelowi ŋulukipukaet, kiboikin lokicoloŋ ŋolo ka apolou, ido kirwor lotuŋa.
Tocelut ŋituŋa temasi, “Irworo iŋes erae akuj, meere ituŋanan!”
Apaki ŋinapei, kitedyakak emalaika ŋolo ke Ekapolon Erode toramakin kwap, anerae abu iŋes kimyek ŋituŋa itopoloorito iŋes erae akuj, pa etopoloorit iŋes Akuj ŋina a kire. Tonyama ŋikur iŋes, totwan.
Nai torubak akirot ŋina ka Akuj iyata ka tokeikin akwap.
Ani kedaut Baranaba ka Saulo etic kec ŋolo eyakitere ikes, toboŋut alo Yerusalem potu Antiokio, erukito ka Yoana ŋolo erae Mariko.

Ayakasi ŋikadwarak ka ŋiketatamak neni a Ŋikristo a ŋulu alo Antiokio. Araakasi ikes Baranaba ka Simeon ŋolo arae Niger (iŋes atemar ŋolokiryonon), Lukio ŋolo abunit alo Kurene, Manaen ŋolo kepolounete kaapei ka erwosit Erode ta Saulo.
Ani ilipete ikes neni ke Ekapolon ka kikanyete, tolimok Etau ŋolo Asegan ikes tema, “Kimyekisi Baranaba ka Saulo kitiyata etic ŋolo anyaritor ayoŋ ikes.”
Ani kedaut ikes akikany akimuj ka kilipete, kidokokis ŋakan kec neni a Baranaba ka Saulo, kiyakiyasi ikes.
Aŋun, kedau Etau ŋolo Asegan akiyak Baranaba ka Saulo, toloto ikes Seleukia; a nen, todoka ameeli toloto loculat ŋolo enyaritae Kupuro.
Ani edolete inaa, tolomasi lotaun ŋolo enyaritae Salamis, kiserata ikes ŋakiro ŋuna ka Akuj alosinagogae a Ŋiyudayan. Arukito ikes ka Yoana ŋolo arae Mariko, ŋolo eŋarakinit ikes.
Ani kedaut ikes atubor aloculat, todolo lotaun ŋolo enyaritae Papos. Toryamut ikes a nen ekekukujan ŋolo anyaritae Ba-Yesu, ŋolo arae Eyudayat, torae daŋ ekadwaran ŋolo alyokonon.
Arae iŋes ekone ke ekepukan a Papos a ŋolo anyaritae Serugo Paulo. Arae Serugo Paulo ekile ŋolo aoson. Tonyaraiya iŋes Baranaba ka Saulo neni ayai iŋes, anerae acamit akiirar ŋakiro ŋuna ka Akuj.
Nai abu ekekukujan Elimas (epite ŋol anyaritotor Ŋigirik Ba-Yesu ŋol), ŋolo acamit akitooliyor ekepukan ananupit ŋakiro ŋuna ka Akuj, kitepeg ikes.
Nai abu Saulo, ŋolo daŋ anyaritae Paulo ŋolo eleleba Etau ŋolo Asegan, kitek ekekukujan,

tolimu tema, “Iyoŋ lokoku a Satan! Iyoŋ emoit ŋolo ka akiyookino a daadaŋ! Ileleba iyoŋ ŋamodyanakineta ŋuna egelegelya ka aronis! Nyijoŋoenene mono iyoŋ akilocenen ŋakiro ŋuna ke Ekapolon ŋuna a kire, kituruwo alyokonu a?

Kiira! Ikisicani tokona Ekapolon iyoŋ. Imudukani iyoŋ ka nyiŋolikini akica ŋina ka akoloŋ mono.” Ŋolopeikiro, tonaŋakin Elimas ilwacikini ŋakonyen keŋ kiriokyata cuc, kisyak akitwap iwarit idiotuŋanan ŋini ikamuni akan keŋ, toriko.
Ani iŋolikini ekepukan ŋuna apotu kitiyakinos, tonup, anerae abu iŋes toumok nooi aŋuna ka akitatam a ŋina a ŋakiro a ŋuna ke Ekapolon.
Torotokis nai Paulo ka ŋirukitos keŋ ka ameeli alo Papos, potu lotaun Periga ŋolo anakwap a Pampilia, neni abunio Yoana Mariko toesikinia ikes toboŋo Yerusalem.
Torotokis nai ikes alo Periga, todolo lotaun Antiokio ŋolo anakwap a Pisidia. Ani akoloŋit ŋina a Sabato, toloto ikes losinagoga, kiboikinos.

Ani kesyomi ekitaabo ŋolo a Ŋikisila a Moses ka ŋakigireta ŋuna a ŋikadwarak, kiyakikis ŋikapolokinitok esinagoga ikes akirot ebasi, “Ŋikaitotoi, ani keyai iyes akirot ŋina isimukekini ŋituŋa, tolimutu.”
Aŋun, tonyou Paulo kikia akan keŋ akisililiŋ ikes, tolimok tema, “Ŋituŋa a Isirael ka iyes ŋulu ikerito Akuj, topupokisi!
Abu Akuj ŋina a ŋituŋa a lu a Ŋisirael toseu atapapaa yok, kipitu ikes apaki ŋina ayakatar Ijipit. Anapedor keŋ a ŋina apolon, abu yau ikes alo Ijipit.
Todaŋ iŋes ikes ŋikaru ŋatomoniomwon analoŋisat.
Abu iŋes kilou ŋakwapin ŋakanikaarei alo Kanaan, ido inak ŋituŋa keŋ akwap a ŋituŋa a ŋul, kituruwo ŋina kec.
Apotu nu daadaŋ yaasi ŋikaru ŋamiae ŋaomwon ka ŋatomonikan ameun apaki ŋina aponiata ikes alo Ijipit. “Ekaku a ŋun, abu Akuj inak ikes ŋikatubok akitodol apaki ŋina a Samuel ke ekadwaran.
Kiitana nai ikes erwosit, ido inak Akuj ikes Saulo lokoku a Kis, a ŋolo ka ateker a Benjamin, aruwor erwosit kec ŋikaru ŋatomoniomwon.

Ani kelema Akuj Saulo, kilunyok Daudi aruwor erwosit kec. Kiteyenu Akuj nu aŋuna a Daudi: ‘Aanyu ayoŋ atemar erae Daudi, lokoku a Yese ekile ŋolo elelyania etau kaŋ; itiyakini iŋes ŋuna daadaŋ acamit ayoŋ iŋes kitiya.’
Ayau Akuj aloletok a Daudi Ekaiunan ŋolo a Ŋisirael, ŋolo erae Yesu, ikwaŋina aris iŋes kiikinia.
Ani eriŋa Yesu nyebuno, aris Yoana kelimonoki ŋituŋa a Isirael daadaŋ atemar etemokino ikes tokiwa ŋasecisya kec, kibatisae.

Ani eapuuni Yoana akirikakin akitatam keŋ, tolimok ŋituŋa tema, ‘Itamete iyes atemar ŋae ayoŋ? Nyarae ayoŋ ŋolo idarito iyes. Emam, nai ekaku kaŋ, ebuni iŋes ŋolo nyapedori ayoŋ tari alacun ŋamuk keŋ.’
“Ŋikaitotoi, ŋiletok ka Aburaam ka iyes ŋuluce ŋulu ikerito Akuj. Erae neni yok eyakuun ŋakiro ŋuna ka aiuno a na!
Apotu ŋituŋa ŋulu a Yerusalem ka ŋikarikok kec nyeyena Yesu, kori nyiirasi ŋakiro ŋuna a ŋikadwarak ŋuna esyomeneneo a ŋinakoloŋit a Sabato. Tari kikote nen, apotu kisiyookis ŋun, toara iŋes.
Tari ŋina pa aryamuniata ikes ŋakiro ŋuna etemokino totubokinere iŋes atwanare, apotu ikes tolimokis Pilato atemar toarae iŋes.
Ani kedaut ikes akisiyookin ŋakiro daadaŋ ŋuna egiritae aŋuna keŋ, apotu tolemut akuwan keŋ alomusalaba, kiperikis nalyal.
Nai abu Akuj kiteyaru iŋes alokatwak
ka abu iŋes ŋirwa ŋulu alalak totakanu eyari neni a ŋulu arukunete ka iŋes alo Galileya tari Yerusalem, ŋulu tokona erae ŋisuudae keŋ alotuŋa.
Ikiinunit tokona isua iyes Ŋakiro ŋuna Ajokak,

atemar ŋakiro ŋuna eikinit Akuj atapapaa yok, esiyook tokona aneni yok a ŋulu ikirae ŋiletok kec aŋuna eteyarunia Yesu. Ikwaŋinapei igiritere tooma Eete ŋolo a ŋiarei ebe: ‘Irae iyoŋ Lokoku kaŋ; aruwor ayoŋ Papa kon nakoloŋit na.’
Elimorit Akuj anakiro a nu atemar eteyaruni iŋes Yesu alokatwak, nyebosi jik, ebe: ‘Akainakini ayoŋ iyoŋ ŋarereŋisyo ŋuna asegak, ŋuna a kire ŋuna eikinit ayoŋ Daudi.’
Elimunit Daudi daŋ alotooma Eete ece ebe: ‘Nyimyekini iyoŋ eketiyan kon ŋolo asegan ebosi.’
Nai kire abu Daudi totwan, kedau akitiya ŋuna acamit Akuj iŋes kitiya ananyamet keŋ, tonukae diyete atapapaa keŋ, ido tobos.
Nai ŋolo abu Akuj kiteyaru alokatwak, abu nyebos.
Aŋun ŋikaitotoi, itemokino iyes toyenut atemar alotooma Yesu, iserao neni kus ŋakiro ŋuna ka akisyon ŋasecisya.
Alotooma keŋ, ŋinituŋanan enupi, elacakinio anasecit a daadaŋ a ŋina pa apedorete Ŋikisila a Moses alacakin iŋes.
Tocoito nai nyetakanut neni kus ŋuna elimunito ŋikadwarak ebasi:
‘Kiirasi! Iyes ŋikajamuwanarak ŋakiro ŋuna ka Akuj! Toumonokisi, totwaka! Anerae alosi ayoŋ akitiyakin alorwa kus ibore ŋini nyinupete iyes jik tari daŋ kikilimok iyes idiotuŋanan!’ ”
Ani erotokinete Paulo ka Baranaba alosinagoga, kiŋitakis ŋituŋa ikes alimokin ikes nabo ŋakiro ŋun akoloŋit ŋina a Sabato ŋina atupasi ka ŋin.

Ani kielarosi ŋituŋa alosinagoga, totupakis Ŋiyudayan ŋulu alalak kaapei ka ŋulu acamunito anupit ŋina a Ŋiyudayan, Paulo ka Baranaba. Apotu lu kisirworo ikes ka kitogogoŋo ikes arubakin anajokis a ŋina ka Akuj.
Akoloŋit ŋina a Sabato ŋina atupakini, adikino ŋituŋa daadaŋ isunyunosi alotaun akiirar ŋakiro ŋuna ka Akuj.
Nai ani iŋolikinete Ŋiyudayan ŋasepico, min arakao nooi neni kec, kitepega erwor a Paulo ka kiyanya iŋes.

Kirworo nai Paulo ka Baranaba neni kec pa ekuryanito temasi, “Arae neni kus mono etemokino akirot ŋina ka Akuj tolimonokinae. Nai ikwapei iŋeryoto iyes ŋakiro nu ka itamete atemar nyemaikina iyes aryamun akiyar ŋina nyedaun, tokona elosyo isua lotuŋa ŋulu nyerae Ŋiyudayan.
Anerae ŋuna ikilimok Ekapolon isua akitiya ikes nu: ‘Eketuruwo ayoŋ iyes akica ŋina a ŋulu nyerae Ŋiyudayan, ikotere iyaunete iyes aiuno nakisaleta ŋuna ka akwap.’ ”
Ani iirarete ŋulu pa arae Ŋiyudayan alokidiŋ kec ŋakiro ŋun, tolakaros, kipuro Akuj aŋuna ka Akirot keŋ. Tonupa daadaŋ ŋulu aseunitae aryamun akiyar ŋina nyedaun.
Tokeikin ŋakiro ŋuna ke Ekapolon akwap ŋin daadaŋ.
Nai, apotu Ŋiyudayan kitutuko ŋaberu ŋuna apolok ŋuna ainakina neni ka Akuj ka ŋikarikok ŋulu ke etaun. Togeut ikes akisican Paulo ka Baranaba, kiritasi ikes anakwap kec.
Totwakis ŋikasyomak apuwa anakejen kec neni kec, kitoodiu nen atemar esecito ikes, ido toloto Ikonio.
Nai tari kikote nen daŋ, apotu ŋikasyomak ŋulu edoŋete Antiokio tolelyana, kilelebun Etau ŋolo Asegan neni kec.
Alo Ikonio, toloto Paulo ka Baranaba lopite ŋolopei sek, tooma esinagoga a Ŋiyudayan. Kirworo ikes a nen alopite a ŋolo abu kitunup Ŋiyudayan ŋulu alalak ka ŋulu pa arae Ŋiyudayan ŋakiro a Yesu.
Nai apotu Ŋiyudayan ŋulu awounito akinup kiguryakis ka kicocoa daŋ ŋituŋa ŋulu pa arae Ŋiyudayan akitoroniyar ŋikanupak.

Aŋun, kiboiyoto Ŋikiyakia a nen apaki ŋina aoyan, kirworos ŋakiro ŋuna ke Ekapolon pa ekuryanito. Abu Ekapolon kiteyenu ebe erae ŋuna a kire ŋakiro ŋuna erworosi ikes, aŋuna ainakinia ikes apedor ŋinakitiyaet ŋakujuwuanisya ka ŋaumonokineta.
Nai atyakatyaka ŋituŋa ŋulu ke etaun; ariito ŋice ka Ŋiyudayan, toriito ŋice ka Ŋikiyakia.
Totukut nai ŋulu pa arae Ŋiyudayan ka Ŋiyudayan kaapei ka ŋikarikok kec akibuŋa ka akicak Ŋikiyakia a ŋamoru.
Ani eyenunete Ŋikiyakia ŋakiro ŋun, tosiwa toloto Listra ka Derube, lotaunio ŋulu ka akwap a Likonia ka nakwapin ŋuna erikaunito.
Tolimonokis ikes Ŋakiro ŋuna Ajokak lotuŋa aina.
Ayai Listra ekile ŋolo aŋwalito ŋakejen; aŋwalit iŋes ŋinapei anakidounet ka pa arotonokini jik.
Apupi iŋes Paulo irworo. Kitek Paulo iŋes, ani keanyuwa atemar eyakar anupit akitaŋaleuno,
tolimu a etoil a ŋolo apolon tema, “Tonyou, towo kitenar!” Tokuraun ekile, torotok.
Ani iŋolikinete ŋasepico ŋakiro ŋuna abu Paulo kitiya, tocelut a Ŋalikoniae temasi, “Kepotu ŋakujo neni yok esibito ŋituŋa!”
Tomaikis ikes Baranaba ekiro ŋolo enyaritae Seus, tomaikis Paulo ekiro ŋolo enyaritae Eremes, anerae arae ekerworon ŋolo apolon.
Yau esacaradoti ŋolo ka akuj a ŋina anyaritae Seus a ŋina ayai akai keŋ kiŋaren etaun, ŋimoŋin ka ŋatur lokekia ŋulu ke etaun, anerae acamito iŋes ka ŋituŋa aarakin amuronot Lokiyakia.
Ani iirarete Baranaba ka Paulo ŋakiro ŋun, tociliciliyasi ŋilowi kec, toema tooma nasepico a ŋituŋa iworoete ebasi,

“A ŋikilyok, kaanukiro itiyaata iyes nu? Isua daŋ ikirae ŋituŋa ikwa iyes! Ikiyaunit isua Ŋakiro ŋuna Ajokak neni kus, ikotere kibelekinos anakujo a ŋuna koŋinae neni ka Akuj a ŋina eyari. Iŋes erae Akuj ŋina asubi kidiama ka akwap, anam ka ŋiboorei daadaŋ ŋulu eyakasi tooma kec.
Ananyameta a ŋuna amunyarosi, abu Akuj tocamak ŋakwapin akitiya ŋuna acamito.

Tari kikote nen, itoodiunit iŋes jwi jwi akiteyenunet ŋina ka ayakau keŋ aloboro a ŋulu ajokak, a ŋulu itiyae iŋes; ikiinunui iŋes akiru alokidiama ka ŋapakio ŋuna elemeneneere; ikisimuji iŋes iyes ka ikitalakanari iyes.”
Ani tari kirwor Ŋikiyakia ŋakiro ŋun, pa apatana ikes akiretakin ŋasepico aarakin ikes amuronot.
Nai aponito nen Ŋiyudayan alo Antiokio ka Ikonio, kicocoiyasi ikes ŋasepico, kitiriwo lowae kec; ido kimasamasata Paulo a ŋamoru, kiriyasi kiŋa etaun etamete atemar kori atwana.
Nai ani etukokinosi ŋikanupak neni keŋ, tonyou iŋes, toboŋo toloma lotaun. Akoloŋit ŋina atupakini, tonyout iŋes ka Baranaba, toloto Derube.
Tolimonokis Paulo ka Baranaba Ŋakiro ŋuna Ajokak alo Derube. Ani kedaut aryamun ŋikanupak ŋulu alalak, toboŋosi Antiokio, kitoro Listra ka Ikonio.
Kitogogoŋo ikes ŋikanupak, kisimukekis arubakin ananupit. Kitatama ikes ŋikanupak ebe, “Itemokino iwon etoro locan ŋulu alalak, eriŋa nyelomara Napukan ka Akuj.”
Toseut nai Paulo ka Baranaba ŋikatukok a ŋinatukot a Ŋikristo, ŋulu epolokinete ikes. Alotooma ŋakilipeta ka akikany akimuj, apotu Ŋikiyakia kicikakis ikes neni ke Ekapolon, a ŋolo anupito ikes.
Ani kiryam ikes akwap ŋina a Pisidia, potu neni anyaritae Pampilia.
A nen, tomora mono Ŋakiro ŋuna Ajokak alotaun a ŋolo anyaritae Periga, toloto nai ŋolo anyaritae Atalia.
A nen, todoka ikes ameeli, toboŋosi Antiokio, etaun ŋolo ayai Siria, neni ecikakinitae ikes anajokis a ŋina ka Akuj aŋuna ke etic a ŋolo tokona adaut ikes akirikakin.
Ani edolunete ikes Antiokio, tocunakis ŋikanupak, tolimokis ikes ŋakiro daadaŋ ŋuna abu Akuj kitiya aneni kec ka epite ŋolo abunio Akuj toŋaarya erot ŋolo enupyata ŋituŋa ŋulu nyerae Ŋiyudayan.
Kiboiyoto ikes apaki ŋina aoyan a nen erukito ka ŋikasyomak.
Apotu ŋikilyok ŋice potu alo Yudaya tari Antiokio togeut akitatam ŋikanupak temasi, “Nyipedorete iyes aryamun aiuno, mati kikileŋeri ikwaŋina ecamakinitotor Ŋikisila a Moses.”

Apotu ŋakiro nu inakis Paulo ka Baranaba ebura ka apeganakin ka ikes. Toseunae nai Paulo ka Baranaba ta ŋikanupak ŋice alosit Yerusalem aanyun Ŋikiyakia kaapei ka ŋikatukok a Ŋikristo aŋuna a ŋakiro a ŋun.

Aŋun, kiyaki atukot a Ŋikristo ikes. Ani etubete ikes neni anyaritae Poenikia ka Samaria, kitatamikis ikes ŋituŋa ŋul epite ŋolo anupyata ŋituŋa ŋulu nyerae Ŋiyudayan Akuj. Kitelelyana ŋakiro ŋun ŋikanupak daadaŋ.
Ani edolunete ikes Yerusalem, kijau atukot ŋina a Ŋikristo ka Ŋikiyakia ta ŋikatukok ikes. Tolimokis Paulo ka Baranaba ikes ŋakiro daadaŋ ŋuna abu Akuj kitiya aneni kec.
Nai temasi ŋikanupak ŋice ŋulu ka atukot a ŋina a Ŋiparisayon, “Itemokino ŋikanupak ŋulu nyerae Ŋiyudayan kileŋerae ka kitatamae kiwuapa Ŋikisila a Moses.”
Totukokin nai Ŋikiyakia ka ŋikatukok aripirip ŋakiro ŋun.

Ani kepeganakinosi ikes apaki ŋina aoyan, tonyou Petero tema, “Ŋikaitotoi kaŋ, iyenete iyes atemar abu koloŋ Akuj okoseu ayoŋ alokidiŋ kus alimonokin Ŋakiro ŋuna Ajokak lotuŋa ŋulu nyerae Ŋiyudayan, ikotere iirarete, tonupa.
Abu Akuj ŋina eyeni ŋitai a ŋituŋa kiteyenu atemar ecamunit iŋes ŋulu nyerae Ŋiyudayan aŋuna ainakinia ikes Etau ŋolo Asegan, ikwaŋinapei ikiinakinia iwon.
Abu nyiwuak atyaketait kidiŋ yok ka ikes, nai abu kitesegu ŋitai kec anakisyon ŋasecisya, anerae apotu tonupa.
Aŋun, kaanukiro nai ikatakinitotor iyes akitoŋo Akuj alotooma akisiwuok ŋikanupak ŋigogoso ŋulu pa apedorito atapapaa yok kori iwon daŋ akiwuok.
Nyepedor! Ikinupit iwon atemar ikiiun iwon aŋuna ka ajokis a ŋina ke Ekapolon Yesu, ikwa ikes daŋ.”
Kililiŋa ŋituŋa ŋulu ka atukot daadaŋ, topupokis daŋ Baranaba ka Paulo elimonorete ŋuna a ŋaumonokineta ka ŋakujuwuanisya daadaŋ ŋuna kitiyat Akuj aneni kec alokidiŋ ŋituŋa ŋulu pa arae Ŋiyudayan.
Ani kedaut ikes erwor, kirworik Yakobo tema, “Ŋikaitotoi, topupokinae ayoŋ!
Adau Simoni Petero alimun epite ŋolo esyaunia Akuj alemun ateker keŋ alotooma ŋituŋa ŋulu nyerae Ŋiyudayan, kituruwo ŋulu keŋ.
Ecamuna ŋakiro nu ka ŋuna a ŋikadwarak ŋuna igiritae ikona: ebala Akuj,
‘Ekaku a nu aboŋuni ayoŋ, ka etonyouni akai a Daudi ŋina aŋopiya. Etonyouni ayoŋ ŋakinyasunet keŋ, ka etowuoi iŋes.
Tosodo ŋituŋa ŋuluce – ŋituŋa daadaŋ ŋulu nyerae Ŋiyudayan – ŋulu anyarau ayoŋ aruwor ŋulu kaŋ, ekewara ayoŋ.
Ayoŋ Ekapolon, ŋolo aberakin koloŋ sek akiteyenun ŋakiro nu ŋuna etiyakini.’
Aŋun, atami ayoŋ atemar nyitemokino iwon akicanit ŋituŋa ŋulu nyerae Ŋiyudayan ŋulu ebelekinosi neni ka Akuj.
Nai itemokino akigirakin ikes abaruwa, ikotere toesikis akinyam ŋamuja ŋuna nyitesegunitae, anerae einakinitae sek nakujo; toesikis daŋ amalao ka nyenyamete ediotyaŋ ŋolo emyeditae kori ŋaokot.
Anerae elimonokinio Ŋikisila a Moses lotaunio daadaŋ ŋinapei koloŋ ka esyomeneneo alosinagogae a ŋinakoloŋit a Sabato.”

Tosodo nai Ŋikiyakia ka ŋikatukok kaapei ka ŋikanupak daadaŋ totyakut atemar, kejoikinit toseunae ŋikilyok ŋidi alokidiŋ kec, ido kiyakiyarae Antiokio kaapei ka Paulo ta Baranaba. Toseut ikes Silas ka Yuda ŋolo anyaritae Barasaba, ŋikilyok ŋulu akerer nooi alokanupak.
Inakinae ikes akiya abaruwa ŋina abala ne: “Isua Ŋikiyakia ka ŋikatukok ŋulu ikirae ŋikaitotoi kus, ikimalat iyes ŋikanupak daadaŋ ŋulu nyirae Ŋiyudayan ŋulu iyakasi Antiokio, Siria ka Cilicia.
“Eirar isua atemar kepotu ŋituŋa ŋice ŋulu anatukot kosi potu inaa akican ka akisigurya ŋatameta kus aŋuna kirworito ikes; nai pa alimokinitae isua ikes akitiya ŋun.
Aŋun, aponi isua totukokinetei ka tocamunetei aseun ŋituŋa ŋidi kiyakuunae neni kus. Erukunete ikes ka ŋikonei kosi ŋuluminan, Baranaba ka Paulo,
ŋulu ajal akiyar kec aŋuna ke Ekapolon yok Yesu Kristo.
Ikiyaku nai isua neni kus Yuda ka Silas, ŋulu ikilimokinete iyes alorwor kec a ŋilopeyek ŋakiro ŋunapei ikigirit isua.
Acamu Etau ŋolo Asegan kaapei ka isua atemar nyikiinakin iyes ŋatyokisyo ŋace adepar Ŋikisila lu, ŋulu iitana:
itemokino iyes toesikis akinyam ŋamuja ŋuna einakinitae nakujo, ŋaokot, ediotyaŋ ŋolo emyeditae ka akitiya amalao. Ani kicoikis iyes ŋun, itiyaete ejok. Ikianyun.”
Aŋun, kiyakiyarae ikes etiŋito abaruwa ŋin, toloto Antiokio. Kedaut acunakin ŋikanupak, inakis abaruwa neni kec.
Ani kesyoma ŋituŋa abaruwa, tolakaros aŋuna a ŋakiro a ŋuna esimukekinak.
Apotu Yuda ka Silas ikwapei araakatar ŋikadwarak, kisimukekis ŋikanupak a ŋakiro a ŋuna alalak, kitogogoŋo ikes.
Ani kiboiyoto ikes a nen ŋirwa ŋidi, kitoloto ŋikanupak ikes ke ekisil, toboŋosi neni a ŋulu eyakuunito ikes. [
Nai totyaku Silas akidoŋ nen.]
Kiboiyoto Paulo ka Baranaba alo Antiokio, itatamete ka elimonokinete ŋakiro ŋuna ke Ekapolon, kaapei ka ŋice daŋ ŋulu alalak.
Kelunyar ŋirwa ŋidi, tolimok Paulo Baranaba tema, “Bua oboŋosi eŋoliasi ŋikanupak, ŋikaitotoi yok alotaunio a daadaŋ a ŋulu eseratere iwon ŋakiro ŋuna ke Ekapolon, oanyutu epite ŋolo eyakatar ikes.”
Acamit Baranaba atemar torukosi ikes ka Yoana Mariko.
Nai atami Paulo atemar pa etemokino ikes arukor ka ituŋanan ŋini abu toboŋo toesik ikes alo Pampilia, ŋini abu nyerukosi ka ikes lotic.
Tolomu ebura ŋolo amwanan, totyakas ikes. Ya Baranaba Mariko, toloto ka ameeli tari loculat Kupuro;
nai toseu Paulo Silas, ido toloto, kedaut ŋikanupak akicikakin ikes anajokis a ŋina ke Ekapolon.
Kirimo iŋes Siria ka Cilicia, kitogogoŋ ŋatukon ŋuna a ŋikanupak.
Todol Paulo tari Derube ka Listra. Ayai nen Ekristoit ŋolo anyaritae Timoteo, ŋolo arae toto keŋ Ayudayat ŋina anupit Yesu, nai arae papa keŋ Egirik.
Etojokito ŋikanupak daadaŋ ŋulu alo Listra ka Ikonio Timoteo.
Acamit Paulo arukor ka iŋes; abu iŋes ya Timoteo kileŋer aŋuna a Ŋiyudayan a ŋulu ayakasi nakwapin ŋun, anerae ayenete ikes daadaŋ atemar arae papa a Timoteo Egirik.
Ani irimorete ikes lotaunio, tolimonokis ikes ŋikanupak akiwuap ŋakiro ŋuna apotu Ŋikiyakia ka ŋikatukok totubut alo Yerusalem.
Aŋun, kitogogoŋoi ŋatukon a ŋikanupak ananupit ka kiyatas ŋikanupak a ŋinakoloŋit.
Kirimosi ikes nakwapin ŋuna a Pirigia ka Galatia, kedau Etau ŋolo Asegan awoun ikes akisera ŋakiro ŋuna ka Akuj alo Asia.
Ani edolete ikes lokukoru ŋolo a Misia, kikatakis ikes alosit nakwap ŋina anyaritae Bisinia; nai nyecamak ikes Etau ŋolo a Yesu.
Aŋun, kitoro ikes Misia, totiyaaros Toroas.
Akoloŋit ŋin nakwaare, bu atakanikinet neni a Paulo: awoi ekile ŋolo alo Makedonia edyekit iŋes ebala, “Bua Makedonia, ikiŋarak isua!”
Ani keanyuwa Paulo atakanikinet ŋin, kiitanae isua atipei alosit Makedonia, anerae ikipotu oyenutu atemar kikinyar Akuj isua alimonokin Ŋakiro ŋuna Ajokak neni kec.
Todokae isua ameeli alo Toroas tocorotae tari Samosirake, akoloŋit ŋina atupakini todoloi Neapolis.
Torotokinoe a nen a ŋakejen tolotoi Pilipi, etaun ŋolo apolon anakwap a Makedonia ŋolo eboiyoto Ŋiromanin. Kiriyae isua ŋirwa ŋidi alotaun a ŋol.

Ani edoli akoloŋit ŋina a Sabato, tolotoi isua kiŋa etaun diyete aŋolol, neni atamakinitae isua atemar kori etukonokin Ŋiyudayan akilip. Kiboikinetei isua, kirworoe neni a ŋaberu a ŋuna atukokina nen.

Apei alokidiŋ ŋuna ikipupete isua, arae aberu ŋina anyaritae Lidia ŋina alotaun a ŋolo a Tyatira, ŋina agyelanari ŋilowi ŋulu kipura areŋak. Arae iŋes aberu ŋina ainakina neni ka Akuj. Abu Ekapolon toŋaa etau keŋ akiirar tocamu ŋakiro ŋuna erworo Paulo.

Ani kibatisae iŋes kaapei ka ŋituŋa ŋulu ke ekal keŋ, itodyek isua tema, “Ani kire kitamete iyes atemar arae ayoŋ akanupan ŋina ke Ekapolon, potu kiboiyoto alokai kaŋ.” Abu iŋes ikitacamu isua alosit ka iŋes.

Apeikoloŋit elosyo isua neni elipeneneere, kiryamunetei ka apese ŋina arae apito, ŋina ayakar ekipye ŋolo ainakinit iŋes akidwar ŋakiro ŋuna eponito alokiŋaren. Aryamianakini iŋes ŋikapolok keŋ ŋisiliŋa ŋulu alalak anakidwar keŋ.
Kiwuapu iŋes Paulo ka isua ecela ebala, “Erae ŋikilyok lu ŋiketiyak ŋulu ka Akuj a ŋina alokidiama nooi! Iseraete ikes epite ŋolo ipedoryata iyes aiuno!”

Kitiya iŋes nu ŋirwa ŋulu alalak, akitodol ŋina aŋoya Paulo, ido toboboŋ tolimok ekipye tema, “Akalimokini ayoŋ iyoŋ alokiro a Yesu Kristo atemar tolomu aneni keŋ!” Tolomu ekipye aneni keŋ esaa ŋolopei ŋol.
Nai ani eyenunete ŋikapolok keŋ atemar adaun epite ŋolo sek aryamununiata ikes ŋisiliŋa, aŋuna eritarere ekipye, kikamut ikes Paulo ka Silas, torikosi ikes lokepukak ŋulu ayakasi neni iikiikere.
Ani kedaut ikes ayaun ikes lokatubok, temasi, “Erae ŋikilyok lu Ŋiyudayan, isiguryaete ikes etaun yok.
Itatamete ikes ŋitalyo ŋulu italeo iwon Ŋiromanin akiwuap ka akitiya.”
Toloma asepic a ŋituŋa daŋ nakiro ŋuna esitakinitere ikes. Tociliciliyasi ŋikatubok ŋilowi a Paulo ka Silas, tolimokis ŋituŋa akibuŋa ikes a ŋadase.
Ani kibuŋae ikes nooi, kiwuakinae mabus, kicikakinae ekapolokiniton mabus akiyok ikes ejok.
Ani iirari ekapolokiniton mabus ŋuna ecikakinio iŋes, togolok ikes nagule ŋina alotooma nooi, toen ŋakejen kec nakito ŋuna apotyok.
Ani eapikini kidiŋ akuwar, elipete Paulo ka Silas toeos ŋieosyo neni ka Akuj, topupete ŋimabus ŋuluce ikes.
Ŋinapeipaki, tomaranik akwap nooi, kiukok ejera ameun alokwap. Atipei toŋaaros ŋikekya daadaŋ, tolacaros ŋiriko aneni a ŋimabus a daadaŋ.
Ani ekyenyuni ekapolokiniton mabus, kiŋolik ŋikekya ŋulu ke ejera daadaŋ eŋaara, totamak atemar keema ŋimabus; aŋun tolemu atum keŋ ecamit akicumakin bon.
Nai kiworou Paulo ke etoil a ŋolo apolon tema, “Nyiwan akonikuwan! Ikiya isua daadaŋ ne!”
Tonyarau ekapolokiniton mabus ituŋanan ayaun etaa, kipumar tooma, toramakin kiŋaren Paulo ka Silas emarani.
Ya nai iŋes ikes kiŋa, kiŋit ikes tema, “Ŋikapolok, nyo itemokino ayoŋ etiya, ikotere oiun?”
Temasi ikes, “Tonup Ekapolon Yesu, ido toiun kaapei ka ekonikal.”
Tolimonokis nai ikes ŋakiro ŋuna ka Akuj neni keŋ ka lotuŋa ŋulu alokai keŋ.
Ya iŋes ikes nakwaare esaa ŋolopei ŋol, kilot ŋajemei kec. Aponi kibatisae iŋes atipei kaapei ka ekal keŋ.
Ya iŋes Paulo ka Silas kai keŋ, inak ikes akimuj. Tolakaros iŋes ka ŋituŋa keŋ, aŋuna aponiata ikes tonupa Akuj.
Ani iwalari akwap, kiyakuut ŋikatubok ŋipoliso atemar, “Kimyekisi ŋikilyok ŋul toloto.”
Tosodi ekapolokiniton mabus tolimok Paulo ŋakiro ŋun tema, “Eyakuut ŋikatubok akirot atemar ikilacakin iyes. Tonyoutu nai, toloto a ekisil.”

Nai tolimok Paulo ikes tema, “Aponi ikibuŋae isua alokiŋaren ŋituŋa pa ikitubokinitae – isua ŋituŋa ŋulu a Roma! Apotu ikes ikiwuakis isua mabus. Ecamito nai tokona ikes alacakin isua pa eyenete ŋituŋa a? Nyepedor jik! Itemokino potu ikes pei ŋilopeyek ikilacakis isua.”
Yaasi ŋipoliso ŋakiro ŋun lokatubok. Ani iirarete ikes atemar arae Paulo ka Silas ŋituŋa a Roma, tobul ikes.
A ŋun, potu ikes adyekit Paulo ka Silas akisyon ikes. Toŋaut nai ikes alomabus, kiŋitakis ikes alosit alotaun.
Tolomut Paulo ka Silas alomabus, toloto neni a Lidia. Kiryamun ikes aina ka ŋikanupak, tolimokis ikes ŋakiro ŋuna kisimukekinet, torotokis nai alotaun.
Toloto ikes, kitoro lotaunio ŋulu ka Ampipoli ka Apolonia tari Tesalonika neni ayai esinagoga ŋolo a Ŋiyudayan.
Ikwaŋina araakar epite a Paulo, abu tolosene losinagoga. Kiyana iŋes ka ŋituŋa a nen ŋirwa ŋuluuni ŋulu arae ŋulu a Sabato, tolimonokini ikes ŋakiro ŋuna igiritae Nakigireta.
Kisileerek ka kitoodik ikes atemar etemokino Kristo toryamu ŋican ka toyaru alokatwak. Tolimu Paulo tema, “Yesu lo, ŋolo eserae ayoŋ neni kus, iŋes erae Kristo.”
Tonupa ŋice alokidiŋ kec, toriwo neni a Paulo ka Silas. Tonupa daŋ Ŋigirik ŋulu alalak ŋulu ainakina neni ka Akuj, kaapei ka ŋaberu ŋuna alalak ŋuna apolok alotaun.
Nai min arakao neni a Ŋiyudayan, kiriraut ŋikerimitok emaket ŋice, toyeut aruruma. Kisiguryakis ikes etaun daadaŋ, tolomasi ka agogoŋu lore a Yason, iwarito Paulo ka Silas ayaun ikes kiŋa lotuŋa.
Nai ani eryamunete ikes emamukasi, kiriut Yason kaapei ka ŋikanupak ŋice lokapolok ŋulu ke etaun, tocelas ebasi, “Etolomut ŋikilyok lu ŋakiro ŋuna aronok nakwap daadaŋ! Tokona apotu ikes lotaun yok
ka ejau Yason ikes kai keŋ. Eŋerito ikes daadaŋ ŋikisila ŋulu ke ekepukan a Roma, aŋuna ebaakatar ebe eyai erwosit ece ŋolo enyaritae Yesu.”
Ani iirarete ŋituŋa ka ŋikapolok ŋulu ke etaun ŋakiro ŋun, kiidakinos nooi.
Kitelemut ŋikapolok Yason ka ŋuluce daŋ ŋisiliŋa ŋulu acamakinere ikes akiboi alokiŋa ejera. Tolacakis nai ikes toloto.
Ŋinapei ani ewari akwap, tolimokis ŋikanupak Paulo ka Silas atemar toloto Berea. Ani edolete ikes inaa, toloto losinagoga a Ŋiyudayan.

Apupete ŋituŋa a nen ŋakiro akilo ŋulu alo Tesalonika, anerae apotu kijaut ŋakiro ŋuna ka Akuj ecamito nooi, tosyomete a ŋinakoloŋit ŋakiro ŋuna igiritae Nakigireta, ecamito aripun erae kerae kire ŋakiro ŋuna erworo Paulo.
Aŋun, tonupa ikes ŋulu alalak; tonupa daŋ Ŋigirik ŋulu alalak, ŋaberu ŋuna ajakaanak, kaapei ka ŋikilyok.
Nai ani iirarete Ŋiyudayan ŋulu alo Tesalonika atemar iserae Paulo ŋakiro ŋuna ka Akuj tari alo Berea, potu ikes neni daŋ, togeut akitutuk ŋituŋa, kisiguryakis.
Kitenakis ŋikanupak Paulo atipei, tolot ananam; nai kidoŋo Silas ka Timoteo Berea.
Apotu ŋikilyok ŋulu etenarete Paulo kitodolo iŋes Asen. Toboŋosi nai ikes Berea, kedau Paulo akicik ikes atemar okoryamut iŋes Silas ka Timoteo atipei alotooma apaki ŋina euruwuana.
Ani eriŋa Paulo idarit Silas ka Timoteo alo Asen, toronik iŋes nooi epite ŋolo alalaata ŋakujo alotaun a ŋol.
Aŋun, kirworo iŋes alosinagoga ka Ŋiyudayan kaapei ka ŋuluce ŋulu ainakina neni ka Akuj; kimocoete jwi jwi alomaket ka ŋulu arae ŋikalotok.

Kimocoto daŋ iŋes ka ŋikaosok ŋulu anyaritae Ŋipikuriyae ka Ŋisitoikae. Temasi ŋice, “Inyoni ecamit ekile ŋolo irworo car lo alimun?” Temasi ŋice, “Esibit elimonokini iŋes ŋakiro ŋuna a ŋakujo a ŋuna egelaaka.” Alimunete ikes ŋun, anerae alimonokini Paulo ŋakiro ŋuna a Yesu ka ŋuna ka ayarun alokatwak.
Aŋun, tonyaraiyasi ikes iŋes yaasi loikiiko ŋolo ke etaun, ŋolo anyaritae Areopago, tolimokis iŋes temasi, “Ikicamit isua akiirar akitatam ŋina kitete na, ŋina itatami iyoŋ.
Anerae epupyo isua ŋakiro ŋace ŋuna egelaaka; aŋun, ikicamit isua ayenun apolou kec.”
(Aminasi ŋituŋa ŋulu ka Asen ka ŋulu gelae ŋulu aya nen aayenen ŋapakio daadaŋ irworosi ŋakiro ŋuna alunyarosi ka akiiranar ŋuna kitet.)
Towo Paulo alokiŋaren eikiiko ŋolo ka Areopago, kirworik tema, “Ŋituŋa ŋulu ka Asen, ayenu ayoŋ atemar iraakasi iyes ŋituŋa ŋulu iyaito ibore daadaŋ alowae a ŋolo ke edin.

Apaki ŋina erimoritor ayoŋ etaun kus ka eŋolianak neni ilipyananaata iyes, abu oanyua neni imurotor iyes neni egiritae neni ebala, ‘Neni ka akuj a ŋina nyeyenio.’ Akuj ŋin nai, ŋina ilipete iyes neni keŋ nyiyenete, iŋes tokona eserae ayoŋ ŋakiro keŋ.
Akuj na ŋina asubuni akwap ka ibore daadaŋ ŋini eyai tooma keŋ, ŋina erae Ekapolon ŋolo anakuj ka akwap; nyiboi iŋes anakais a ŋuna edukito ŋituŋa akilipya ŋakujo.
Nabo daŋ nyiitanit iŋes akiŋarakinet a ŋituŋa esibit icana iŋes idiobore, torae bo iŋes einanakini akiyar ka ekieŋanu ta ŋiboro daadaŋ neni kec.
Abu Akuj tosub ŋibukui a ŋituŋa daadaŋ alokile ke epei, kisiboik ikes nakwap daadaŋ, kedau atubun apaki ŋina eyaryata ka neni iboikinosi.
Etiyae Akuj ŋun, ikotere kiwara ŋituŋa iŋes, toraraput, ido toryamut iŋes. Tari kikote nen daŋ, nyelwana iŋes aneni yok a daadaŋ.
Anerae ebookoi ebe: ‘Ikiyari, ikilosi ka ikiya iwon aŋuna ka Akuj.’ Ikwaŋinapei ebaakatar ŋikegirak kus ŋice ebe, ‘Ikirae iwon kire ŋiletok keŋ.’

Ikwaŋinapei ikiraakar iwon ŋiletok ŋulu ka Akuj, nyitemokino iwon ikitami atemar ikwaan eyakae keŋ ka etorube ŋolo eyeunitae ke egolid kori ke esilipa kori ka amoru – etorube ŋolo eyeuni ituŋanan ka aosou keŋ.
Akitodol apaki na, abu Akuj nyimaraki ŋapakio ŋuna pa ayeniata ŋituŋa iŋes, nai tokona ecikak ŋituŋa anakwapin a daadaŋ akibelekin neni keŋ.
Anerae atubu Akuj akoloŋit ŋina etubokinia ŋituŋa daadaŋ anakwap anakiyookino ka erae ituŋanan ŋini aseu iŋes itiyakini ŋun. Etoodiu iŋes ŋun lotuŋa daadaŋ anakiteyarun ituŋanan ŋin alokatwak!”
Ani iirarete ikes ŋuna ka ayarun alokatwak, tojamuwasi ŋice iŋes; nai temasi ŋice ebe, “Ikicamit isua akiirar iyoŋ irworo ŋakiro ŋun nabo.”
Aŋun, tolot Paulo aloikiiko.
Nai apotu ŋikilyok ŋice toriwo ka iŋes, tonupa: alokidiŋ ŋul, ayai Dionisio ŋolo ka atukot a ŋina ka Areopago ka aberu ŋina anyaritae Damaris ta ŋice daŋ.
Ekaku a ŋun, torotok Paulo alo Asen, tolot lotaun ŋolo anyaritae Korinto.

Toryamu iŋes aina Eyudayat ŋolo anyaritae Akwila, ŋolo auritae alo Ponitio. Keriŋa Akwila eboŋuni alo Italia, torukito ka aberu keŋ Prisila, anerae kebu Klauda ekepukan a Roma tolimu atemar torotokis Ŋiyudayan daadaŋ alo Roma. Tolot Paulo aanyun ikes,
toruko ka ikes, kitiyata kaapei, anerae arae iŋes daŋ ekadonyon ŋiemae ikwapei ikes.
Kimocoenenee Paulo alosinagoga a ŋinakoloŋit a Sabato, iwarit akitunup Ŋiyudayan ka Ŋigirik ŋakiro ŋun.
Ani epote Silas ka Timoteo alo Makedonia, totum Paulo aayenen akeepaki daadaŋ elimonokini ka iteyenunui Ŋiyudayan atemar Yesu iŋes erae Kristo.

Nai ani itepegete ikes iŋes ka kirworotor iŋes neni aronon, kilakilakaa iŋes ŋilowi keŋ tema, “Ani tokona kikitubok Akuj iyes, erae ŋun ŋuna kus! Emam ŋuna akatapito ayoŋ. Ameun tokona alosi ayoŋ lotuŋa ŋulu nyerae Ŋiyudayan.”
Torotok iŋes alosinagoga tolot, akiboi kai a Tito Yusito. Arae Tito ekile ŋolo ainakina neni ka Akuj ka pa arae Eyudayat. Aapi akai keŋ alosinagoga.
Tonupa nai ekapolokiniton esinagoga ŋolo arae ekiro keŋ Kirispo ka ekal keŋ daadaŋ Ekapolon Yesu. Ani iirarete ŋituŋa ŋulu alalak ŋulu alo Korinto ŋakiro ŋun, tonupa, kibatisae.
Akoloŋit apei nakwaare, bu atakanikinet neni a Paulo, kisirworik Ekapolon iŋes tema, “Nyikuryaniar, nai torubak ilimonokini ka nyiesik jik,
anerae ikirukit ayoŋ ka iyoŋ. Emam ituŋanan epedori akiwan iyoŋ, anerae ŋituŋa ŋulu alalak alotaun a lo, erae ŋulu kaŋ.”
Aŋun, kiboi Paulo a nen todol ekaru epei ka ŋilapyo ŋikanikapei itatami ŋakiro ŋuna ka Akuj lotuŋa.
Ani ituruworyo Galio ekawuoikiniton ekepukan a Roma anakwap a ŋina ka Akaia, tocunakinos Ŋiyudayan iwapei, kikamut Paulo yaasi loikiiko.
Temasi ikes ebe, “Ikatakinit ekile lo akitacamun ŋituŋa akilip Akuj alopite a ŋolo nyecamito Ŋikisila a Moses!”
Ani edikino Paulo irworikini, tolimok Galio Ŋiyudayan tema, “Kerae torae ŋakiro nu ŋuna aronok kori ŋuna ka aseconu a ŋina apolon, keya ŋakiro ŋuna apedorya ayoŋ apupokin iyes Ŋiyudayan.
Nai ikwaŋinapei eraakar ebura lo ŋolo a ŋakiro ka ŋirorwa ka ŋikisila kus a ŋilopeyek, itemokino iyes ŋilopeyek tosubakis ŋakiro kus. Nyaruwor ayoŋ ekatubon ŋolo a ŋakiro a ŋuna ikote nu!”
Kirita iŋes ikes kiŋa aneni eikiikere.
Kikamut ikes daadaŋ Sostene ekapolokiniton esinagoga, kibuŋata iŋes alokiŋaren eikiiko. Nai nyemitak Galio ŋun tari iwadio.

Kiboiyoto Paulo ka ŋikanupak alo Korinto ŋirwa ŋulu alalak. Ani ekaku, totyakas ka ikes, torukosi iŋes ka Prisila ta Akwila, todoka ameeli, toloto Siria. Ani eriŋa Paulo nyeloto alo Kenikerea, totub ŋitim keŋ aŋuna ka akikoŋ a ŋina abu iŋes kikoŋ neni ka Akuj.
Todolo ikes Epeso, tolot Paulo bon losinagoga akiyan ka Ŋiyudayan.
Kiŋitakis ikes iŋes akiboi ekaoyan ka ikes, nai abu nyecamu.
Nai ani erotokini iŋes, tolimok ikes tema, “Aboŋuni ayoŋ neni kus, erae kerae acamit ka Akuj.” Todok nai iŋes ameeli alo Epeso, toesik Prisila ka Akwila a nen.
Ani edoli iŋes Kaisaria, tolot Yerusalem akimal atukot ŋina a ŋikanupak; tolot nai Antiokio.
Ani kedau iŋes apaki adio a nen, torotok tolot kirimo nakwapin ŋuna a Galatia ka Pirigia, kisimukek ŋikanupak daadaŋ.
Apaki ŋin, bu lotaun ŋolo ke Epeso Eyudayat ŋolo anyaritae Apolo, ŋolo edounitoe alo Alekisandaria. Ayeni iŋes erwor nooi, ayeni daŋ Ŋakigireta nooi.
Kitatamitae iŋes ejok Erot ŋolo ke Ekapolon. Etatami iŋes ŋakiro a Yesu alopite a ŋolo eyookino ka alelakinit nooi; nai ayeni iŋes ebatisimu a Yoana bon.
Kisyak nai iŋes erwor alosinagoga pa ekuryanit. Ani iirarete Prisila ka Akwila iŋes, tonyaraiyasi iŋes, tolimokis Erot ŋolo ka Akuj alopite a ŋolo iyookino adepar.

Ani etyakuni Apolo alosit Akaia, kisimukekis ŋikanupak ŋulu a Epeso iŋes alosit, kigirakis ŋabaruwae neni a ŋikanupak a ŋulu alo Akaia akijaun iŋes aina. Ani edoli iŋes inaa, kiŋarak iŋes nooi Ŋikristo ŋulu keris keruworosi ŋikanupak anajokis a ŋina ka Akuj.
Anerae anakimoco keŋ ka Ŋiyudayan alokiŋaren ŋituŋa, abu kilou ikes, kitoodiu a Nakigireta ebe Yesu iŋes erae Kristo.
Ani eriŋa Apolo eyai Korinto, kirimo Paulo nakwapin ŋuna a Galatia ka Pirigia, todol tari Epeso. Toryamu iŋes aina ŋikasyomak ŋidi,
kiŋit ikes tema, “Ipotu iyes toryamut Etau ŋolo Asegan apaki ŋina inupyata iyes a?” Toboŋokis ikes temasi, “Nyiirara isua tari atemar eyai icebore ŋini enyaritae Etau ŋolo Asegan.”
Kiŋit Paulo ikes tema, “Alibatisimu nai ikibatisatere iyes?” Toboŋokis ikes temasi, “Arae ebatisimu a Yoana.”
Tema nai Paulo, “Abu Yoana kibatisa a ebatisimu a ŋolo kiyet ŋasecisya; nai alimonokini iŋes ŋituŋa akinup ŋolo ebuni alokaku keŋ, iŋes Yesu.”
Ani iirarete ikes ŋun, kibatisae ikes alokiro ke Ekapolon Yesu.
Kidokok nai Paulo ŋakan keŋ neni kec, min Etau ŋolo Asegan neni kec; kirworikis ikes ŋaŋajepa ŋuna agelegelya, todwara ŋakiro ŋuna ka Akuj.
Aapikinit ekimar a ŋikilyok a ŋul ŋitomon ka ŋiarei.
Torubak Paulo elosenene losinagoga; ŋilapyo ŋiuni irworo lotuŋa pa ekuryana, kisimoco ikes iwarit akitunup ikes ŋakiro ŋuna ka Apukan ka Akuj.

Nai esyaaka ŋice jik, nyenupa; ido irworotor Erot ŋolo ke Ekapolon alopite a ŋolo aronon alokiŋaren atukot daadaŋ. Aŋun, toesik Paulo ikes, totyakaros ka ŋikasyomak aneni kec. Anyoun apaki ŋin, erworo iŋes jwi jwi alokai a Tiranus neni a ŋituŋa.
Kitiya iŋes ŋun ŋikaru ŋiarei, kisiira Ŋiyudayan ka Ŋigirik daŋ alo Asia ŋakiro ŋuna ke Ekapolon.
Etiyae Akuj ŋakujuwuanisya ŋuna ailiilok aneni a Paulo.
Ayaununuyete ŋituŋa neni a ŋikadyakak ŋakitambarae ka ŋarapeta ŋuna keris Paulo kisitiya, kiritanarere ŋidekesyo kec ka kitorotonokinere ŋipyan aneni kec.

Kikatakis nai Ŋiyudayan ŋice, ŋulu erimito kiritanarete ŋipyan, akisitiya ekiro ŋolo ke Ekapolon Yesu akiritanarya ŋipyan. Abasi ikes lopyan, “Akalimokini ayoŋ iyoŋ alokiro a Yesu, a ŋolo iserae Paulo ŋakiro keŋ, tolot.”
Aya daŋ ŋisapa ŋikanikaarei ŋulu ke Eyudayat a ŋolo anyaritae Sikepa ŋolo arae esacaradoti ŋolo apolon. Etiyaete ikes daŋ ŋakiro ŋun.
Nai tema ekipye neni kec, “Ayeni ayoŋ Yesu ka ayeni Paulo; nai ataŋae bo iyes?”
Toboŋ ekile ŋolo ayai ekipye neni keŋ, kitijik ikes ka aryenyeo, kilou ikes. Toema ikes daadaŋ alokai ekoris ŋilowi ka eyakatar ŋaruma.
Toyenut Ŋiyudayan ka Ŋigirik daadaŋ ŋulu alo Epeso ŋakiro ŋun, tokuryaketa daadaŋ, kitopoloosi ekiro ŋolo ke Ekapolon Yesu.
Apotu ŋikanupak ŋulu alalak tolimonosi alokiŋaren ŋituŋa ŋakiro ŋuna aronok, ŋuna sek keris ikes kitiyata.
Yaut ŋikalalak ŋulu sek arae ŋikekukujak ŋikitaaboi kec iwapei kicunyakis alokiŋaren ŋituŋa daadaŋ. Kimoriut ikes ebei ŋolo a ŋikitaaboi, todol daadaŋ ŋisilipae ŋalipyo ŋatomonikan.
Alopite a ŋol, abu akirot ŋina ke Ekapolon kiyatakin nooi ka kielakin nakwapin.
Ani kitiyakinosi ŋakiro ŋun, totyaku Paulo alosit Makedonia ka Akaia, tolot nai Yerusalem. Tolimu iŋes tema, “Ani kadau ayoŋ ayakaun nen, itemokino oanyu Roma daŋ.”
Kiyakiya iŋes kiŋaren ŋikeŋarakinitok keŋ ŋiarei, Timoteo ka Erasto, toloto Makedonia; eriŋa iŋes iriyat alo Asia.
Arae apaki na ayakar aruruma ŋina apolon Epeso aŋuna ke Erot a ŋolo ke Ekapolon.
Ayai nen eceketyekan ŋisilipae, ŋolo anyaritae Demetrio, ŋolo etyeki ŋitorubei ŋulu ka akai a ŋolo ka akuj a ŋina anyaritae Artemis. Ayaununui akicuruta keŋ epoida ŋolo alalan nooi neni a ŋiketiyak.
Tonyarau iŋes ŋiketiyak keŋ iwapei ka ŋuluce daŋ ŋulu etiyaete etic ŋolopei ŋol, tolimok ikes tema, “Ŋikilyok, iyenete iyes atemar neni itorunit ebari yok lotic lo.
Iteete ka iirasi iyes ŋilopeyek Paulo lo. Ebala iŋes ebe nyerae ŋakujo ŋuna itiyaunito ŋituŋa ŋakujo tari iwadio ka etunup ŋituŋa daadaŋ a ne alo Epeso ka akwap ŋina ka Asia daadaŋ.

Iŋes nai atemar alomu neni aronon; eryamuni akicuruta yok ekiro ŋolo aronon. Meere ŋun daŋ bon, eruwor akoŋinait akai ka akuj a ŋina enyaritae Artemis ka akuj yok ŋina apolon, edaun daŋ arwonu keŋ – ŋina ilipyata ŋituŋa alo Asia ka anakwapin a daadaŋ iŋes!”
Ani iirarete ŋasepico ŋakiro ŋun, toŋoa nooi, kisyakis ecelet ebasi, “Epol Artemis ŋina a Epeso!”
Kiguryakis ikes etaun daadaŋ. Kikamut ikes ŋirukitos a Paulo ŋiarei Gaio ka Aristako, ŋulu arae Ŋimakedoniyae, yaasi neni ebolyare.
Acamit Paulo alomar tooma nasepic, nai nyecamakis ŋikanupak iŋes.
Ŋikapolok daŋ ŋice ŋulu araakasi ŋikonei keŋ, kiyakikis iŋes akirot ŋina adyekitotor nyeloma neni ebolyare.
Apaki ŋin, egurya eikiiko nooi a nen; acelasi ŋice ŋakiro ŋace, tocelas ŋice ŋace ŋuna agelaaka, anerae pa ayenete ŋulu alalak ŋakiro ŋuna atukokinitere ikes.
Toreiyasi Ŋiyudayan Alekisanda kiŋaren ŋituŋa. Ani isimukekinete ŋituŋa iŋes akirworikin, kikia Alekisanda akan keŋ, ikotere eiunor iŋes.
Nai ani eyenunete ikes atemar arae iŋes Eyudayat, tocela ikes ŋakiro ŋapei, yaasi ŋisaae ŋiarei ebasi, “Epol Artemis ŋina a Epeso!”

Kelunyar apaki ŋina aoyan, kisililiŋ ekaran ŋolo ke etaun ikes tolimok tema, “Ŋikilyok ŋulu ke Epeso, eyenete ŋituŋa daadaŋ atemar Epeso iŋes erae eketen akai ŋina ka akuj a ŋina enyaritae Artemis a ŋina apolon ka etorube keŋ ŋolo adouni anakuj.
Emam ituŋanan ŋini epegi ŋakiro ŋun. Aŋun, itemokino iyes kililiŋa, nyitiyata idiobore ka atipei.
Iyaut iyes ŋikilyok lu ne tari pa erae ŋikokolak ŋulu a ŋakais a ŋuna ka akuj yok kori pa iyanyito akuj yok.
Ani kire kisitakinito Demetrio ka ŋiketiyak keŋ idiotuŋanan, eyakasi ŋirwa ŋulu iikiikere ka eyakasi ŋikatubok; epedorete ikes akisitanakin aina.
Nai ani keyai ibore ice ŋini icamito iyes, esubakinio aloikiiko a ŋolo a ŋituŋa yok.
Anerae epedoryo akisitakin iwon aŋuna ka aruruma a ŋina etiyakin nakoloŋit na. Emam ŋakiro ŋuna ejokya acela na ka nyikipedori iwon alimun adiokirot ŋina ikigaŋi iwon aŋuna keŋ.”
Ani kirwor ŋun, kiela ekaran ŋituŋa.
Ani kedaun aruruma, tonyarau Paulo ŋikanupak iwapei, kisimukek ikes, ido tolimok tema, “Ikianyun.” Torotok nai iŋes Makedonia.
Ani kedau akirim ŋitela ŋul daadaŋ, kisimukek ŋikanupak a nen, ido tolot Akaia.
Kiriya iŋes aina ŋilapyo ŋiuni. Ani eriŋa iŋes itemonokin alosit ka ameeli Siria, toyenu atemar etukosi Ŋiyudayan aŋuna keŋ. Aŋun, totyaku iŋes akitor nabo Makedonia eboŋori.
Torukosi ŋituŋa lu ka iŋes: Sopate ŋolo alo Berea – lokoku a Piro, Aristako ka Sekondo ŋulu alo Tesalonika, Gaio ŋolo alo Derube, Tuciko ka Tropimo ŋulu alo Asia ka Timoteo.
Toberaros ikes kiŋaren ikidarut isua alo Toroas.
Ani edaun ŋasuban ŋuna a ŋamugati a ŋuna emam ŋakinyalet, torotokinoe isua ka ameeli alo Pilipi. Kelunyarosi ŋirwa ŋikan, torukaunae ikes alo Toroas, kiriyae aina esabit epei.

Akoloŋit ŋina ke Esabit, apaki ŋina ikiyakar isua iwapei akinumunum Akimuj ŋina ke Ekapolon, abu Paulo kirwor neni a ŋikanupak a ŋulu a nen akitodol kidiŋ akuwar, aŋuna arotokinitor iŋes taparacu keŋ.
Ayakasi ŋitaae ŋulu alalak nagule ŋina alokidiama, ŋina ikitukokina isua.

Eboi esorokit ŋolo anyaritae Eutiko alodirisa; ikwaŋina arubakinitor Paulo irworo, kilurakin nooi Eutiko akitodol neni ajotooror. Kimasun kwap alodirisa a ŋolo anagule a ŋina ayai kidiama ŋunaarei. Toryamunae iŋes etwanit.
Todoka nai Paulo kwap, torwakin neni keŋ, totun iŋes, tolimu tema, “Nyikibul, eyari iŋes!”
Toboŋo iŋes kidiama kai, tokorak Akimuj ŋina ke Ekapolon kimuja kaapei. Kirworo iŋes ka ikes ekaoyan akitodol nakipiripirunet akoloŋ, ido torotok.
Yaasi ikes esorokit lore eyari ka alakara ikes nooi.
Tolotoi isua alo Toroas kiŋaren, todokae ameeli tari Asos, kimyekinae Paulo ebunit a ŋakejen a nen, aneni atyakunitae isua akitodokia iŋes ameeli; anerae aris iŋes kikilimok isua akitiya ŋun.
Ani ikiryamakin iŋes ka isua Asos, kitodokakinae isua iŋes ameeli, tolotoi tari loculat Mitilene.
Torotokinoe a nen, kitoroi taparacu iwalari diyete eculat ŋolo anyaritae Kios. Kelunyar akoloŋit apei, todolunoe isua loculat Samo; ani akoloŋit ŋina atupakini ŋin, todoloe Mileto.
Aris Paulo ketyaku adepar Epeso, ikotere nyicanicanaar adiopaki alo Asia. Ekirikira iŋes erae kepedori adolun Yerusalem nyedolo akoloŋit ŋina a Pentekoste.
Kiyaku Paulo akituk alo Mileto tari Epeso alimokin ŋikatukok ŋulu ka atukot a ŋikanupak akisiryam iŋes.
Ani edolunete ikes, tolimok iŋes ikes tema, “Iyenete iyes ŋilopeyek epite ŋolo ikirukitor iyes ka ayoŋ apaki daadaŋ, ameun akoloŋit ŋina adolunio ayoŋ Asia.
Abu ayoŋ etiyanak Ekapolon anapatanu tari anapakio a ŋuna egworor ka ŋuna aryamunitor ŋican, ikwaŋina arubakinitotor Ŋiyudayan etukosi aŋuna kaŋ.
Iyenete iyes atemar abu ayoŋ nyemunon idiobore ŋini eyai epoida aneni kus, abu okolimonok ka eketatamik anatukon ka alorerya kus.
Abu ayoŋ eteyenik Ŋiyudayan ka Ŋigirik daŋ atemar etemokino ikes tokiwa ŋasecisya kec alokiŋaren Akuj ka tonupa Ekapolon yok Yesu Kristo.
Nai tokona, anakipup Etau ŋolo ka Akuj, alosi ayoŋ Yerusalem pa ayeni ŋuna akatakanikinete ayoŋ aina.
Ŋuna ayeni ayoŋ ikes nu: eketeyenunui Etau ŋolo Asegan ayoŋ alotaunio a daadaŋ atemar ekedarit ayoŋ alomar mabus ka aryamun ŋakisicaneta.
Nai aneni kaŋ nyepol akiyar nooi akilo aŋetakin akerit na ŋina erae etic ŋolo akainakinit Ekapolon Yesu ayoŋ akitiya. Etic ŋol iŋes akiteyenun Ŋakiro ŋuna Ajokak ŋuna ka ajokis a ŋina ka Akuj.
“Ayeni ayoŋ tokona atemar iyes daadaŋ ŋulu adau ayoŋ alimonokin ŋuna ka Apukan ka Akuj, nyikiŋolikinete ayoŋ nabo.
Aŋun, ekekekini iyes nooi napeikoloŋit na atemar, ani tokona kitutubokinosi iyes Akuj, emam ŋuna akatapito ayoŋ.
Anerae nyimunono ayoŋ akiserakin iyes ŋuna daadaŋ ecamit Akuj.
Kimukeuna make ka kiyoko esipan daadaŋ ŋolo ecikak Etau ŋolo Asegan nakan kus. Toraakas ŋikeyokok ŋulu ka atukot a ŋina a ŋikanupak Akuj, ŋina abu iŋes kituruwo ŋina keŋ a ŋaokot a Lokoku keŋ.
Ayeni ayoŋ atemar ani karotok ayoŋ, epote ŋipeei ŋulu adedeŋak nooi neni kus ka nyeesikinete akinyasun esipan.
Ebuni apaki ŋina elomuniata tari alokidiŋ kus ŋikalyokonok ŋice ecamito atemar kiwuapakis ŋikanupak ikes.
Aŋun nai, totenito totamunito atemar tari anapakio a ŋuna egworor ayoŋ, abu ekesimukek iyes daadaŋ akuwar ka apaaran, tolunyar ŋikaru ŋiuni.
“Nai tokona, ekewuakini ayoŋ iyes nakan ŋuna ka Akuj ka nakiro ŋuna ka ajokis keŋ, ŋina epedori akitogogoŋ ka ainakin iyes ŋarereŋisyo ŋuna iŋadat Akuj aŋuna a ŋituŋa a ŋulu eturuwo iŋes ŋulu keŋ.
Iyenete iyes ŋilopeyek atemar nyiwuakina ayoŋ ekibure losilipa a ituŋanan a idio, logolid kori lolowi,
nai abu ayoŋ a ŋakan kaŋ etiya ka oryamu ibore daadaŋ ŋini ikiitanit ayoŋ ka ŋirukitos kaŋ.

Eketoodik ayoŋ iyes alopitesyo a daadaŋ atemar itemokino ŋinituŋanan kitiya ka agogoŋu, ikotere epedori akiŋarakin ŋulu epalag anatamunit ŋakiro ŋuna abala Ekapolon Yesu, ‘Eyai arereŋu nooi nainanakin akilo naryamunun.’ ”
Ani irikakini Paulo erwori, toryediko kaapei ka ikes daadaŋ, kilipa.
Totunakinos ikes daadaŋ neni keŋ enuyete ebasi, “Tolot neni ajokan.”
Egworosi ikes ka eyaloloŋete nooi a ŋakiro a ŋuna aris iŋes kelimu atemar nyiŋolikinete ikes iŋes nabo. Kitenakis nai iŋes nameeli.
Ani ketyakaroi isua aneni kec, todokae ameeli, kidiiriyaretei tari loculat ŋolo enyaritae Kos. Akoloŋit ŋina atupakini ŋin, todoloe loculat Rodes; a nen tolotoi tari lotaun Patara.
Toryamunae aina ameeli ŋina alosi Poenikia; aŋun, todokae ameeli ŋin, torotokinoe.
Poni isua neni atakania Kupuro, tomanae alowae a ŋolo alo Kwap, tolotoi nakwap ŋina anyaritae Siria. Todokunae alotaun Tiro, anerae arae nen aai ameeli ŋiboro ŋulu ewuokit.
Torukaunae ŋikanupak a Yesu aina, kiboi ka ikes esabit epei. Tolimokis ikes Paulo nyelot Yerusalem ikwapei eteyenikinitor ikes Etau ŋolo Asegan.

Tari ŋina alimunitere ŋun, ani edaun ŋarwa ŋuna arukitere isua ka ikes, kitemokinetei isua arotokin. Ikitenakis isua ŋikanupak daadaŋ ka ŋaberu kec ta ŋidwe daŋ, tolotoi kiŋa etaun nacukut ŋina ka anam, toryedikoe kilipae, ido totyakatei.
Todokae isua ameeli, toboŋosi ikes lorerya kec.
Torubakinae isua elosyo ka ameeli tari Tolemais, neni emalaere isua ŋikanupak ŋulu a nen, kiboi ka ikes akoloŋit apei.

Akoloŋit ŋina atupakini ŋin, torotokinoe isua todolunoe lotaun Kaisaria. A nen, tolotoi kai a Pilipo a ŋolo arae ekalimonokinan Ŋakiro ŋuna Ajokak, kiboi ka iŋes. Arae iŋes epei alokidiŋ ŋikilyok ŋikanikaarei ŋulu aris keseun alo Yerusalem.
Ayakar iŋes ŋidwe keŋ ŋulupesur ŋiomwon ŋulu arae ŋikadwarak.
Ani eriŋa isua iriyatae a nen, bu alo Yudaya ekadwaran ŋolo anyaritae Agabo.

Bu iŋes neni kosi, tolema arokoba ŋina a Paulo, toenia ŋakejen keŋ pei ka ŋakan tema, “Ŋuna ebala Etau ŋolo Asegan ikes nu: eenete Ŋiyudayan elope ŋolo ka arokoba a na alo Yerusalem ka ipotokinete ikes iŋes lotuŋa ŋulu nyerae Ŋiyudayan.”
Ani iiraryo isua nu, aponi isua ka ŋulu ayakare nen torubakinae edyekitae Paulo nyelot Yerusalem.
Tema nai Paulo, “Nyo itiyaete iyes igworotor ikona ka ikiteryebiata ayoŋ etau kaŋ? Atenit ayoŋ aeno alo Yerusalem; meere ŋun bon, nai atenit atwanare daŋ aina aŋuna ke ekiro ke Ekapolon Yesu.”
Ani ewouni Paulo akiirar ŋakiro kosi, toesikinae isua erwor, ido temarae, “Kitiyakin ŋuna ecamit Ekapolon.”
Ani kedaunosi ŋirwa ŋul, kitemokinetei isua, torotokinoe Yerusalem.

Aponi isua torukoroe ka ŋikasyomak ŋice daŋ, ŋulu aponito alo Kaisaria. Arukito ikes ka ekile ŋolo alosyo isua akiboi kai keŋ alo Yerusalem. Arae iŋes Minason ŋolo alo Kupuro, ŋolo aberakin nooi aruwor ekanupan a Yesu.
Ani edolunio isua Yerusalem, ikijaut ŋikanupak isua ka alakara.
Ani taparacu keŋ, torukoroe isua ka Paulo aanyun Yakobo ka ŋikatukok daadaŋ ŋulu ka atukot a Ŋikristo ŋulu aponito nen.
Kimala Paulo ikes, ido kitatamik ereunit a ŋapeipei ŋakiro daadaŋ ŋuna aris Akuj kitiya alotic keŋ lotuŋa ŋulu pa arae Ŋiyudayan.

Ani kiirasi ikes erwor a Paulo, kipuro ikes Akuj. Temasi nai ikes daadaŋ neni a Paulo, “Lokaato, kiŋolik iyoŋ epite ŋolo alo Yerusalem a ne: eyakasi Ŋiyudayan ŋulu edolito ŋalipyo, ŋulu aruworosi ŋikanupak a Yesu. Tari kikote neni, iricakinito ikes daadaŋ Ŋikisila a Moses.

Itatamikinitae ikes atemar ibu iyoŋ kitatam Ŋiyudayan daadaŋ ŋulu eyakasi nakwapin ŋuna a ŋituŋa a ŋulu nyerae Ŋiyudayan aesikin Ŋikisila a Moses, alimokin ikes atemar nyileŋerete ŋikusidwe kori nyiwuapito ŋitalyo a Ŋiyudayan.
Nyo itemokino kitiyae? Kire iirarete ikes atemar idolu iyoŋ.
Aŋun nai, kitiya ŋuna ikilimokinio isua iyoŋ. Eyakasi ne ŋikilyok ŋiomwon ŋulu ikoŋito neni ka Akuj.

Torukosi ka ikes lotal ŋolo ka akiteseguno ikwaŋina icikakinitotor Ŋikisila; ido totac egyelit a ŋinibore iitanio aŋuna kec, ikotere epedoryata ikes akibany ŋakyes kec. Alopite a ŋol eyenunete ŋituŋa daadaŋ atemar emam ibore iyookino anakiro a ŋuna kelimonokin ikes aŋuna kon, nai eyenunete atemar iwuapit iyoŋ Ŋikisila a Moses.

Nai lotuŋa ŋulu nyerae Ŋiyudayan, ŋulu sek aris keruworosi ŋikanupak, ikiyakik isua ikes abaruwa alimokin ikes ebe aponi isua totyakunae atemar itemokino ikes toesikis akinyam ŋamuja ŋuna einakinitae nakujo, ŋaokot, ediotyaŋ ŋolo emyeditae ka akitiya amalao.”

Torukosi nai Paulo ka ŋikilyok ŋul, ani taparacu keŋ, kitiyata kaapei etal ŋolo ka akiteseguno. Tolot nai iŋes Kai ka Akuj, tolimok ŋisacaradotin apaki ŋina adaunor etal ŋolo ka akiteseguno a ŋawat kec, ŋina earere amuronot aŋuna a ŋinituŋanan alokidiŋ kec.
Ani eapikini ŋirwa ŋulukanikaarei ŋulu ka akiteseguno adaun, kiŋolikis Ŋiyudayan ŋice ŋulu alo Asia Paulo alo Kai ka Akuj. Kisiguryakis ikes asepic daadaŋ, kikamut Paulo.

Tocelut ikes temasi, “Ŋituŋa a Isirael, kiŋarakinae! Elo ekile ŋolo irimit akwap daadaŋ akitatam ŋituŋa daadaŋ akitoroniyar ŋituŋa a Isirael, Ŋikisila a Moses ka Akai ka Akuj na. Nabo tokona ayau iŋes tari ŋituŋa ŋulu nyerae Ŋiyudayan tooma Akai ka Akuj, ido etooŋoryan ne, neni imyekinitae aŋuna ka Akuj!”
(Alimunete ikes ŋun, anerae keris ikes kiŋolikis Paulo ka Tropimo ŋolo alo Epeso erukito alotaun, totamakis atemar kori keyait Paulo iŋes tooma Akai ka Akuj.)
Kiguryakin etaun daadaŋ, toema ŋituŋa daadaŋ kaapei kikamut Paulo, kiriyasi iŋes kiŋa Akai ka Akuj ka togolokinoe atipei ŋikekya.
Ani eriŋa aruruma ikatakinit akiar Paulo, kiyakiyarae akirot neni ke ekapolon a ŋisigarya a Roma atemar ayeu Yerusalem daadaŋ aruruma.
Ya iŋes atipei ŋisigarya ka ŋikapolokinitok kec ŋice, kiwonyakis nasepic. Ani iŋolikinete ŋituŋa ikes, towua, toesikis akibuŋa Paulo.
Tolot ekapolon a ŋisigarya neni ayai Paulo, kikamu iŋes, totubu atemar toenae iŋes a ŋiriko a ŋiarei. Kiŋit nai ŋituŋa tema, “Ŋae ekile lo? Nyo itiyat iŋes?”

Tocelut ŋice anasepic ŋakiro ŋapei, tocelut nabo ŋice ŋace. Kiguryakinos ŋakiro neni aronon, todaun ekapolon a ŋisigarya epite ŋoloyenunet ŋuna kire kepotu kitiyakin. Aŋun, tolimok iŋes ŋisigarya keŋ ayaar Paulo lolain.
Ani edolunete ikes nadoketa ŋuna elomarere lolain, todedeŋiar asepic nooi, tosodo ŋisigarya todaka Paulo erae akidak.
Ewuapit ikes aruruma a ŋituŋa a ŋulu acelasi ebasi, “Oara iŋes!”
Ani eapiyaryata ŋisigarya Paulo tooma elain, kirworik Paulo neni ke ekapolon a ŋisigarya tema, “Alimuni adiokirot a?” Kiŋit ekapolon a ŋisigarya tema, “Ikwa iyeni iyoŋ erwor Ŋagirik a?
Ikwa nyirae iyoŋ Ejipitanoit ŋolo paaran ayeuni ajore, toriko ŋikajiyok ŋulu adedeŋak ŋulu adolito ŋalipyo ŋaomwon naloŋisat a?”
Toboŋok Paulo tema, “Arae ayoŋ Eyudayat ŋolo alo Cilicia, ŋolo ekedounitoe alo Taso, etaun ŋolo arwon. Kiŋarakinae kare mono erworik lotuŋa.”
Tocamak ekapolon a ŋisigarya iŋes, tosodi Paulo towo kiikiikok akeekan akisililiŋ ŋituŋa. Ani ililiŋete ikes, kirworik Paulo neni kec a Ŋayudayan ebala:
“Ŋikaitotoi ka atapapa, topupokinae ayoŋ erworo aŋuna kaŋ alokiŋaren kus!”
Ani iirarete ikes iŋes irworo a Ŋayudayan, kililiŋa ikes totakinos cek. Torubak Paulo irworo, tema,

“Arae ayoŋ Eyudayat ŋolo ekedounitoe alo Taso anakwap a ŋina a Cilicia, nai eketopolounitoe a ne alo Yerusalem, arae ekasyoman ŋolo a Gamaliel. Abu iŋes eketatam ayoŋ ejok epite ŋolo itemokino ewuapitor Ŋikisila ŋulu atapapaa yok ka abu ayoŋ olelaki Akuj nooi ikwapei tokona ilelakinitotor iyes daadaŋ a ne.
Abu ayoŋ esican ka oar ŋituŋa ŋulu ewuapito Erot ŋolo ke Ekapolon Yesu. Abu ayoŋ ekamununu ŋikilyok ka ŋaberu oyaana mabus.

Epedori Esacaradoti ŋolo Apolon nooi ka atukot daadaŋ akisuuda atemar erworo ayoŋ ŋuna a kire. Abu ayoŋ oryamu aneni kec ŋabaruwae ŋuna losyet neni a ŋikaitotoi a ŋulu arae Ŋiyudayan alo Damasko. Ido abu olot inaa akikamun ŋituŋa ŋul, ikotere oyau ikes Yerusalem eenen a ŋiriko, kisicanae.
“Ani alosi ayoŋ aapiyari Damasko kidiŋ apaaran, toŋesun atipei anakuj akica ŋina apolon nooi kinuak neni ayai ayoŋ.
Emasakin ayoŋ kwap, eira etoil ebala neni kaŋ, ‘Saulo, Saulo! Kaanukiro ikisicanitor iyoŋ ayoŋ?’
Eŋit ayoŋ otema, ‘Ŋae iyoŋ, Ekapolon?’ Toboŋok iŋes tema, ‘Arae ayoŋ Yesu ŋolo a Nasaret, ŋolo isicanit iyoŋ.’
Toanyuwasi ŋikilyok ŋulu ikirukit ka ayoŋ akica, nai nyiirara ikes etoil a ŋolo erworo neni kaŋ.
Eŋit ayoŋ otema, ‘Nyo itemokino ayoŋ etiya, Ekapolon?’ Tema Ekapolon neni kaŋ, ‘Tonyou toloma Damasko, ikilimokinio iyoŋ aina ŋakiro daadaŋ ŋuna aseu Akuj atemar kitiya iyoŋ.’
Kabu ayoŋ omudukan aŋuna ka akica a ŋina emilia nooi; aŋun, apotu ŋirukitos kaŋ ekekamut akan, okorikosi Damasko.
“Ayai Damasko ekile ŋolo anyaritae Anania, ŋolo ajokan, ŋolo ainakina neni ka Akuj. Ewuapit iŋes Ŋikisila a Moses ka akerito iŋes Ŋiyudayan daadaŋ ŋulu alo Damasko.
Abu iŋes bu neni kaŋ, towo alodiyete kaŋ tema, ‘Lokaato Saulo, kiŋolik nabo!’ Esaa ŋolopei ŋol, okienyu ayoŋ, oanyuwa iŋes.
Tema nai iŋes, ‘Ikiseu iyoŋ Akuj ŋina atapapaa yok ayenun acamit keŋ, aanyun Eketiyan keŋ ŋolo iyookino ka akiirar iŋes irworo a etoil keŋ ke elope.
Anerae iruwor iyoŋ esuuda keŋ alotooma alimokin ŋituŋa daadaŋ ŋuna ianyu iyoŋ ka ŋuna iira.
Nyo nai tokona eriŋa iyoŋ idarit? Tonyou, ikibatisae ka kilip alokiro a Yesu, ido kisyoni ŋasecisya kon.’
“Oboŋo ayoŋ Yerusalem. Ani akoloŋit apei eriŋa elipi alo Kai ka Akuj, bu atakanikinet neni kaŋ,
oanyuwa Ekapolon ebala, ‘Kiburuburak atipei arotokin alo Yerusalem, anerae nyecamunete ŋituŋa a ne akisuuda kon aŋuna kaŋ.’
Oboŋok ayoŋ otema, ‘Ekapolon, eyenete ikes nooi atemar abu ayoŋ olosenenee losinagogae akikam ka akibuŋa ŋulu ikinupito iyoŋ.
Ani ŋina aarere Stepano ŋolo arae esuuda kon, ayai ayoŋ elope nen etojokite atwanare keŋ ka eŋadat ŋilowi a ŋulu aarete iŋes.’
Tema Ekapolon neni kaŋ, ‘Tolot, anerae ekeyakiyari ayoŋ iyoŋ neni elwana nooi, lotuŋa ŋulu nyerae Ŋiyudayan!’ ”
Topupokis ŋituŋa Paulo tari neni alimunio nu; togeut nai acela nooi temasi, “Tolemasi iŋes! Toara iŋes! Nyitemokino iŋes toyar!”
Acelasi ikes, kiwakiwakete ŋilowi kec, kielete ŋalup kidiama.
Tolimok ekapolon a ŋisigarya a Roma ŋisigarya keŋ ayaar Paulo lolain, kicikak ikes akibuŋa iŋes nooi, ikotere eyenunere ŋakiro ŋuna acelatar Ŋiyudayan neni keŋ ikona.
Nai ani kedaut ikes akien iŋes a ŋarukanes, tolimok Paulo ekapolokiniton ŋisigarya amiat ŋolo awuoi alodiye tema, “Ikicamakinit iyoŋ ekisil akibuŋa ituŋanan ŋini a Roma, tari eriŋa nyetubokina a?”
Ani iirari ekapolokiniton ŋisigarya amiat ŋakiro ŋun, tolot neni a ŋolo apol akilo iŋes, kiŋit tema, “Iyeni iyoŋ ŋakiro ŋuna itiyae iyoŋ a? Erae ekile lo ituŋanan a Roma!”
Aŋun, tolot ekapolon ŋol elope neni a Paulo, kiŋit tema, “Tolimokinae ayoŋ, irae iyoŋ ituŋanan ŋini a Roma a?” Toboŋok Paulo tema, “Ee.”
Tolimu ekapolon tema, “Abu ayoŋ oruwor ituŋanan ŋini a Roma anakitac ŋisiliŋa ŋulu alalak.” Tema Paulo, “Nai arae ayoŋ ŋolo a Roma anauruunet.”
Kikutukutoosi atipei ŋikilyok ŋulu sek alosete akiŋitiŋit Paulo ŋakiro. Tobul ekapolon a ŋisigarya nooi eyenuni atemar arae Paulo ituŋanan a Roma ka aŋuna abunio iŋes toen Paulo a ŋiriko.

Nai acamit ekapolon a ŋisigarya aanyun kire ŋakiro ŋuna esitakinitotor Ŋiyudayan Paulo; aŋun, abu iŋes taparacu keŋ tolaca ŋiriko aneni a Paulo, tocunak ŋisacaradotin ŋulu apolok ka Atukot daadaŋ. Ya nai iŋes Paulo kitowuo alokiŋaren kec.
Kitek Paulo atukot, kirworik tema, “Ŋikaitotoi! Ecayete ŋatameta kaŋ anakiro a daadaŋ a ŋuna ikamunito akiyar kaŋ alokiŋaren Akuj akitodol akoloŋit napei na.”
Anenipei tolimok Anania, ŋolo arae Esacaradoti ŋolo Apolon nooi ŋituŋa ŋulu awuasi alodiyete Paulo akibap iŋes nakituk.

Tolimok Paulo iŋes tema, “Ikibapi kire jik Akuj iyoŋ – iyoŋ ŋolo ikoni arwatata ŋina iwositae eraŋgi ŋolo akwaŋan! Iboi iyoŋ a nen atubokin ayoŋ alotooma Ŋikisila ŋulu ka Akuj, nai tobilite bo iyoŋ Ŋikisila aŋuna ilimokinia ikes akibap ayoŋ!”
Tolimokis Paulo ŋikilyok ŋulu edunyito temasi, “Ikokini iyoŋ iyanyi Esacaradoti ŋolo Apolon nooi ŋolo ka Akuj ai?”

Toboŋok Paulo tema, “Pa ayeni ayoŋ ŋikaitotoi atemar erae iŋes Esacaradoti ŋolo Apolon nooi. Kire ayeni atemar ebasi Ŋakigireta ebe, ‘Nyitemokino iyoŋ kirwor ŋuna aronok neni ke ekepukan a ŋituŋa kon.’ ”

Nai ani eanyuni Paulo atemar arae ŋice a nen Ŋisadukayon ka ŋice arae Ŋiparisayon, kiworou neni ka Atukot tema, “Ŋikaitotoi kaŋ! Arae ayoŋ Eparisayot, lokoku a Ŋiparisayon. Ekesitakinitae ayoŋ a ne, anerae egeno ayoŋ atemar eyarunete ŋikatwak!”
Ani kedau iŋes alimun ŋun, togeut Ŋisadukayon ka Ŋiparisayon ebura, ido totyaka Atukot.
(Anerae ebasi Ŋisadukayon nyeyarunete ŋituŋa alokatwak ka daŋ emameete ŋimalaikan kori ŋitai; nai enupito Ŋiparisayon ŋakiro nu daadaŋ.)

Kiyatakin ecelet, tonyout Ŋiketatamak a Ŋikisila ŋice ŋulu arae Ŋiparisayon, kitepega Atukot ka agogoŋu nooi temasi, “Emam ibore ikiryamu isua esecit ekile lo! Acepaki kirworit etau kori emalaika neni keŋ kire!”
Topoloor apega nooi, tobul ekapolon a ŋisigarya totamak atemar enyilinyilaarete ikes Paulo. Aŋun, tolimok iŋes ŋisigarya keŋ alosit nen arikor Paulo aneni kec yaasi lolain.
Ani nakwaare, towo Ekapolon Yesu alodiyete Paulo, tolimok iŋes tema, “Toen etau! Idau iyoŋ akisuuda ŋakiro kaŋ a ne alo Yerusalem ka itemokino kitiya ikwaŋinapei alo Roma daŋ.”
Ani taparacu, kiryamiryama Ŋiyudayan ŋice. Kikoŋo atemar nyikimuji kori nyikimasi idiobore akitodol ŋina earyata Paulo.
Adeparit ekimar a ŋulu atukunete ŋakiro ŋun ŋatomoniomwon.
Toloto nai ikes neni a ŋisacaradotin a ŋulu apolok ka ŋikatukok temasi, “Ekoŋi isua kaapei atemar mam akimuj idiobore akitodol ŋina ikiarya Paulo.
Tokona nai, kiyakiyasi iyes a Natukot akirot neni ke ekapolokiniton ŋisigarya a Roma ayaun Paulo neni kus, esibit icamito iyes akiŋitiŋit iŋes nabo. Nai etenio isua akiar iŋes eriŋa nyedoluno ne.”
Nai kiira lokoku a nakaato a Paulo ŋuna apotu ikes totukut; aŋun, abu tolot tooma lolain, tolimok Paulo.
Tonyara nai Paulo ekapolokiniton ŋisigarya amiat, tolimok tema, “Ya esorokit lo neni ke ekapolon a ŋisigarya; eyakar iŋes ŋakiro ŋadi ŋunalimokina iŋes.”

Ya nai ekapolokiniton ŋol esorokit neni ke ekapolon a ŋisigarya tolimok tema, “Abu Paulo ŋolo erae emabus okonyar ayoŋ ekeŋitak ayaun esorokit lo neni kon, anerae eyakar iŋes ŋakiro ŋadi ŋuna limokina iyoŋ.”
Kikamu ekapolon a ŋisigarya akan ke esorokit, toriko iŋes nawae, kiŋit tema, “Anukiro iyakar iyoŋ ŋuna icamit alimokin ayoŋ?”
Tema iŋes, “Acamunosi ŋikepukak ŋulu a Ŋiyudayan akiŋitakin iyoŋ ayaun Paulo Natukot kec moi taparacu, esibit ecamit Atukot akiŋitiŋit iŋes nabo.

Nai nyipupok ŋakiro kec, anerae eyakasi ŋikilyok alokidiŋ kec ŋulu edeparit ekimar kec ŋatomoniomwon, ŋulu edapunete iŋes. Adaut ikes akikoŋ atemar nyikimuji kori nyikimasi akitodol ŋina earyata Paulo. Etenito tokona ikes akitiyakin ŋun ka idarito ŋuna iboŋokini iyoŋ.”
Kitolot nai ekapolon a ŋisigarya esorokit ŋol, tolimok tema, “Nyilimok idiotuŋanan atemar ikilimok iyoŋ ayoŋ ŋakiro nu.”
